Il Duce
元首(1922ー1943，对意大利法西斯头子墨索里尼的称呼)
他肚子里还有点儿墨水。
Tā dùzi lǐ hái yǒudiǎnr mòshuǐ。
He\'s something of a scholar.
纸上落了一滴墨水，快拿吸墨纸搌一搌吧。
Zhǐ shàngluò le yì dī mòshuǐ，kuài ná xīmòzhǐ zhǎnyizhǎn ba。
A drop of ink has fallen on the paper; blot it up quickly.
这种墨水不会变色。
Zhèzhǒng mòshuǐ bú huì biànsè。
This ink will not change colour.
墨水沉淀了。
Mòshuǐ chéndiàn le。
There is some sediment in the ink.
这种纸不吃墨水。
Zhèzhǒng zhǐ bùchī mòshuǐ。
This kind of paper does not absorb ink.
高级墨水
gāojí mòshuǐ
high-quality ink
墨水用光了。
Mòshuǐ yòngguāng le。
The ink\'s used up.
他没喝过几年墨水。
Tā méi hēguò jǐnián mòshuǐ。
He\'s had only a few years of school.
红(蓝)墨水
hóng（lán）mòshuǐ
red (blue) ink
他肚子里还有点儿墨水。
Tā dùzi lǐ hái yǒudiǎnr mòshuǐ。
He\'s something of a scholar.
把墨水瓶碰翻了
Bǎ mòshuǐpíng pèngfān le。
knock the inkbottle over
台布让墨水给染了。
Táibù ràng mòshuǐ gěi rǎn le。
The table cloth got stained with ink.
用粉笔把墨水吸干
yòngfěnbǐ bǎ mòshuǐ xīgān 
blot ink with a piece of chalk
蘸墨水
zhàn mòshuǐ 
dip in ink
我袖子上的墨水斑痕洗不掉了。
Wǒ xiùzi shàng de mòshuǐ bānhén xǐ búdiào le。
The ink mark on my sleeve cannot be washed off.
几滴墨水
jǐdī mòshuǐ
a few drops of ink
墨水
mòshuǐ
ink
纸被墨水洇透了。
Zhǐ bèi mòshuǐ yīn tòu le。
This paper has been saturated with ink.
泼墨山水
pōmò shānshuǐ
splashed-ink landscape
中国水墨画
Zhōngguó shuǐmòhuà
Chinese ink and wash painting
他的墨笔山水画是很不错的艺术作品。
Tā de mòbǐ shānshuǐhuà shì hěnbúcuò de yìshù zuòpǐn。
His Chinese landscape paintings by brush are wonderful artistic works.
墨水
蓝墨水
这种纸一沾墨水就洇。
过去一个穷山村里，能有几个喝墨水的？
他肚子里墨水多，就请教他吧！
他一肚子墨水(指很有学问)︱
《水墨画作法入门》。
书房挂着一幅浓墨重彩的山水画
Blotting paper absorbs ink.
吸墨水纸吸墨水。
We were given blotting paper to get rid of any excess ink.
Wǒmen yòng xī mòshuǐ zhǐ lái xī zǒu duōyú de mòshuǐ。
我们用吸墨水纸来吸走多余的墨水。
indelible ink
笔迹难擦掉的墨水
Ink permeates blotting paper.
墨水渗透吸水纸。
in pencil/ink
用铅笔/墨水笔
his hands were smeared with oil/ink
他的手上沾满了油/墨水
In the dark, this fluorescent ink can be fairly seen.
黑暗中，可以清楚地看到荧光墨水。
Indelible ink often consists entirely of synthetic dyes.
不褪色墨水一般均由合成染料构成。
You need special detergent to remove ink spots from your clothes.
需要特殊的洗涤剂才能洗掉衣服上的墨水点。
The next letters were written with suspiciously blotted ink.
Xià yì fēng xìn bǐjiào kěyí，cúnzài xǔduō yòng mòshuǐ quāndiǎnle de dìfang。
下一封信比较可疑，存在许多用墨水圈点了的地方。
She found a book containing words strangely charactered in red ink.
Tā zhǎodào yì běn shū，qíguài de shì lǐmiàn yǒu yìxiē yòng hóng mòshuǐ xiě de zì。
她找到一本书，奇怪的是里面有一些用红墨水写的字。
The first pens with reservoirs of ink were invented in the Civil War.
Kěyǐ chǔcún mòshuǐ de gāngbǐ shì zài Měiguó nánběizhànzhēng shí fāmíng de。
可以储存墨水的钢笔是在美国南北战争时发明的。
This helps loosen any clogged ink in the print heads.
Zhè yǒuzhùyú sōngkāi rènhé dǔsè dǎyìntóu de mòshuǐ。
这有助于松开任何堵塞打印头的墨水。
The printer inks out the selected word.
Gāi yìnshuāgōng yòng mòshuǐ tú qùsuǒ xuǎn zhī cí。
该印刷工用墨水涂去所选之词。
I steamed off the ink stain from my shirt.
Wǒ yòng zhēngqì chúqù wǒ chènyī shàng de mòshuǐ wūzì。
我用蒸汽除去我衬衣上的墨水污渍。
The front pocket is stained with ink.
Qián kǒudai bèi mòshuǐ nòngzāng le。
前口袋被墨水弄脏了。
He inked his finger.
Mòshuǐ rǎn hēi le tā de zhǐjia。
墨水染黑了他的指甲。
Red-ink the area that is restricted.
Wèi Xiànzhìqū túshàng hóngmòshuǐ。
为限制区涂上红墨水。
You could add a piece of cuttlefish bone，which is high in calcium，and would dissolve in the water.
Nǐ bùfáng jiā yí kuài mòyúgǔ jìnqù，tā bùjǐn hángàiliàng gāo hái kě zài shuǐlǐ róngjiě。
你不妨加一块墨鱼骨进去，它不仅含钙量高还可在水里溶解。
My new blouse is dark green.
我的新上衣是墨绿色的。
Messengers were moving unobtrusively over the jet-black mountain ranges, bearing confidential tidings from sheikhdom to sheikhdom.
Wǎngfǎnyú qiúzhǎngguó zhījiān de xìnshǐ dàizhe jīmì xiāoxi jǐnshèn de fānguòle mòlǜsè de shānmài。
往返于酋长国之间的信使带着机密消息谨慎地翻过了墨绿色的山脉。
骚人墨客。
文人墨客。
诗人墨客到此不免要咏叹一番。
在刺目的阳光下，很多人戴着墨镜。
Zài cìmù de yángguāng xià，hěnduōrén dài zhe mòjìng。
Many people were wearing sunglasses under the dazzling sunlight.
为了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨镜。
Wèile fángzhǐ shāzi míyǎn，wǒ dàishàng le yífù mòjìng。
In order to prevent sand getting in my eyes, I wear a pair of sun-glasses.
一副墨镜
yífù mòjìng
a pair of sunglasses
墨镜
Then a bald man with sunglasses on walked through the door.
Yí gè dàizhe mòjìng de guāngtóu nánzǐ zǒu chū le dàmén。
一个带着墨镜的光头男子走出了大门。
墨家学说
Mòjiā xuéshuō
Mohism
那些了不得的作家，谨严入骨，惜墨如金，要把一生的作品，只删存一个或者三四个字。
Nàxiē liǎobu de de zuòjiā，jǐnyánrùgǔ，xīmòrújīn，yào bǎ yìshēng de zuòpǐn，zhǐ shān cún yígè huòzhě sān sì gè zì。
Some important writers are so strict with themselves, so sparing of ink, that they like to pare down the work of a lifetime to three or four words.
我家中厅垂挂着一副启功先生的墨宝。
Wǒjiā zhōng tīng chuíguà zhe yífù Qǐgōng xiānshēng de mòbǎo。
A piece of calligraphy written by Mr. Qigong is hanging in the hall of our house.
墨家学派的鼻祖是墨子。
名家墨宝。
The artist flowed the washes on the paper.
Zhè wèi yìshùjiā shǐ mò zài zhǐ shàng liúdòng。
这位艺术家使墨在纸上流动。
I live in China, but my home is in Mexico.
我住在中国，但我的家乡在墨西哥。
She wore full traditional Mexican costume on her visit home.
Tā chuānzhe wánzhěng de Mòxīgē fúshì huíjiā tànwàng。
她穿着完整的墨西哥服饰回家探望。
Mexico is a country of mestizos, criollos, and indigenes.
Mòxīgē shì yí gè yóu hùnxuè zhǒng rén、Xībānyá yì rén、tǔzhùrén zǔchéng de guójiā。
墨西哥是一个由混血种人、西班牙裔人、土著人组成的国家。
名人墨迹
mínɡrén mòjì
original work by a famous calligrapher or painter
他衬衫上有墨迹。
Tā chènshān shàngyǒu mòjì。
There were ink stains on his shirt.
这是鲁迅的墨迹。
Zhè shì Lǔxùn de mòjì。
This is Lu Xun\'s calligraphy.
协议墨迹未干，他们就把它撕毁了。
Xiéyì mòjì wèi gān，tāmen jiù bǎ tā sīhuǐ le。
They tore up the agreement before the ink was hardly dry.
衣服上的这块墨迹洗不掉。
Yīfu shàng de zhèkuài mòjì xǐ budiào。
I can\'t get rid of this ink stain on my coat. or This ink stain didn\'t wash out.
袖子上面有墨迹。
Xiùzi shàngmiàn yǒu mòjì。
There are ink stains on the sleeve.
古时候，受了墨刑的人一辈子也洗不掉脸上那犯罪的“痕迹”。
Gǔshíhou，shòu le mòxíng de rén yíbèizi yě xǐbúdiào liǎnshàng nà fànzuì de“hénjì”。
In ancient times, people were punished by having their faces tattooed.
墨迹斑斑
墨迹犹新。
老师的墨迹。
The ink has dried.
Mòjì gān le。
墨迹干了。
indelible ink
笔迹难擦掉的墨水
She is going to Melbourne and will see him then.
她打算去墨尔本，然后在那儿见他。
A bad accident in a Stock Car race in Melbourne, Australia. The car does 14 flips and leaves the guy practically untouched!
澳大利亚墨尔本举行的改装车比赛，发生了一起严重事故。一辆车翻了14圈，但是车手却毫发无损！

既挥洒自如，又不失绳墨。参见&quot;墨斗&quot;。

His Chinese landscape paintings by brush are wonderful artistic works.
我们激动的心情难以用笔墨来形容
Wǒmen jīdòng de xīnqíng nányǐ yòng bǐmò lái xíngróng。
Words can hardly describe how excited we were.
把无关紧要的话删去，不要浪费笔墨。
Bǎ wúguānjǐnyào de huà shānqù，búyào làngfèi bǐmò。
To save space, leave out superfluous words and sentences.
笔墨酣畅
bǐmò hānchànɡ
write with ease and verve
操笔墨生涯
cāobǐmò shēngyá
write for a living
笔墨不能形容其万一。
Bǐmò bùnéng xíngróng qí wànyī。
It simply beggars description.
写评论文章要三思，免得惹上笔墨官司。
Xiě pínglùn wénzhāng yào sānsī，miǎndé rěshàng bǐmò guānsī。
One has to be careful when writing critical articles, otherwise you can easily get involved in paper arguments.
写文章忌浪费笔墨。
Xiěwénzhāng jì làngfèibǐmò。
When writing an essay you should not waste words.
笔墨酣畅
bǐmòhānchàng
free-flowing writing
用粉笔把墨水吸干
yòngfěnbǐ bǎ mòshuǐ xīgān 
blot ink with a piece of chalk
笔墨纸砚。
这场笔墨官司是由他挑起的。
笔、墨、纸、砚合称文房四宝。
难以用笔墨形容。
吃官司◇笔墨官司
举笔舐墨。
in pencil/ink
用铅笔/墨水笔
to write with ease

writing materials
(纸张笔墨等)文具，文房四宝
Her beauty beggars description.
她的美貌难以用笔墨来形容。
Her dress beggars description.
Tā de dǎban fēi bǐmò suǒ néng miáoshù。
她的打扮非笔墨所能描述。
The flawless performance beggared description.
Wánměi wúxiá de biǎoyǎn fēi bǐmò suǒ néng xíngróng。
完美无暇的表演非笔墨所能形容。
This beggars description!

yánmò

zhūmòběn

zhuómò bùduō 
sketchily described or painted

yóumò

遗墨
yímò

xiōngwúdiǎnmò

mòlì

zhuómò

我袖子上的墨水斑痕洗不掉了。
Wǒ xiùzi shàng de mòshuǐ bānhén xǐ búdiào le。
The ink mark on my sleeve cannot be washed off.

One has to be careful when writing critical articles, otherwise you can easily get involved in paper arguments.
波斯菊又名秋英，原产于墨西哥。
Bōsījú yòumíng qiūyīng,yuánchǎn yú Mòxīgē.
Calliopsis is also named as “qiuying”, and originally grew in Mexico.
《荷塘香远》是一幅巨型彩墨画。
《Hétángxiāngyuǎn》 shì yìfú jùxíng cǎimòhuà。
“The fragrance of the lotus pond” is a large ink and color painting.
我家中厅垂挂着一副启功先生的墨宝。
Wǒjiā zhōng tīng chuíguà zhe yífù Qǐgōng xiānshēng de mòbǎo。
A piece of calligraphy written by Mr. Qigong is hanging in the hall of our house.
在刺目的阳光下，很多人戴着墨镜。
Zài cìmù de yángguāng xià，hěnduōrén dài zhe mòjìng。
Many people were wearing sunglasses under the dazzling sunlight.
他通常使用徽墨来绘画，这样的画十分逼真。
Tā tōngcháng shǐyòng huīmò lái huìhuà，zhèyàng de huà shífēn bīzhēn。
He usually paints with Huizhou ink, which makes the paintings look very real.
由于和流氓混久了，他也变得流里流气的，真是近朱者赤，近墨者黑。
Yóuyú hé liúmáng hùn jiǔ le，tā yě biàn de liúlǐ liúqì de，zhēnshì jìnzhūzhě chì，jìnmòzhě hēi。
Hanging around with gangsters, he became a gangster. He who stays near ink gets stained black.
这部小说我在落墨前酝酿了很久。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō wǒ zài luòmò qián yùnniàng le hěnjiǔ。
The book had been in the making for a long time before being put on paper.
这些煤烟子是制造墨汁的主要原料。
Zhèxiē méiyānzi shì zhìzào mòzhī de zhǔyào yuánliào。
Coal soot is the main material used to produce ink.
为了防止沙子迷眼，我戴上了一副墨镜。
Wèile fángzhǐ shāzi míyǎn，wǒ dàishàng le yífù mòjìng。

她的花园里种了很多墨菊。
Tā de huāyuán lǐ zhòng le hěnduō mòjú。

由于和流氓混久了，他也变得流里流气的，真是近朱者赤，近墨者黑。

水流过凸起的路中央流到道路另一边的排水沟里。
人生路上沟沟坎坎是正常的，要摆正心态，乐观面对。
Rénshēng lùshàng gōugōukǎnkǎn shì zhèngcháng de，yào bǎizhèng xīntài，lèguān miànduì。
It is normal to have various obstacles during one\'s life and people should have a positive and optimistic attitude towards them.
生活就是过一个沟坎又一个沟坎。
Shēnghuó jiùshì guò yígè gōukǎn yòu yígè gōukǎn。
Life is like passing one ditch after another.
肮脏的阴沟
āngzāng de yīngōu 
a filthy sewer
他使劲一蹦就过了沟。
Tā shǐjìn yí bèng jiù guò le gōu。

gōuhè zònghéng

Guòqù zhèlǐ shì huāngliáng de qióngshāngōu。

The arm was then repaired using skin from the groin area.
Ránhòu yòng fùgǔgōu chù de pífū duì shǒubì jìnxíngle xiūfù。
然后用腹股沟处的皮肤对手臂进行了修复。
He was hurt in the groin quick.
Tā shāng zài fùgǔgōu de ròushàng。
他伤在腹股沟的肉上。
Every attempt should be made to anticipate this generation gap.
Yīnggāi qiānfāngbǎijì de yùqī dào huì chǎnshēng zhèyàng de dàigōu。
应该千方百计地预期到会产生这样的代沟。
The changes stemmed largely from the generation gap.
Zhèxiē biànhuà hěn dà chéngdù shàng láiyuán yú dàigōu。
这些变化很大程度上来源于代沟。
The generation gap here was too wide.
Zhèli de dàigōu tài kuān le。
这里的代沟太宽了。
To bridge that gap we practically have to pull to pieces everything contemporary science has to say about the orders of nature.

为了弥合那个鸿沟，我们实际上不得不严厉批评当代科学对于自然界秩序的任何言论。
他眼珠一转悠就想出个主意。
Tā yǎnzhū yí zhuànyou jiù xiǎngchū gè zhǔyi。

历史悠久
lìshǐ yōujiǔ 
have a long history
悠久的文化
yōujiǔ de wénhuà 
a civilization (or culture) of long standing
悠然神往
yōurán shénwǎnɡ 
one\'s thoughts turn to things distant
悠闲自在
yōuxián zìzài 
leisurely and carefree
悠扬的歌声
yōuyáng de gēshēng
melodious singing
悠扬的小提琴声
yōuyáng de xiǎotíqínshēng
mellifluous notes flowing from the violin
有几艘小艇在湖面上悠游。
Yǒu jǐ sōu xiǎotǐngzài húmiàn shàngyōuyóu。
There were a few yachts sailing leisurely on the lake.
悠游自在
yōuyóu zìzài 
leisurely and carefree
悠远的往事
yōuyuǎn de wǎngshì 
events of the distant past
山川悠远
shānchuān yōuyuǎn 
moun-tains and rivers far, far away
悠着点劲，别太猛了。
Yōu zhe diǎn jìn，bié tài měng le。
Take it easy (or Easy)! Don\'t go at it so hard.
琴韵悠扬。
Qínyùn yōuyánɡ。
Sweet music was being played on the lute.
悠扬的小提琴声把我吸引住了。
Yōuyáng de xiǎotíqínshēngbǎ wǒ xīyǐn zhù le。
The beautiful notes of a violin held me spellbound.
他眼珠一转悠就想出个主意。
Tā yǎnzhū yí zhuànyou jiù xiǎngchū gè zhǔyi。
He rolled his eyes and hit upon an idea.
星期天我上街转悠了一下。
Xīngqītiān wǒ shàngjiē zhuànyou le yíxià。
I strolled around the streets on Sunday.
悠久
yōujiǔ
long; long-standing; age-old
悠闲
yōuxián
leisurely and carefree
我独自在家里度过了一个悠长的白日。
Wǒ dúzì zài jiā lǐ dùguò le yígè yōucháng de báirì。
I spent a whole day at home by myself.
一片苍绿的草原上，有几只山羊在悠闲地吃着草。
Yí piàn cānglǜ de cǎoyuán shàng，yǒu jǐ zhī shānyáng zài yōuxián de chī zhe cǎo。
Some goats are casually eating grass on a green prairie.
小船在水面上荡悠着，不知驶向何处。
Xiǎochuán zài shuǐmiàn shàng dàngyōu zhe，bùzhī shǐ xiàng héchù。
The boat is swaying on the water in no certain direction.
他在走廊里不停的荡悠，满怀心事。
Tā zài zǒuláng lǐ bùtíng de dàngyōu，mǎnhuái xīnshì。
Full of thoughts, he lingers in the corridor.
我们去欧洲参观了几座历史悠久的道院。
Wǒmen qù Ōuzhōu cānguān le jǐ zuò lìshǐ yōujiǔ de dàoyuàn。
We visited some old, historical abbeys in Europe.
天边有几丝淡淡的风烟，正悠闲地飘散。
Tiānbiān yǒu jǐ sī dàndàn de fēngyān，zhèng yōuxián de piāosǎn。
Waves of mist drift slowly on the horizon.
洛阳是座历史悠久的古城。
Luòyáng shì zuò lìshǐ yōujiǔ de gǔchéng。
Luoyang is an old city with a long history.
这是一处清朝的圹穴，历史悠久。
Zhè shì yíchù Qīngcháo de kuàngxué，lìshǐ yōujiǔ。
This is a Qing dynasty grave with a time-honored history.
这首慢调悠扬婉转，使人陶醉其中。
Zhèshǒu màndiào yōuyáng wǎnzhuǎn，shǐ rén táozuì qí zhōng。
This slow melody is melodious and sweet, and makes people enchanted.
陶渊明作品的诗境都很悠远，这和他的生活环境与处世心态有关。
Táo Yuānmíng zuòpǐn de shījìng dōu hěnyōuyuǎn，zhè hé tā de shēnghuó huánjìng yǔ chǔshì xīntài yǒuguān。
The artistic conception of Tao Yuanming\'s poems are very remote in time and space, which is related to his living environment and his attitude towards life.
一只大闸蟹在水中悠然自得地吐着泡泡。
Yì zhī dàzháxiè zài shuǐ zhōng yōurán zìdé dì tǔ zhe pàopào。
A hairy crab is leisurely making bubbles in the water.
5000年悠久的历史是中国人民的骄傲。
Wǔqiānnián yōujiǔ de lìshǐ shì zhōngguórénmín de jiāo\'ào.
Their 5, 000 years of history is the pride of the Chinese people.
他在乡下过着悠然的日子。
Tā zài xiāngxia guòzhe yōurán de rìzi。
He lives a carefree life in the country.

jīliè de zhēngchǎo

All our conversations became wrestling bouts.
Wǒmen suǒyǒu de duìhuà zuìhòu dōu biànchéngle yì chǎng zhēngchǎo
我们所有的对话最后都变成了一场争吵
My parents argued over their spending habits.
Wǒ de fùmǔ zài tāmen de zhīchū xíguàn shàng fāshēngle zhēngchǎo。
我的父母在他们的支出习惯上发生了争吵。
They used to have fierce husband and wife domestic arguments.
Tāmen fūqī guòqù jīngcháng huì yǒu jīliè de jiātíng zhēngchǎo。
他们夫妻过去经常会有激烈的家庭争吵。
They do not simply murmur against him, they quarrel noisily with him.
Tāmen bù zhǐ duì tā gūgū-nóngnóng，érqiě hái hé tā dàshēng zhēngchǎo。
他们不只对他咕咕哝哝，而且还和他大声争吵。
The young couple continued with their argument throughout the meal.
Zhè duì niánqīng fūfù chīfàn shí háizài jìxù zhēngchǎo。
这对年轻夫妇吃饭时还在继续争吵。
They argued about which one was to be used.
Tāmen wèi nǎ yí gè shì yòngguò de ér zhēngchǎo。
他们为哪一个是用过的而争吵。
Somebody should knock your heads together to solve this problem.
Yǒu rén yīnggāi yòng wǔlì zhìzhǐ zhēngchǎo， yǐbiàn jiějué wèntí。
有人应该用武力制止争吵，以便解决问题。
The things I said to her during the argument was beyond recall.
Zài zhēngchǎo shí wǒ duì tā shuō de huà yǐjīng wúkěwǎnhuí le。
在争吵时我对她说的话已经无可挽回了。
Lots of marriages are busting up.
Hěn duō hūnyīn dōu yīn zhēngchǎo ér pòliè。
很多婚姻都因争吵而破裂。
The couple upstairs lead a cat and dog life, and I always hear them quarrelling.
Lóu shàng de zhè duì fūqī guòzhe zhēngchǎo-bùxiū de shēnghuó， wǒ jīngcháng tīngjiàn tāmen zài chǎojià。
楼上的这对夫妻过着争吵不休的生活，我经常听见他们在吵架。
They contend about trifles.
Tāmen yīn suǒshì ér zhēngchǎo。
他们因琐事而争吵。
The meeting quickly degenerated into an argument.
Huìyì hěn kuài biànchéngle zhēngchǎo。
会议很快变成了争吵。
The knights exchanged words with each other in a low tone.
Qíshìmen dīshēng zhēngchǎo qǐlái。
骑士们低声争吵起来。
I want to protect Francis in case they fall out.
Wànyī tāmen zhēngchǎo，wǒ xiǎng bǎohù Fúlǎngxīsī。
万一他们争吵，我想保护弗朗西斯。
Fighting about parenting is only going to make the situation worse.

和父母争吵只会让事情变得更糟。
After the argument, she decided not to have traffic with the family.
Zhēngchǎo zhīhòu， tā juédìng búzài hé jiālǐ láiwǎng。
争吵之后，她决定不再和家里来往。
His wife always has the final word in their arguments.
Měi cì tāmen zhēngchǎo shí，dōushì tā lǎopo zuìhòu pāibǎndìngduó。
每次他们争吵时，都是他老婆最后拍板定夺。
She\'s gone in to have words with him.
Tā cānyù dào le hé tā de zhēngchǎo zhīzhōng。

Tā shìzhe lěngjìng xiàlái， bìmiǎn zhēngchǎo。

Her constant bickering was getting in the way.

她不停的争吵声造成了不便。
The teacher made no attempt to intervene in this argument.

老师不准备调停此次争吵。
At that point, Len involved himself in the argument.

He heard two men arguing，but with water lapping in his ears he couldn\'t make out the words.

Certainly you did not quarrel with them all the time.

你当然不会一直和他们争吵。

父母和我争吵，而不是我跟他们吵。

他躺在床上还没有咽气儿，他们就开始为他的财产争吵起来。
大吵大闹
dàchǎodànào 
kick up a row; make a scene
为了这么件小事，值得大吵大闹吗？
Wèile zhème jiàn xiǎoshì，zhídé dàchǎo dànào ma？
Is such a trivial thing worth all the trouble.
这家伙又犯浑了，为一点小事跟街坊大吵大闹。
不就几块钱吗，何苦大吵大闹呢？
to make a scene
[inf] 大吵大闹
She made a great to-do about his forgetting her birthday.
他把她的生日给忘了, 她大吵大闹了一场.
A Russian journalist kicked up a row.
Yí wèi Éluósī jìzhě dàchǎodànào。
一位俄罗斯记者大吵大闹。
她从来不跟别人吵嘴。
Tā cónglái bùgēn biérén chǎozuǐ。
She has never quarrelled with anybody.
你们都冷静一些，不要吵嘴了
小两口刚吵了嘴，背对背坐在桌子两边正生气呢！
从没吵过嘴
你这一嚷不要紧，把大家都吵醒了。
Nǐ zhè yì rǎngbúyàojǐn，bǎ dàjiā dōu chǎoxǐng le。
You may think it\'s all right for you to shout, but you\'ve woken everybody up.
瞧，孩子被你们吵醒了。
Qiáo，háizi bèi nǐmen chǎoxǐng le。
Look! You\'ve woken the child.
午夜时分，一阵琴声吵醒了我。
Wǔyè shífēn，yí zhèn qínshēng chǎoxǐng le wǒ。
I was woken by the sound of a stringed instrument at midnight.
嘘！别吵醒了他。
Xu！Bié chǎoxǐngle tā。
Sh! Don\'t wake him!
瞧你这喊呀，把人都吵醒了。
铃声把我从睡梦中吵醒。
When you come in from the party, please try not to wake the whole house!
你从外面的聚会回来时，能不能别那么大动静，把全家人都吵醒了！
The noise woke the whole house.
那个声音吵醒了全家。
Someone called my house and woke me up.
Yǒu rén gěi wǒjiā dǎdiànhuà，bǎ wǒ chǎoxǐng le。
有人给我家打电话，把我吵醒了。
The dog woke up the entire neighborhood with its barking.

那只狗的叫声吵醒了整个街坊。
The alarm fetched to the sleeping baby.
Jǐngbào chǎoxǐng le shuìmèng zhōng de háizi。
警报吵醒了睡梦中的孩子。
The rooster, who had been awakened by the noise, cried down from the roof.
Bèi zàoyīn chǎoxǐng de gōngjī cóng wūdǐng tiàole xiàlái。
被噪音吵醒的公鸡从屋顶跳了下来。
The sound awakened them.
Yǒuxiē shēngxiǎng jiāng tāmen chǎoxǐng le。
有些声响将他们吵醒了。
The explosion of the firecrackers awoke the children.
Biānpàoshēng chǎoxǐngle háizǐmen。
鞭炮声吵醒了孩子们。

The awakened baby began to cry.
Bèi chǎoxǐng de háizi kāishǐ kūtí。
被吵醒的孩子开始哭啼。
The boy made a noise to wake his mother up.

你一定能够合理解释你听到的各种奇怪的声音；房子里没有吵闹鬼。
Obstreperously, he demanded to get service.
Tā chǎonàozhe yāoqiú biérén wèi tā fúwù。
他吵闹着要求别人为他服务。
The students have been carrying on all day.
学生们乱吵乱闹了一天。
to make a scene
[inf] 大吵大闹
She made a great to-do about his forgetting her birthday.
他把她的生日给忘了, 她大吵大闹了一场.
A Russian journalist kicked up a row.
Yí wèi Éluósī jìzhě dàchǎodànào。
一位俄罗斯记者大吵大闹。
两口子成天吵架，闹得左邻右舍不得安宁。
Liǎngkǒuzi chéngtiān chǎojià，nào de zuǒlínyòushè bùdé ānníng。
The couple are always bickering. They give their neighbours no peace.
我跟他吵架了。
Wǒ gēn tā chǎojià le。
I had a quarrel with him.
他们吵架了，你去劝解一下。
Tāmen chǎojià le，nǐ qù quànjiě yíxià。
They\'ve had a quarrel. You try and patch things up between them.
他在找茬儿吵架。
Tā zài zhǎochár chǎojià。
He\'s trying to find some excuse and start a quarrel.
我俩冰炭不容，怎么可能不吵架呢。
Wǒ liǎ bīngtàn bùróng，zěnme kěnéng bùchǎojià ne。
We are like fire and ice, how can we not fight each other ?
他们夫妻二人感情笃深，从来不吵架。
Tāmen fūqī èr rén gǎnqíng dǔshēn，cónglái bùchǎojià。
The man and his wife have always been deeply in love and have never had a single fight in their life together.
夫妻吵架，请不要恶语相加，多伤感情啊。
Fūqī chǎojià，qǐng búyào èyǔ xiāngjiā，duō shāng gǎnqíng a。
It is really hurtful when a couple hurl abuse at each other in a quarrel.
别人一吵架，他总要充当和事佬这一角色。
Biérén yì chǎojià，tā zǒngyào chōngdāng héshìlǎo zhèyì juésè。
He will be a peacemaker whenever a quarrel happens.
他俩的性格都很绵善，所以很少吵架。
Tā liǎ de xìnggé dōu hěnmiánshàn，suǒyǐ hěnshǎo chǎojià。
The two are mild and gentle, so they seldom quarrel.
朋友之间吵架属于内部矛盾，你又何必较真呢？
Péngyou zhījiān chǎojià shǔyú nèibùmáodùn，nǐ yòu hébì jiàozhēn ne？
Quarreling between friends is just an internal contradiction, why do you take it so seriously?
这个人蔫不唧的，怎么会骂人吵架呢？
Zhègerén niānbùjī de，zěnme huì màrén chǎojià ne？
He is sluggish, how can he have called people names and quarreled with them?
大年下的，有什么话好好说，可别吵架生气啊！
Dàniánxià de，yǒu shénme huà hǎohǎo shuō，kě bié chǎojià shēngqì a！
It is the time of the New Year, let’s speak fine words and not quarrel and lose our tempers.
吵架
chǎojià
quarrel
他满脸不高兴，想必和老婆吵架了。
Tā mǎnliǎn bù gāoxìng，xiǎngbì hé lǎopó chǎojià le。
He looked totally miserable – presumably he had had an argument with his wife.
他们吵过架，现在和好了。
Tāmen chǎo guò jià，xiànzài héhǎo le。
They had a quarrel but have made it up now.
他们吵了一架，散伙了。
Tāmen chǎo le yí jià，sànhuǒ le。
They quarrelled and broke up.
吵架吵红眼了。
吵架。
吵架后，他们还绷着劲呢。
有问题好商量，何必吵架
从没吵过架
从来没跟人吵过架
吵了一架
他们虽然吵了一架，但没结仇。
They\'re always arguing, I can\'t stand them anymore.
他们总是吵架，我再也受不了他们了。
They never argued in front of their children.
他们从来不在孩子面前吵架。
to have a row
吵架
I had no quarrel with you but if you want to fight, let\'s go outside.
我没理由和你吵架。但如果你想动手，我们就去外面。
The couple quarreled in the middle of the supermarket.
这对夫妻在超市里吵架。
I always rowed with my sister when I was young.
小的时候我总和姐姐吵架。
John got messed up in the brawl.
约翰吵架时被打了。
The parents stopped fighting in behalf of the child.
Wèile háizi，fùmǔ tíngzhǐle chǎojià。
为了孩子，父母停止了吵架。
He was a furtive, underhand being, with a chip on his shoulder.
Tā shì yí gè guǐguǐ-suìsuì，qīzhà，ài chǎojià de rén。
他是一个鬼鬼祟祟，欺诈，爱吵架的人。
The couple upstairs lead a cat and dog life, and I always hear them quarrelling.
Lóu shàng de zhè duì fūqī guòzhe zhēngchǎo-bùxiū de shēnghuó， wǒ jīngcháng tīngjiàn tāmen zài chǎojià。
楼上的这对夫妻过着争吵不休的生活，我经常听见他们在吵架。
We had never wanted to pick a fight with anybody.
Wǒmen cóng bù xiǎng hé rènhé rén chǎojià。
我们从不想和任何人吵架。
They had a quarrel.
Tāmen chǎojià le。
他们吵架了。
Siblings are always fighting.
Xiōngmèimen zǒngshì chǎojià。
兄妹们总是吵架。
These two fellows are always scrapping over something.
Zhè liǎng gè jiāhuo lǎoshì wèi xiē shénme shì chǎojià。
这两个家伙老是为些什么事吵架。
She was the instigator of their quarrel.
Tā shāndòng tāmen chǎojià。
她煽动他们吵架。
The uncongenial roommates were always fighting.
Zhèxiē zhìqù bù xiāngtóu de shìyǒu jīngcháng chǎojià。
这些志趣不相投的室友经常吵架。
a belligerent gesture or tone
摆出交战或争吵的架势或腔调
He had a big fight with his dad.
他和他的父亲大吵了一架。
Having had a fight with Ray last week, Tom hesitated to invite him to the birthday party.
汤姆昨晚和雷吵了一架，所以他不愿意邀请雷来他的生日聚会。
The couple downstairs had a flare last night.
Lóuxià de liǎngkǒuzi zuótiān wǎnshàng chǎole yí jià。
楼下的两口子昨天晚上吵了一架。
一个一个说；别吵吵。
Yígè yígè shuō; bié chāochao。
Speak one at a time; don\'t make such a row.
不知道谁在楼道里吵吵嚷嚷。
Bùzhīdào shéi zài lóudào lǐ chǎochǎorǎngrǎng。
I don\'t know who is shouting in the passageway.
屋子里吵吵嚷嚷，秩序混乱。
Wūzi lǐ chǎochǎorǎngrǎng，zhìxù hùnluàn。
The atmosphere in the room is extremely chaotic.
两口子成天吵架，闹得左邻右舍不得安宁。
Liǎngkǒuzi chéngtiān chǎojià，nào de zuǒlínyòushè bùdé ānníng。
The couple are always bickering. They give their neighbours no peace.
那帮小青年吵得邻居们不得安生。
Nà bāng xiǎoqīngnián chǎo de línjūmen bùdé ānshēng。
Those youngsters raised such a ruckus. They gave their neighbours no peace.
你这一嚷不要紧，把大家都吵醒了。
Nǐ zhè yì rǎngbúyàojǐn，bǎ dàjiā dōu chǎoxǐng le。
You may think it\'s all right for you to shout, but you\'ve woken everybody up.
两个人正要争吵，我给岔开了。
Liǎnggèrén zhèng yào zhēngchǎo，wǒ gěi chàkāi le。
A quarrel was starting between the two of them, but I headed it off.
别吵！
bié chǎo！
Don\'t make so much noise!
瞧，孩子被你们吵醒了。
Qiáo，háizi bèi nǐmen chǎoxǐng le。
Look! You\'ve woken the child.
别吵他。
Bié chǎo tā。
Don\'t disturb him.
不要为一点小事就吵起来。
Búyào wèi yìdiǎn xiǎoshì jiù chǎoqǐlái。

我不跟他吵。
Wǒ bùgēn tā chǎo。
I will not quarrel with him.
吵翻了天
chǎo fān le tiān 
kick up a terrific row
我跟他吵架了。
Wǒ gēn tā chǎojià le。
I had a quarrel with him.
他们俩各不相让，吵闹不休。
Tāmen liǎ gè bùxiāng ràng，chǎonào bùxiū。

这孩子吵闹得我整整一上午不得安宁。

The child has been harassing me all morning.
院子里一片吵闹声。
Yuànzi lǐ yípiàn chǎonàoshēng。
A hubbub was heard in the courtyard.
她从来不跟别人吵嘴。
Tā cónglái bùgēn biérén chǎozuǐ。
She has never quarrelled with anybody.
大吵大闹
dàchǎodànào 
kick up a row; make a scene
他们由于分赃不均而争吵。
Tāmen yóuyú fēnzāng bùjūn ér zhēngchǎo。
They quarrelled over the spoils.
他们吵过架，现在和好了。
Tāmen chǎo guò jià，xiànzài héhǎo le。
They had a quarrel but have made it up now.
你何苦为这点鸡毛蒜皮的事跟他吵呢？

争吵得很激烈
zhēngchǎo de hěn jīliè 
quarrel bitterly
这样瞎吵下去不会有什么结果。
Zhèyàngxiā chǎo xiàqù bú huì yǒu shénme jiéguǒ。
Squabbling like this won\'t get you anywhere.
别吵了，让人家看笑话。
Bié chǎo le，ràng rénjia kàn xiàohua。
Stop squab-bling, will you? People will laugh at us.
他们说戗了，吵起来啦。
Tāmen shuōqiāng le，chǎo qǐlái la。

他们吵架了，你去劝解一下。
Tāmen chǎojià le，nǐ qù quànjiě yíxià。
They\'ve had a quarrel. You try and patch things up between them.
两人争吵了半天，谁也不肯让步。

The two of them quarrelled for a long time; neither was willing to give in.
他们吵了一架，散伙了。
Tāmen chǎo le yí jià，sànhuǒ le。

无谓的争吵
wúwèi de zhēngchǎo 
a pointless quarrel
嫌孩子吵
xián háizi chǎo
think the children too noisy
有一个让着点，也吵不起来。一个巴掌拍不响。
Yǒu yígè ràng zhe diǎn，yě chǎo bùqǐlái，yígè bāzhangpāi bu xiǎng。

Tā zài zhǎochár chǎojià。

激烈的争吵
jīliè de zhēngchǎo 
fierce (or bitter) wrangling
争吵不休
zhēngchǎobùxiū 
bicker (or squabble) endlessly
我俩冰炭不容，怎么可能不吵架呢。
Wǒ liǎ bīngtàn bùróng，zěnme kěnéng bùchǎojià ne。
We are like fire and ice, how can we not fight each other ?

今天他终于和老伴吵翻了。

不知道门外的两个人为什么吵骂起来了。

I don\'t know why the two people outside the door are quarreling.
隔壁音响声音很大，吵扰了老人的休息。

把收音机的音量开小点，太吵人了！

Turn down the radio, it\'s too loud.
为了这么件小事，值得大吵大闹吗？
Wèile zhème jiàn xiǎoshì，zhídé dàchǎo dànào ma？
Is such a trivial thing worth all the trouble.
两个人吵了几句后就开始动手动脚了。

他们夫妻二人感情笃深，从来不吵架。

夫妻吵架，请不要恶语相加，多伤感情啊。

为了这件事情，我们都快吵翻天了。

We had a violent quarrel over this issue
别人一吵架，他总要充当和事佬这一角色。

He will be a peacemaker whenever a quarrel happens.
他喜欢吃猴头菌炒肉片，每次回家都吵着要吃。

He likes meat stir-fried with monkey-head-shaped mushrooms.  Every time he goes home, he will ask for it.
晚上，街上卡车的呼隆声吵得我们没法睡觉。
Wǎnshàng，jiēshàng kǎchē de hūlóngshēng chǎo de wǒmen méifǎ shuìjiào。
At night, the rumble of the trucks on the street made us unable to fall asleep.
他尽自睡着，也不管外面吵闹的声音。

He sleeps regardless of the noise outside.
他俩的性格都很绵善，所以很少吵架。

The two are mild and gentle, so they seldom quarrel.

They are locked together in a fierce quarrel over a trivial matter.
朋友之间吵架属于内部矛盾，你又何必较真呢？

After a quarrel with his friend, he left in a towering rage.

Wǔyè shífēn，yí zhèn qínshēng chǎoxǐng le wǒ。
I was woken by the sound of a stringed instrument at midnight.
不要吵了！远处隐隐约约有弦歌传来！

This unhappy couple has been quarreling for several years and has finally split up.
城里太吵，不如住在郊区。
Chénglǐ tàichǎo，bùrú zhùzài jiāoqū。
The city is too noisy – it\'s better living in the suburbs.
吵架
chǎojià
quarrel
我们不该介入他们夫妻间的争吵。
Wǒmen bù gāi jièrù tāmen fūqījiān de zhēngchǎo.
We really shouldn\'t intervene in their marital strife.
夫妻俩争吵之后彻底决裂了。

夫妇俩的争吵平息下来了。
Fūfùliǎ de zhēngchǎo píngxīxiàláile。
The couple\'s argument petered out.

Tā xián zhèr chǎo，bānzǒule。
He found it too noisy here and moved away.
他满脸不高兴，想必和老婆吵架了。

He looked totally miserable – presumably he had had an argument with his wife.

要不是他有涵养，刚才非吵起来不可。
不就几块钱吗，何苦大吵大闹呢？
吵闹声渐次停息。

你看他越吵越来劲了！
两人居然破脸，吵了起来。
两人吵到后来竟动起了拳脚。

孩子们之间总是吵来吵去的。

父母和我争吵，而不是我跟他们吵。

他吵吵闹闹，不停地抱怨着。

你们不要互相争吵了。

摆出交战或争吵的架势或腔调
a disposition to quarrel
好争吵

跟某人争吵
to have a row

to have a running battle with sb
和某人不断争吵
to make a scene
[inf] 大吵大闹
to tear sb to pieces
[fig] 与某人激烈争吵

吵/哭{等}是没用的

Jiārù biérén de zhēngchǎo zhī zhōng jì bù détǐ yě bù míngzhì。
加入别人的争吵之中既不得体也不明智。
The quarrel ended in a punch-up.
Nà chǎng zhēngchǎo zuìhòu fāzhǎn dào quánjiǎo-xiāngjiā。
那场争吵最后发展到拳脚相加。
The debate turned into thoughtless bickering.
Zhēnglùn biànchéngle bù jiā kǎolǜ de zhēngchǎo。
争论变成了不加考虑的争吵。
Let us have no part in profitless quarrels.
Wǒmen bú yào juǎnrù háowúyìyì de zhēngchǎo zhīzhōng。
我们不要卷入毫无意义的争吵之中。
She was the instigator of their quarrel.
Tā shāndòng tāmen chǎojià。
她煽动他们吵架。
They were sparring all night.
Tāmen zhěnggè wǎnshang dōu zài zhēngchǎo。
他们整个晚上都在争吵。
You can rationalize away all the strange noises you hear--there is no poltergeist in the house!
Nǐ yídìng nénggòu hélǐ jiěshì nǐ tīngdào de gèzhǒng qíguài de shēngyīn；fángzi lǐ méiyǒu chǎonàoguǐ。

The uncongenial roommates were always fighting.

这些志趣不相投的室友经常吵架。
The awakened baby began to cry.
Bèi chǎoxǐng de háizi kāishǐ kūtí。
被吵醒的孩子开始哭啼。
But wroth as he was，a short struggle ended in reconciliation.
Suīrán tā hěn qìfèn，dàn yí zhèn duǎnzàn de zhēngchǎo zhīhòu zhōngguī héjiě。

The discussion devolved into a shouting match.
Zhècì tǎolùn yǎnbiàn chéng le yì chǎng xuānxiāo de zhēngchǎo。
这次讨论演变成了一场喧嚣的争吵。
Obstreperously, he demanded to get service.
Tā chǎonàozhe yāoqiú biérén wèi tā fúwù。
他吵闹着要求别人为他服务。

他躺在床上还没有咽气儿，他们就开始为他的财产争吵起来。

The atmosphere in the room is extremely chaotic.
楼下吵吵嚷嚷，像是出了什么事。
别吵吵，好好听人说

The boy made a noise to wake his mother up.

When the relative humidity reaches 100 per cent the air is saturated.

他受到了尖锐的批评。
他们之间的关系尖锐化了，两人变得水火不相容。
Tāmen zhījiān de guānxì jiānruìhuà le，liǎng rén biàn de shuǐhuǒ bùxiāngróng。
The tension between them has intensified and it seems they cannot live with each other\'s presence.
矛盾尖锐化。
尖锐的对比
jiānruì de duìbǐ 
a sharp contrast
尖锐的批评
jiānruì de pīpíng

Bùnéng mòshì qúnzhòng de yìjiàn。
The masses\' opinions must not be treated with indifference.
漠视。
你怎能漠视大家的意见呢？
She was deeply wounded by his disregards.
他的漠视深深伤害了她。
Education is imposed in disregard of the pattern of life for the rural poor.
Jiàoyù shì shíshī zài mòshì qióngkùn nóngcūn shēnghuó fāngshì shàng de。
教育是实施在漠视穷困农村生活方式上的。
Danger notices had been put up and largely disregarded.
Wēixiǎn jǐnggào yǐjīng bèi tiēchū，dàn hěn dà chéngdù shàng bèi mòshì le。
危险警告已经被贴出，但很大程度上被漠视了。
The death penalty brutalises society and breeds contempt for human life.
Sǐxíng xiàng shèhuì xuānyáng bàolì，xuānyáng duì shēngmìng de mòshì。
死刑向社会宣扬暴力，宣扬对生命的漠视。
Boys from a deprived environment, wherein the family life revealed a pattern of neglect, moral degradation, and disregard for law.
Láizì pínqióng huánjìng de háizi，tāmen shēnshàng xiǎnshì chū mòbùguānxīn、 dàodé duòluò hé mòshì fǎlǜ de jiātíng shēnghuó móshì。
来自贫穷环境的孩子，他们身上显示出漠不关心、道德堕落和漠视法律的家庭生活模式。
He is flagrantly disregarding the law.
Tā hànrán mòshì fǎlǜ。
他悍然漠视法律。
对于世俗名利，他总是漠然置之，不放在心上。
Duìyú shìsú mínglì，tā zǒngshì mòrán zhìzhī，bú fàngzài xīnshàng。
He is indifferent to fame and gain, and never cares about them.
漠然置之。
这个作家对批评意见处之漠然。
Zhège zuòjiā duì pīpíngyìjiàn chǔzhīmòrán。
The writer was indifferent to criticism.
对于世俗名利，他总是漠然置之，不放在心上。
Duìyú shìsú mínglì，tā zǒngshì mòrán zhìzhī，bú fàngzài xīnshàng。
He is indifferent to fame and gain, and never cares about them.
他们人多，虽然在沙漠中行进，也不感到枯寂。
Tāmen rén duō，suīrán zài shāmò zhōng xíngjìn，yě bùgǎndào kūjì。
They travelled in a large group, so they didn\'t feel bored or lonely while passing through the desert.
驼铃声突然在大漠深处响起。
Tuólíngshēng tūrán zài dàmò shēnchù xiǎngqǐ。
Bells tied to camels are jingling in the depth of the desert.
漠然置之。
Despite his efforts she remained cold to his advances.
Jǐnguǎn tā xiǎngjìn bànfǎ，tā réngrán duì tā de qiú\'ài mòrányǐduì。
尽管他想尽办法，她仍然对他的求爱漠然以对。
The convicted killer listened unblinkingly to the reading of his sentence.
Zhège bèi dìngzuìle de shāshǒu mòrán de tīngzhe duì tā de pànjué。
这个被定罪了的杀手漠然地听着对他的判决。
She shrugged indifferently.
Tā mòrán de sǒnglesǒng jiān。
她漠然地耸了耸肩。
The local gentry and professional classes had held aloof for the school had accepted their sons readily enough.
Yīnwèi xuéxiào fēicháng lèyì de jiēshōule tāmen de háizi，suǒyǐ dāngdì de guìzú hé zhíyè jiēcéng dōu bǎochízhe lěngmò chāorán de tàidù。
因为学校非常乐意地接收了他们的孩子，所以当地的贵族和职业阶层都保持着冷漠超然的态度。
He is flagrantly disregarding the law.
Tā hànrán mòshì fǎlǜ。
他悍然漠视法律。
The unaccommodating bus driver pulled out when she was banging on the door.
那个冷漠的公共汽车司机突然发动了车，她就重重地撞在了门上。
荒漠的河滩。
The subsistence security standards of other cities are all below 200 yuan, of which Huhhot, Mohe and Yinchuan are the lowest at 143 yuan.
其它城市最低生活保障标准均在200元以下，其中标准最低的是呼和浩特、漠河和银川三市，标准均为143元。
官长必须爱护士兵，不能漠不关心。
Guān zhǎngbìxū àihù shìbīng，bú néngmòbùguānxīn。
Officers must cherish their men and must not be indifferent to their well-being.
漠不关心
Boys from a deprived environment, wherein the family life revealed a pattern of neglect, moral degradation, and disregard for law.
Láizì pínqióng huánjìng de háizi，tāmen shēnshàng xiǎnshì chū mòbùguānxīn、 dàodé duòluò hé mòshì fǎlǜ de jiātíng shēnghuó móshì。
来自贫穷环境的孩子，他们身上显示出漠不关心、道德堕落和漠视法律的家庭生活模式。
affecting casual unconcern
装作漠不关心的样子
The attendants who took charge of the plane seemed indifferent to us.
Fēijī shàng de fúwùyuán sìhū duì wǒmen mòbùguānxīn。
飞机上的服务员似乎对我们漠不关心。
The children were doing their best to display casual indifference to the event.
Háizǐmen zhèngzài jiéjìnsuǒnéng biǎoxiàn chū duì zhè jiàn shì mòbùguānxīn de yàngzi。
孩子们正在竭尽所能表现出对这件事漠不关心的样子。
The neighbors kept their distance from the burning house down the street.
Línjūmen duì jiē biān zháohuǒ de fángzi mòbùguānxīn。
邻居们对街边着火的房子漠不关心。
She assumed indifference, even though she was seething with anger.
Jíshǐ tā fēicháng qìfèn，tā háishì jiǎzhuāng mòbùguānxīn。
即使她非常气愤，她还是假装漠不关心。
He charged the director with indifference.
Tā zhǐzé zhǔguǎn mòbùguānxīn。
他指责主管漠不关心。
War was breaking out in Europe, but she unconcernedly planned for a holiday.
Ōuzhōu bàofāle zhànzhēng，dàn tā réng mòbùguānxīn de jìhuàzhe dùjià。
欧洲爆发了战争，但她仍漠不关心地计划着度假。
湖面升起一层漠漠的烟雾。
Húmiàn shēngqǐ yì céngmòmò de yānwù。
A thick mist rose over the lake.
黄沙漠漠
Huáng shā mòmò
a vast stretch of yellow sand
把荒漠变为绿色的原野
bǎ huāngmò biànwéi lǜsè de yuányě 
turn the wilderness into green fields
这件事在我脑子里已很淡漠了。
Zhèjiànshì zài wǒ nǎozi lǐ yǐ hěn dànmò le。
The event has left only faint memories in my mind.
沙漠(森林)地带
shāmò（sēnlín）dìdài 
a desert (forest) region
在广漠的沙滩上
zài guǎngmò de shātān shàng
on the bare expanse of the beach
浩瀚的沙漠
hàohàn de shāmò
a vast expanse of desert
荒漠的草原
huāngmò de cǎoyuán 
desolate and boundless grasslands
号召向沙漠进军
hàozhào xiàng shāmò jìnjūn
a call to conquer the desert
他们人多，虽然在沙漠中行进，也不感到枯寂。
Tāmen rén duō，suīrán zài shāmò zhōng xíngjìn，yě bùgǎndào kūjì。
They travelled in a large group, so they didn\'t feel bored or lonely while passing through the desert.
冷漠的态度
lěngmò de tàidu 
an indifferent attitude
他对人向来冷漠。
Tā duì rén xiànɡlái lěnɡmò。 
He is always unconcerned about others.
官长必须爱护士兵，不能漠不关心。
Guān zhǎngbìxū àihù shìbīng，bú néngmòbùguānxīn。

在沙漠地区常常可以看到一些奇特的景象。
Zài shāmò dìqū chángchángkěyǐ kàndào yìxiē qítè de jǐng xiàng。
In desert areas one often sees strange mirages.
变沙漠为良田
biàn shāmò wéi liángtián 
turn the desert into arable land
无边无际的沙漠
wúbiānwújì de shāmò 
a vast expanse of desert
这个城市处于沙漠南缘。
Zhège chéngshì chǔyú shāmò nányuán。
This city is located on the southern fringe of the desert.

yuèguò gēbì shāmò
cross the Gobi Desert

Shāmò de fēngshā chuī de tā pífū zàoliè。
His skin became chapped from the desert wind.
沙漠
shāmò
desert
冷漠
lěngmò
cold and detached; unconcerned; indifferent
过度的放牧使该地区被覆遭到破坏，土地开始荒漠化。
Guòdù de fàngmù shǐ gāi dìqū bèifù zāodào pòhuài，tǔdì kāishǐ huāngmòhuà。
Over-grazing has damaged the vegetation cover of this area, and the land is beginning to show signs of desertification.
地质学家对塔克拉玛干沙漠进行了察勘。
Dìzhì xuéjiā duì Tǎkèlāmǎgānshāmò jìnxíng le chákān。
Geologists carried out a survey of the Takla Makan Desert.
驼铃声突然在大漠深处响起。
Tuólíngshēng tūrán zài dàmò shēnchù xiǎngqǐ。
Bells tied to camels are jingling in the depth of the desert.
广袤的沙漠空无一人。
Guǎngmào de shāmò kōngwú yì rén。
There is no-one in the vast desert.
俗话说“靠山吃山，靠水吃水”，于是他就想出了靠沙吃沙的点子，开发出了沙漠探险的特色旅游项目。
Súhuà shuō“kàoshān chīshān，kàoshuǐ chīshuǐ”，yúshì tā jiù xiǎngchū le kàoshā chīshā de diǎnzi，kāifā chū le shāmò tànxiǎn de tèsè lǚyóu xiàng mù。
As a popular saying goes: &quot;Those living on a mountain live off the mountain, those living near the water live off the water.&quot; Therefore he had the idea of making use of the sand and developed a special tourism item of desert exploration.
他的这幅画很有意思：空漠的荒原上只有一串人的脚印。
Tā de zhèfúhuà hěnyǒu yìsi：kōngmò de huāngyuán shàng zhǐyǒu yíchuàn rén de jiǎoyìn。
His painting is very interesting: an empty desert with a string of footprints.
他面色黧黑，大概是在沙漠里呆久了。
Tā miànsè líhēi，dàgài shì zài shāmò lǐ dāi jiǔ le。
His complexion is dark and yellow. Perhaps that is because he has stayed in desert too long.
漠北的荒原上很少有树木和草。
Mòběi de huāngyuán shàng hěnshǎo yǒu shùmù hé cǎo。

He is indifferent to fame and gain, and never cares about them.
这是明成祖第五次亲征漠北了。

It is the fifth time that the Emperor Mingcheng has personally led a military expedition.

Tuóyùn céng zài shāmò dìqū bèi guǎngfàn shǐyòng。
Transferring goods by animals was once popular in the desert.
在沙漠里建水库，这根本是无本之木，无稽之谈！
Zài shāmò lǐ jiàn shuǐkù，zhè gēnběn shì wúběnzhīmù，wújīzhītán！
It is groundless to build a reservoir in the desert.
塔克拉马干大沙漠是个人烟希少的地方。
Tǎkèlāmǎgān dà shāmò shì gè rényān xīshǎo de dìfāng。
The Taklamakan Desert is a deserted place with a sparce population.
沙漠中的植物群落少之又少。
Shāmò zhōng de zhíwù qúnluò shǎozhī yòushǎo。
There are few plant communities in the desert.
装甲兵开着坦克，在沙漠上奔驰。
Zhuāngjiǎbīng kāi zhe tǎnkè，zài shāmò shàng bēnchí。
The armoured troops are driving a tank and speeding through the desert.

We must promote the development of culture, and avoid the occurance of a cultural desert.
沙漠不断扩大。
Shāmò búduàn kuòdà。
The desert is expanding all the time.

她外表的冷漠没有骗到我。

I saw a vague outline of a building in the desert but the guide told me it was a mirage.
我在沙漠中看到一个模糊的大楼轮廓，但导游告诉我那是海市蜃楼。

沙漠夜晚的凉风把他给冻感冒了。

John is a brittle, isolated man, left to raise two children.
Yuēhàn shì yígè lěngmò、gūdú de nánrén，tā yí gè rén fǔyǎngzhe liǎng gè háizi。
约翰是一个冷漠、孤独的男人，他一个人抚养着两个孩子。
The attendants who took charge of the plane seemed indifferent to us.
Fēijī shàng de fúwùyuán sìhū duì wǒmen mòbùguānxīn。
飞机上的服务员似乎对我们漠不关心。
The children were doing their best to display casual indifference to the event.
Háizǐmen zhèngzài jiéjìnsuǒnéng biǎoxiàn chū duì zhè jiàn shì mòbùguānxīn de yàngzi。
孩子们正在竭尽所能表现出对这件事漠不关心的样子。
Cheat grass can grow anywhere from deserts to mountain tops.
Quèmàicǎo dàochù kěyǐ shēngzhǎng，wúlùn shì shāmò háishì shāndǐng。
雀麦草到处可以生长，无论是沙漠还是山顶。
Despite his efforts she remained cold to his advances.
Jǐnguǎn tā xiǎngjìn bànfǎ，tā réngrán duì tā de qiú\'ài mòrányǐduì。
尽管他想尽办法，她仍然对他的求爱漠然以对。
This is desert country, so plan how much water you have carefully.
Zhè shì yí gè shāmò dìqū，suǒyǐ zǐxì jìhuà yíxià nǐ yǒu duōshǎo shuǐ bā。
这是一个沙漠地区，所以仔细计划一下你有多少水吧。
We need to make plans to prevent the creep of desert into what was pasture land.
Wǒmen xūyào zhìdìng jìhuà，fángzhǐ shāmò yánshēn zhì céngjīng shì mùchǎng de dìfang。
我们需要制定计划，防止沙漠延伸至曾经是牧场的地方。
Plants that grow in deserts are resistant to water loss.
Shēngzhǎngzài shāmò de zhíwù néng chéngshòu quēshuǐ de huánjìng。
生长在沙漠的植物能承受缺水的环境。
It was a lovely picture that evoked all the empty loneliness of the desert.
Zhè zhāng shēngdòng de zhàopiàn néng shǐ rén liánxiǎng dào shāmò zhōng suǒyǒu de kōngxū hé jìmò。
这张生动的照片能使人联想到沙漠中所有的空虚和寂寞。
The sun set and a swollen orange moon rose slowly above the desert.
Rìluò hòu，yì lún chéngsè de yuányuè rǎnrǎn shēng qǐ zài shāmò shàngkōng。
日落后，一轮橙色的圆月冉冉升起在沙漠上空。
Set is an ancient god, who was originally the god of the desert.
Shětè shì gǔshíhòu de yí wèi láizì shāmò de shénlíng。
舍特是古时候的一位来自沙漠的神灵。
His kisses left her largely indifferent and unresponsive.
Jīběnshàng，duì yú tā de wěn，tā shì lěngmò qiě wúdòngyúzhōng de。
基本上，对于他的吻，她是冷漠且无动于衷的。
How do plants survive in the hot dry desert?
Zhíwù rúhé zài yòu rè yòu gàn de Shāmò zhōng shēngcún xiàlái？
植物如何在又热又干的沙漠中生存下来？
The criminals were deported to the desert region.
Zuìfànmen bèi fàngzhú dào shāmò dìdài。
罪犯们被放逐到沙漠地带。
His coldness won\'t eat out my heart anymore.
Tā de lěngmò zài yě búhuì ràng wǒ xīnrúdāogē le。
他的冷漠再也不会让我心如刀割了。
All the touring caravans in Britain were put end to end.
Suǒyǒu Yīngguó de shāmò lǚxíng duì dōu shǒuwěixiānglián。
所有英国的沙漠旅行队都首尾相连。
It was lying high and dry away in the desert.
Tā wèi yú dàmò wú shuǐ de dìfang。
它位于大漠无水的地方。
The neighbors kept their distance from the burning house down the street.
Línjūmen duì jiē biān zháohuǒ de fángzi mòbùguānxīn。
邻居们对街边着火的房子漠不关心。
The middle week was reserved for our desert adventure.
Nàgè zhōngjiān de xīngqī bèi yùliú xiàlái jìnxíng shāmò tànxiǎn。
那个中间的星期被预留下来进行沙漠探险。
Like a dream, the mist rolled across the desert.
Xiàng mèng yíyàng，míwù zài shāmò lǐ fānténg。
像梦一样，迷雾在沙漠里翻腾。
With the indifferent attitude of the local sheriff，the victims must take the law into their own hands.
Miànduì dìfang sīfǎzhǎngguān lěngmò de tàidù，shòuhàirén bùdébù cǎiqǔ sīliǎo de fāngfǎ。
面对地方司法长官冷漠的态度，受害人不得不采取私了的方法。
Her indifference to his amorous advances really steamed the young man.
Tā duì tā rèqíng qiú\'ài lěngmò de tàidù díquè ràng zhège niánqīngrén gǎndào wōhuǒ。
她对他热情求爱冷漠的态度的确让这个年轻人感到窝火。
The army maintains a missile range in the desert.
Nà zhī bùduì bǎowèizhe shāmò zhòng de yí gè dǎodàn fāshèchǎng。
那支部队保卫着沙漠中的一个导弹发射场。
Water is the critical deficiency in desert regions.
Zài shāmò dìqū shuǐ shì jíwéi kuìfá de。
在沙漠地区水是极为匮乏的。
The tribes like to hawk in the desert.
Zhèxiē bùluò xǐhuan zài shāmò zhōng dàiyīng dǎliè。
这些部落喜欢在沙漠中带鹰打猎。
The coyotes were howling in the desert.
Xiǎo láng zài shāmò zhōng háojiào。
小狼在沙漠中嚎叫。
St. Anthony was tempted in the desert.
Shèng\'āndōngní zài shāmò lǐ màoxiǎn。
圣安东尼在沙漠里冒险。
The trackless wastes of the desert.
Shāmò zhè bùmáozhīdì。

他们赶着骡子进入沙漠。

即使她非常气愤，她还是假装漠不关心。
He charged the director with indifference.
Tā zhǐzé zhǔguǎn mòbùguānxīn。
他指责主管漠不关心。

The Nubian desert seemed to stretch out before them endlessly.

The local gentry and professional classes had held aloof for the school had accepted their sons readily enough.

朝鲜的沙尘暴现象是中国快速沙漠化的结果。
One unfortunately sees historic features carelessly lost when estates fall into unsympathetic hands.
Yídàn lìshǐ yíchǎn luòrù lěngmòwúqíng zhī rén shǒuzhōng，rénmen biàn huì búxìng de kàndào jùyǒu lìshǐ yìyì de dōngxi bèi suíyì mǒshā le。
一旦历史遗产落入冷漠无情之人手中，人们便会不幸地看到具有历史意义的东西被随意抹杀了。
War was breaking out in Europe, but she unconcernedly planned for a holiday.
Ōuzhōu bàofāle zhànzhēng，dàn tā réng mòbùguānxīn de jìhuàzhe dùjià。
欧洲爆发了战争，但她仍漠不关心地计划着度假。
The judge listened to the accused unsympathetically.
Fǎguān lěngmò de tīng bèigào chénshù。
法官冷漠地听被告陈述。
The convicted killer listened unblinkingly to the reading of his sentence.
Zhège bèi dìngzuìle de shāshǒu mòrán de tīngzhe duì tā de pànjué。
这个被定罪了的杀手漠然地听着对他的判决。
He was taken aback by such inhospitality.
Tā bèi cǐ zhǒng lěngmò xià le yí tiào。
他被此种冷漠下了一跳。
The desert was edged with sere vegetation.
Shāmò zhōuwéi língxīng de zhǎngzhe yìxiē gānkū de zhíbèi。
沙漠周围零星地长着一些干枯的植被。
He treated his patients impersonally.
Tā duì tā de bìngrén hěn lěngmò。
他对他的病人很冷漠。
In the desert, you get dehydrated very quickly.
Zài shāmò zhōng，nǐ hěn kuài jiù huì tuōshuǐ。
在沙漠中，你很快就会脱水。
&quot;I see,&quot; he commented wryly.
“Wǒ zhīdào，”tā biǎoqíng lěngmò de shuō。
“我知道，”他表情冷漠地说。
Never matures as a dimensional character; he is pasty, bland, faceless.
Tā cóng méiyǒu chéngzhǎng wéi yí gè xìnggé jiànquán de rén；tā liǎnsè cāngbái，lěngmò ér méiyǒu biǎoqíng。
他从没有成长为一个性格健全的人；他脸色苍白，冷漠而没有表情。

Rúhuǒ de jiāoyáng kǎo liè le shāmò zhōng de shādì。
如火的骄阳烤裂了沙漠中的沙地。

Tā mòrán de sǒnglesǒng jiān。
她漠然地耸了耸肩。
He submitted impassively to his arrest.
Tā lěngmò de fàngqì dǐkàng，fúcóngle dàibǔ。
他冷漠地放弃抵抗，服从了逮捕。
She behaves apathetically these days.
Tā zhèxiē tiān biǎoxiàn de hěn dànmò。
她这些天表现的很淡漠。
She may be detached or even unfeeling but at least she\'s not hypocritically effusive.
Tā huòxǔ shì lěngmò de，shènzhì shì wúqíng de，dàn zhìshǎo tā méiyǒu xūwěi de guòfèn rèqíng。
她或许是冷漠的，甚至是无情的，但至少她没有虚伪地过分热情。
He was lukewarmly received by his relatives.
Tā shòudào qīnqi de lěngmò jiēdài。
他受到亲戚的冷漠接待。
He is flagrantly disregarding the law.
Tā hànrán mòshì fǎlǜ。
他悍然漠视法律。
He remained impassive，showing neither interest in nor concern for our plight.
Tā yījiù lěngmò，duì wǒmen de kùnnan jì méiyǒu biǎoxiàn chū xìngqù yě méiyǒu biǎoxiàn chū guānxīn。
他依旧冷漠，对我们的困难既没有表现出兴趣也没有表现出关心。
A prissy and emotionless creature...settles into a mold of desiccated snobbery.
Jǐnshèn、lěngmò de kuǐlěi……Yí gè múzǐ dào chūlái de、chénmèn wú qù de shìlì。
谨慎、冷漠的傀儡……一个模子倒出来的、沉闷无趣的势利。
Standoffishly, he declined the invitation to the office party.
Tā hěn lěngmò de jùjuéle cānjiā bàngōngshì jùhuì de yāoqǐng。
他很冷漠地拒绝了参加办公室聚会的邀请。
He was arrogant and occasionally callous.
Tā hěn àomàn，yǒushí yě hěn lěngmò。
他很傲慢，有时也很冷漠。
He was upstage with strangers.
Tā duì mòshēngrén hěn lěngmò，àidābùlǐ de。
他对陌生人很冷漠，爱搭不理的。
冷漠的态度
lěngmò de tàidu 
an indifferent attitude
他对人向来冷漠。
Tā duì rén xiànɡlái lěnɡmò。 
He is always unconcerned about others.
冷漠
lěngmò
cold and detached; unconcerned; indifferent
冷漠
冷漠
他的冷漠刺痛了妻子的心。
冷漠寡情。
神情冷漠。
a cold personality
冷漠的性格
a dead handshake
冷漠的握手
remote and cold in his manner
他的态度冷漠

把荒漠变为绿色的原野
bǎ huāngmò biànwéi lǜsè de yuányě 
turn the wilderness into green fields
荒漠的草原
huāngmò de cǎoyuán 
desolate and boundless grasslands

戈壁荒漠
荒漠上看不到一个人影。
荒漠的河滩。
荒寂的大漠。
广漠的荒野
Flora of clay desert is similar to that of detritus desert.
粘土荒漠上的植物和碎石荒漠上的植物相似。
The Arctic Desert is one of the most deserted landscapes on the Earth.
北极荒漠是地球上最荒凉的景观之一。
The lonely old man in the movie lived in an emotional desert.
电影中那个孤独的老人生活在情感的荒漠中。
This garden looks more like a desert.
这个花园更像是个荒漠。
With the newly built concert hall this town will never be called a cultural desert again.
有了这座新落成的音乐厅，这座城市再也不会被称作文化荒漠了。
在广漠的沙滩上
zài guǎngmò de shātān shàng
on the bare expanse of the beach
广袤的沙漠空无一人。
Guǎngmào de shāmò kōngwú yì rén。
There is no-one in the vast desert.
驮运曾在沙漠地区被广泛使用。
Tuóyùn céng zài shāmò dìqū bèi guǎngfàn shǐyòng。

广漠的荒野
这件事在我脑子里已很淡漠了。
Zhèjiànshì zài wǒ nǎozi lǐ yǐ hěn dànmò le。
The event has left only faint memories in my mind.
淡漠
淡漠
态度很淡漠

She behaves apathetically these days.
Tā zhèxiē tiān biǎoxiàn de hěn dànmò。
她这些天表现的很淡漠。

Tǎkèlāmǎgān dà shāmò shì gè rényān xīshǎo de dìfāng。
The Taklamakan Desert is a deserted place with a sparce population.
他面色黧黑，大概是在沙漠里呆久了。
Tā miànsè líhēi，dàgài shì zài shāmò lǐ dāi jiǔ le。
His complexion is dark and yellow. Perhaps that is because he has stayed in desert too long.
沙漠不断扩大。
Shāmò búduàn kuòdà。
The desert is expanding all the time.
大量的石油储藏在这片沙漠中。
Dàliàngde shíyóu chǔcángzài zhèpiàn shāmòzhōng。
Large reserves of oil are contained in this desert.
The Sahara Desert is the world\'s largest desert.
撒哈拉大沙漠是世界第一大沙漠。

Sorting out fragment pieces is difficult work that requires us patience.
我们每日都是被这些丛脞之事纠缠着。
Wǒmen měi rì dōushì bèi zhèxiē cóngcuǒ zhī shì jiūchán zhe。
We are troubled by these trivial things all the time.
这套丛刻有很大的文学价值和收藏价值。
Zhètào cóngkè yǒu hěndà de wénxué jiàzhí hé shōucáng jiàzhí。
This published series is rich in literary value and worth collecting.
小心丛莽中有草蛇出没。
Xiǎoxīn cóngmǎng zhōng yǒu cǎoshé chūmò。
Be careful. There are always snakes in thick grass.
丛密的森林里常有野兽出没。
Cóngmì de sēnlín lǐ chángyǒu yěshòu chūmò。
There are always wild animals living in thick forests.
这里丛山环绕，很容易迷路。
Zhèlǐ cóngshān huánrào，hěnróngyì mílù。
This group of mountains surround each other so that it is quite easy to get lost here.
现在文化丛谈类的电视节目越来越多。
Xiànzài wénhuà cóngtán lèi de diànshì jiémù yuèláiyuè duō。
There are more and more programs like cultural discussions on TV now.
当年牺牲的战士就被丛葬在此。
Dāngnián xīshēng de zhànshì jiù bèi cóngzàng zài cǐ。
All the dead soldiers of that year are buried here together.
每当经过那片丛葬，他就有点害怕。
Měi dāng jīngguò nà piàn cóngzàng，tā jiù yǒu diǎn hàipà。
Every time he passes that mass of graves, he feels a little bit scared.
这片丛冢也不知是什么年代的。
Zhè piàn cóngzhǒng yě bùzhī shì shénme niándài de。
No one knows what period this mass of unkempt grave mounds belongs to.
谁也说不清楚这个丛冢到底埋了多少具尸体。
Shéi yě shuō bùqīngchu zhège cóngzhǒng dàodǐ mái le duōshǎo jù shītǐ。
No one can tell exactly how many people are buried in this group of graves.
狮子蹲伏在草丛里，耐心等待着捕猎时机。
Shīzi dūnfú zài cǎocóng lǐ，nàixīn děngdài zhe bǔliè shíjī。
Squatting down in the thick grass, the lion waited patiently for a hunt.
院子里蒿草丛生，好像长时间没有人住了。

Overgrown with wormwood, it seems that the yard has been neglected for a long time.

The pheasants chirped in the bush.

Jīntiān shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī zài cǎocóng lǐ dǎidào yìzhī kētóuchóng，tā zhēn de zài lǎoshī de shǒulǐ kētóu sì de dòng ne！
In today\'s biology class, teacher caught a snapping beetle and it seemed that it was really kowtowing in the teacher\'s palm.
老虎一般是单独在林丛里出没的。

The tiger usually appears in the jungle singly.
我买了一本《建筑文化论丛》，内容不错。

In autumn, crickets begin to sing in the grass.

Squatting down in the thick grass, the lion waited patiently for a hunt.
院子里蒿草丛生，好像长时间没有人住了。

Overgrown with wormwood, it seems that the yard has been neglected for a long time.
草丛中传来野鸡啾唧的声音。
Cǎocóng zhōng chuánlái yějī jiūjī de shēngyīn。
The pheasants chirped in the bush.

In today\'s biology class, teacher caught a snapping beetle and it seemed that it was really kowtowing in the teacher\'s palm.
秋天的草丛里，蛐蛐们又开始鸣奏它们的音乐了。
Qiūtiān de cǎocóng lǐ，qūqūmen yòu kāishǐ míngzòu tāmen de yīnyuè le。
In autumn, crickets begin to sing in the grass.
一对恋人正偎傍在草丛中，不知在说些什么。
Yí duì liànrén zhèng wēibàngzài cǎocóng zhōng，bùzhī zài shuō xiē shénme。
A couple of lovers are snuggling up together in the grass, I don\'t know what they are talking about.
我在那片树棵子里找到了一丛野草莓！
Wǒ zài nà piàn shùkēzi lǐ zhǎodào le yì cóng yěcǎoméi！
I found a bush of wild strawberries in those woods!
小心丛莽中有草蛇出没。
Xiǎoxīn cóngmǎng zhōng yǒu cǎoshé chūmò。

波士顿大学的最新研究显示，虽然使用会员卡会让商家能追踪到消费者的购物习惯，但还是有高达86%的成年人持有并使用某家商店的会员卡。

菲姬无论到哪儿都被侦探跟踪。
He followed Mrs Smith and spied on her.
Tā gēnzōng bìngqiě ànzhōng jiānshìzhe Shǐmìsī fūrén。
他跟踪并且暗中监视着史密斯夫人。
A cat stalks a duck until it gets within striking distance.
Yì zhī māo gēnzōngzhe yì zhī yāzi，zhídào kàojìn dào tā néng zhuō dào yāzi de jùlí。
一只猫跟踪着一只鸭子，直到靠近到它能捉到鸭子的距离。
A man stalked her on the way to the interview.
Zài tā qù cǎifǎng de lùshàng，yǒu yì míng nánzǐ gēnzōng tā。
在她去采访的路上，有一名男子跟踪她。
I don\'t know who it was, but I know we were being tailed.
Wǒ bùzhīdào nàgè rén shì shuí，dànshì wǒ zhīdào wǒmen bèi gēnzōng le。
我不知道那个人是谁，但是我知道我们被跟踪了。
I hunted down the woman who stole my baby.
Wǒ zhuīzōng dào le zhège tōule wǒ háizi de nǚrén。
我追踪到了这个偷了我孩子的女人。
Two great paintings are on the list of missing masterpieces.
Liǎng fú mínghuà dōu zài shīzōng míngzuò de míngdān zhōng。
两幅名画都在失踪名作的名单中。
The flight of migrant birds were being tracked by the scientists.

There was a lot of gossip in the office about his disappearance.

It\'s an off chance, but I have to try to find my missing bother.

We have to bear to the right if we are to locate the missing group.

xíngzōngbúdìng

行踪
Xíngzōng
track

tracks

牲畜
shēngchù
livestock; domestic animals
一个牲口不够，再加个帮套吧。
Yígè shēngkǒu búgòu，zài jiā gè bāngtào ba。
One beast of burden is not enough to pull the cart. Get another one.

Dōngjì shì shēngchù bǎobiāo de guānjiàn shíjié。
Winter is the best season for livestock to put on weight.
刘胡兰牺牲得非常惨烈。
Liú Húlán xīshēng de fēicháng cǎnliè。
Liu Hulan died tragically and heroically.
对于这次任务中牺牲的同志，我们惟有长歌当哭。
Duìyú zhècì rènwù zhōng xīshēng de tóngzhì，wǒmen wéiyǒu chánggē dāngkū。
We can only convey our grief in writing for those comrades who have sacrificed themselves.
我要根据牲畜的数量来决定储青的多少。
Wǒ yào gēnjù shēngchù de shùliàng lái juédìng chǔqīng de duōshǎo。
I must determine how much succulence to be stored in accordance with the quantity of the livestock.
畜栏要结实，防止牲畜跑出去。
Chùlán yào jiēshi，fángzhǐ shēngchù pǎo chūqù。
The fence must be firm enough to prevent livestock from rushing out.
他连畜牲都不如，连自己的父母都不养活。

敏捷的回答
This child isn\'t as quick as others, but he is very diligent.
这孩子不像其他孩子那样反应敏捷，但却十分勤奋。
Many smokers feel more alert and focused after smoking.
很多吸烟者觉得吸烟后思维更敏捷更集中。
I can not catch the squirrel with winged acts.
我抓不到这只行动敏捷的松树。
She retained the passion and quickness of a wunderkind.
她仍保持着神童的激情与敏捷。
The mouse ran alert across the floor.
Lǎoshǔ mǐnjié de cóng dìbǎn shàng pǎo guò。
老鼠敏捷地从地板上跑过。
His reactions are quick and his learning capacity excellent.
Tā fǎnyìng mǐnjié，xuéxí nénglì qiáng。
他反应敏捷，学习能力强。
He\'s a quick nimble defender.
Tā shì yì míng mǐnjié línghuó de hòuwèi。
他是一名敏捷灵活的后卫。
The computer is fast on the draw
Diànnǎo sīwéi mǐnjié。
电脑思维敏捷。
He is able to act quickly and intelligently，so there are no flies on him.
Tā xíngdòng mǐnjié ér cōngmíng，bú huì shàngdàngshòupiàn。
他行动敏捷而聪明，不会上当受骗。
The nanny acted quickly by grabbing the toddler and covering him with a wet towel.
Bǎomǔ dòngzuò mǐnjié，yìbǎ zhuāzhù pánshānxuébù de háizi，bìng yòng yí kuài shīmáojīn bǎ tā gàishàng。
保姆动作敏捷，一把抓住蹒跚学步的孩子，并用一块湿毛巾把他盖上。
Although dull at classical learning，at mathematics he was uncommonly quick.
Suīrán duì gǔdiǎn zhīshi de xuéxí yǒuxiē chídùn，dàn duì shùxué，tā què hǎnjiàn de mǐnjié。
虽然对古典知识的学习有些迟钝，但对数学，他却罕见地敏捷。
He\'s as sharp as a steel trap.
Tā de tóunǎo fǎnyìng jiùxiàng bǔshòujiā yíyàng de mǐnjié。
他的头脑反应就像捕兽夹一样的敏捷。
The smartness of the pace soon exhausted him.
Mǐnjié de bùfá hěnkuài jiù ràng tā jīngpí-lìjié。
敏捷的步伐很快就让他精疲力竭。
快捷的步伐
kuàijié de bùfá
quick steps
信息传递快捷准确
xìnxī chuándì kuàijié zhǔnquè
speedy and accurate transmission of information
电购生活用品，快捷方便。
Diàngòu shēnghuó yòngpǐn，kuàijié fāngbiàn。
It is convenient to buy daily necessities by telephone.
国际互联网使身处异国的人们交流起来变得快捷。
Guójì hùliánwǎng shǐ shēnchǔ yìguó de rénmen jiāoliú qǐlái biàn de kuàijié。
The internet makes communication easier, and faster for people in different nations.
火车可谓是重载交通工具中最为快捷的一种。
Huǒchē kěwèi shì zhòngzǎi jiāotōng gōngjù zhōng zuìwéi kuàijié de yìzhǒng。
Trains may be called the fastest and most convenient transportation tools for heavy loads.
用计算机进行信息处理为我们带来了方便和快捷。
Yòng jìsuànjī jìnxíng xìnxī chǔlǐ wèi wǒmen dàilái le fāngbiàn hé kuàijié。
Using computers for information processing makes our lives more convenient.
这孩子不仅聪敏而且反应快，是个捷才。
Zhè háizi bùjǐn cōngmǐn érqiě fǎnyìng kuài，shì gè jiécái。
This child is intelligent and swift.
运输快捷。
下笔快捷。
她为人爽快，说话也很简捷。
Nowadays, news can easily be flashed around the world .
现如今，新闻咨讯可以快捷地传遍全球。
The panel shall ensure that the administrative proceeding takes place with due expedition.
陪审团应该保证行政诉讼能够快捷地进行。
We spent long evenings poring over the map for the fastest route.
Wèile zuì kuàijié de lùxiàn，wǒmen yánjiū dìtú huāfèile hǎo jǐ gè màncháng de yèwǎn。
为了最快捷的路线，我们研究地图花费了好几个漫长的夜晚。
The smartness of the pace soon exhausted him.
Mǐnjié de bùfá hěnkuài jiù ràng tā jīngpí-lìjié。
敏捷的步伐很快就让他精疲力竭。
Reading and communicating are both fast ways to acquire a language.

Late in the day，twenty-yeasr-old Jack got shot in the back.
Zuìhòu ，èr shí suì de Jiékè cóng bèi hòu bèi rén qiāngjī。
最后，二十岁的捷克从背后被人枪击。
The British people are getting sick and tired of lashing out money to build new roads in Czechoslovakia.
Yīngguórén kāishǐ yànfán，búyuàn zài huā dàbǐ qián zài Jiékèsīluòfákè xiūjiàn xīnlù。
英国人开始厌烦，不愿再花大笔钱在捷克斯洛伐克修建新路。
The Czech Republic became a sovereign state in 1993.
Jiékègònghéguó zài 1993 nián chéngwéi yí gè zhǔquán guójiā。
捷克共和国在1993年成为一个主权国家。

走捷径
zǒu jiéjìnɡ 
take a shortcut
攀登科学高峰，既无捷径，又无坦途。
Pāndēng kēxué gāofēng，jì wú jiéjìng，yòu wú tǎntú。
There are neither shortcuts nor easy paths to the heights of science.
捷径
jiéjìng
shortcut
这是去公园的捷径。
Zhè shì qù gōngyuán de jiéjìng.
This is the short cut to the park.
他在工作上总想走捷径。
Tā zài gōngzuò shàng zǒng xiǎng zǒujiéjìng.
He always tries to take short cuts in his work.
捷径
jiéjìng
short cut
捷径
捷径
有条捷径可以直通山顶。
在学习的道路上，没有捷径可走。

互相帮助是成功的捷径。
to cut corners
[fig] 走捷径
Reading and communicating are both fast ways to acquire a language.
看书自学和口语会话都是快速掌握一门语言的捷径。
Sexual intimacy can be deceptive, suggesting a short cut to love and closeness.
Liǎng xìng zhījiān de qīnnì jíjù míhuò xìng，zhè zhǐchūle yì tiáo ài yǔ qīnmì de jiéjìng。
两性之间的亲昵极具迷惑性，这指出了一条爱与亲密的捷径。
He maintains there are no short cuts to managing effectively.
Tā duànyán，yǒuxiào de guǎnlǐ méiyǒu jiéjìng kě zǒu。
他断言，有效的管理没有捷径可走。
There are no short cuts to building a new prosperity.
Chuàngjiàn qiánsuǒwèiyǒu de fánróng shì méiyǒu jiéjìng kě zǒu de。
创建前所未有的繁荣是没有捷径可走的。
The tunnels had now been connected up, and the workmen used the subway constantly as a private short cut.
Suìdào yǐjīng bèi liánjiē qǐlái，gōngrénmen chángcháng shǐyòng dìtiě zuòwéi mìmì jiéjìng。
隧道已经被连接起来，工人们常常使用地铁作为秘密捷径。
He took the short cut through the buildings.
Tā chāo jiéjìng chuānguò dàlóu。
他抄捷径穿过大楼。
They saw independence as the fast track to democracy.
Tāmen bǎ dúlì shìwéi tōngxiàng mínzhǔ de jiéjìng。
他们把独立视为通向民主的捷径。
The company went off the fast track when the stock market dropped.
Nàgè gōngsī zài gǔpiào shìchǎng xiàdiē shí shīqùle chénggōng de jiéjìng。
那个公司在股票市场下跌时失去了成功的捷径。
He took a fast track to the top of the corporate ladder.
Tā zài tōngxiàng gōngsī jiētī dǐngcéng shí zǒule yì tiáo jiéjìng。
他在通向公司阶梯顶层时走了一条捷径。
No silver bullet can make the world safe from terrorism.
Méiyǒu shénme jiéjìng kěyǐ ràng shìjiè miǎnchú kǒngbùzhǔyì de wēixié。
没有什么捷径可以让世界免除恐怖主义的威胁。

他动作敏捷得像只豹子。
Tā dòngzuò mǐnjié de xiàng zhī bàozi。
He is as agile as a leopard.

She has a ready pen, and writes beautifully.

All industries and fields in our country have gone smoothly in the past year.
河南郑州是全国的铁路大动脉，康衢交通非常便捷。

Zhengzhou in Henan province is the main artery of the national train system, with various roads leading to all directions and with very convenient transportation.
他是个爽捷的人，你有事就跟他直说，不用拐弯抹角。
Tā shì gè shuǎngjié de rén，nǐ yǒu shì jiù gēn tā zhíshuō，búyòng guǎiwānmòjiǎo。

全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。

Global warming has caused serious damage to this kind of plant.
这种植物在石子充塞的瘠土里，仍能顽强生长。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù zài shízi chōngsāi de jítǔ lǐ，réng néng wánqiáng shēngzhǎng。
This plant can still grow tenaciously even in stone-filled poor land.
这种植物的叶子尖溜溜的，很容易刺伤手。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù de yèzi jiānliūliū de，hěnróngyì cìshāng shǒu。
The leaves of this plants are pointed, so we are easily hurt by them.
院子里种植了很多剑兰花。
Yuànzi lǐ zhòngzhí le hěnduō jiànlánhuā。
In the courtyard there grow a lot of gladioli.
大殿前那片闶阆的地方，是准备种植牡丹花的。
Dàdiàn qián nà piàn kànglàng de dìfāng，shì zhǔnbèi zhòngzhí mǔdānhuā de。
The open space in front of the audience hall is reserved for planting peonies.
经过多年的努力，我们已经种植了大面积的林网。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，wǒmen yǐjing zhòngzhí le dàmiànjī de línwǎng。
After years of efforts, we have already planted a large area of forest network.
今年我们要在临河一带大面积种植树木。

This year we will plant a large area of trees close to the river.
这种蔬菜适合在露地上种植。

An open vegetable plot is suitable for planting this kind of vegetable.
我的家乡随处可见马兰这种植物。
Wǒ de jiāxiāng suíchù kějiàn mǎlán zhèzhǒng zhíwù。
Chinese small iris is everywhere in my hometown.
他的几十亩葡萄园都种植了玫瑰香，再过一个月就可以采摘了。

我们果园种植的蟠桃每年都畅销海内外呢。

在沙地里种植沙棘，可以起到固沙的作用。

Planting sea buckthorn on sandy soil can solidify sand.

Zhè wèi lǎorén cóngwèi wàngjì gěi tā de zhíwù jiāoshuǐshīféi。
这位老人从未忘记给他的植物浇水施肥。
You can create a dramatic effect when wood is colored with a wood dye.
Gěi mùtou rǎnshàng zhíwù rǎnliào，nǐ jiù kěyǐ chuàngzào chū yǐnrénzhùmù de xiàoguǒ。
给木头染上植物染料，你就可以创造出引人注目的效果。
Some people believe human agency is the efficient factor in\nthe migration of some species of wild plants.
一些人认为人作为媒介是一些野生植物物种迁移的直接原因。
Annual flowering plants are a surprisingly low 7% of the total plant species.
Lìng rén jīngyà de shì yìnián shēng kāihuā zhíwù zài zǒng zhíwù wùzhǒng zhōng zhàn búdào 7%。
令人惊讶的是一年生开花植物在总植物物种中占不到7%。
Early peoples passed on plant and animal lore through legend.
Zǎoqī rénlèi tōngguò chuánshuō chuándì yǒuguān zhíwù hé dòngwù de zhīshi。
早期人类通过传说传递有关植物和动物的知识。
沙漠中的植物群落少之又少。
Shāmò zhōng de zhíwù qúnluò shǎozhī yòushǎo。
There are few plant communities in the desert.
这里有野生动植物形成的原始群落，具有极大的开发价值。
The fundamental unit of the botanic hierarchy is the association.
植物学等级系统中的基本单位是群丛。
那些风中轻飘的飞蓬，是植物界随遇而安的典型。
Nàxiē fēng zhōng qīngpiāo de fēipéng，shì zhíwùjiè suíyù\'ér\'ān de diǎnxíng。
The bitter fleabane in the wind is a typical drifting plant.
动(植，矿)物界
dònɡ(zhí, kuànɡ)wù jiè
the animal (vegetable, mineral) kingdom
植物界
the vegetable kingdom
植物界
Their original remedies were drawn from the mineral, plant and animal kingdoms.
Tāmen yuánxiān de yàopǐn shì cóng kuàngwù、zhíwù、dòngwùjiè zhōng tíqǔchūlái de。
他们原先的药品是从矿物、植物、动物界中提取出来的。
The arboretum is a world treasure trove of botanical resources.
这个植物园是世界植物资源的宝库。
The native flora of Australia is the most varied and diverse in the world.
澳大利亚的本土植物品种是世界上为数最多也最为多样的。
Plants from all continents except Antarctica are present in this botanical garden.
除了南极洲外，世界各大洲的植物均在该植物园中得以展现。
你知道低等植物和高等植物的区别吗？
Nǐ zhīdào dīděng zhíwù hé gāoděng zhíwù de qūbié ma？
Do you know the difference between lower plants and higher plants?
植物保护对于植物的生长尤为重要。
Zhíwù bǎohù duìyú zhíwù de shēngzhǎng yóuwéi zhòngyào。
Plant protection is extremely important for its growth.
经过实验，这种植物不适宜在碱土里种植。
Jīngguò shíyàn，zhèzhǒng zhíwù bú shìyí zài jiǎntǔ lǐ zhòngzhí。
This alkaline soil has been tested and found unsuitable for growing this kind of plant.
我国有354种珍稀植物濒危。
Wǒ guó yǒu sānbǎiwǔshísì zhǒng zhēnxī zhíwù bīnwēi。
In our country 354 species of rare plants are on the brink of extinction (or are dying out).
多倍体植物
duōbèitǐ zhíwù
polyploid plant
多年生植物
duōniánshēng zhíwù
perennial plant
靠种子繁殖的植物
kào zhǒng zi fánzhí de zhíwù
plants which propagate themselves by seeds
腐生植物
fǔshēng zhíwù
saprophyte
植物通过根部汲取养分。
Zhíwù tōngguò gēnbùjíqǔ yǎngfèn。
Plants assimilate nutriment through their roots.
动植物检疫
dònɡzhíwù jiǎnyì 
the quarantine of animals and plants
这种植物禁不住冻。
Zhè zhǒng zhíwù jīnbuzhù dòng。
This plant can\'t stand frost.
有些植物的茎匍匐在地面上。
Yǒuxiē zhíwù de jīngpúfúzàidìmiàn shàng。
Some plants have trailing (or creeping) stems.
这种植物具有强大的生命力。
Zhè zhǒng zhíwù jùyǒu qiángdà de shēngmìnglì。
This kind of plant has great vitality.
权威的植物学家
quánwēi de zhíwùxuéjiā
an authority on botany
食用植物
shíyòng zhíwù
edible plants
食用植物油
shíyòngzhíwùyóu
edible vegetable oil
植物演替
zhíwù yǎntì
succession of plants
野生植物
yěshēnɡ zhíwù
wild plant
一年生植物
yìniánshēnɡ zhíwù 
annual plant; annual

zhíwù yóuzhī 
vegetable fat or oil
栽培野生植物
zāipéi yěshēnɡ zhíwù

植物脂肪
zhíwù zhīfánɡ 
vegetable fat
指向植物
zhǐxiànɡ zhíwù

寻求稀有植物的种源
xúnqiú xīyǒu zhíwù de zhǒng yuán 
look for the origin of rare plants
种子植物
zhǒng zi zhíwù 
seed plant
经济植物
jīngjì zhíwù
economic plants
一些动植物的保护色会随环境的变化而变化。
Yìxiē dòngzhíwù de bǎohùsè huì suí huánjìng de biànhuà ér biànhuà。
The protective color of some plants and animals changes with their surroundings.
贝叶树是西双版纳珍稀植物，一辈子只开花一次。
Bèiyèshù shì Xīshuāngbǎnnà zhēnxī zhíwù，yíbèizi zhǐ kāihuā yícì。
The peepul tree is a rare and precious plant in Xishuangbanna. Such kind of trees blossom only once in their lifetime.
他们正在测试这种植物病毒标样。
Tāmen zhèngzài cèshì zhèzhǒng zhíwù bìngdú biāoyàng。
They are testing the sample of the vegetable virus.
播种后一定要踩墒，这样有助于植物的生长。
Bōzhǒng hòu yídìng yào cǎishāng，zhèyàng yǒuzhùyú zhíwù de shēngzhǎng。
One must tramp down the earth over sown seed, which is good for the plants.
松树是一种常绿植物。
Sōngshù shì yìzhǒng chánglǜ zhíwù。
Pines are evergreen plants.
有的植物初花也是一年中唯一一次开花。
Yǒu de zhíwù chūhuā yěshì yìnián zhōng wéiyī yícì kāihuā。
For some plants their first blooming is also their last.
有的植物初花比较晚，甚至不会开花。
Yǒu de zhíwù chūhuā bǐjiào wǎn，shènzhì búhuì kāihuā。
Some plants are late in their first bloom, or will not bloom at all.
许多植物的传种方式很特别。
Xǔduō zhíwù de chuánzhǒng fāngshì hěntèbié。
Many plants have special propagation methods.
茨菰这种植物虽然能够食用，但在北方很少见到有人吃。
Cígū zhèzhǒng zhíwù suīrán nénggòu shíyòng，dàn zài běifāng hěnshǎo jiàndào yǒurén chī。
Although the vegetable named arrowhead can be eaten, few people from the north actually eat it.
这种植物的地上茎可以食用。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù de dìshàng jìng kěyǐ shíyòng。
The aerial stem of this plant can be eaten.
我在植物园里见过莪蒿。
Wǒ zài zhíwùyuán lǐ jiàn guò éhāo。
I once saw cowherb in a botanical garden.
那些风中轻飘的飞蓬，是植物界随遇而安的典型。
Nàxiē fēng zhōng qīngpiāo de fēipéng，shì zhíwùjiè suíyù\'ér\'ān de diǎnxíng。
The bitter fleabane in the wind is a typical drifting plant.
浮生性植物是蚊虫滋生的温床。
Fúshēngxìng zhíwù shì wénchóng zīshēng de wēnchuáng。
Plants growing on water are the breeding ground for mosquitoes.
果酸存在于植物之中，可入药。
Guǒsuān cúnzài yú zhíwù zhī zhōng，kě rùyào。
Fruit acid existing in foliage can be used as medicine.
红柳是高原上最普通，最常见的一种植物。
Hóngliǔ shì gāoyuán shàng zuì pǔtōng，zuì chángjiàn de yìzhǒng zhíwù。
The Chionese tamarisk is the most common and familiar plant on high plateaus.
花生饼对于植物生长是一种很好的肥料。
Huāshēngbǐng duìyú zhíwù shēngzhǎng shì yìzhǒng hěnhǎo de féiliào。
Caky peanut residue is good fertilizer for plant growth.
他根据这种植物的特征判断出它是黄柏。
Tā gēnjù zhèzhǒng zhíwù de tèzhēng pànduàn chū tā shì huángbǎi。
Judging from its two characteristics he concluded that the plant was yellow cypress.
这种植物只生长在回归带以北，在其他地方很少见。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù zhǐ shēngzhǎng zài huíguīdài yǐ běi，zài qítā dìfāng hěnshǎojiàn。
This type of plant only grows on the north of the tropic. They are quite rare in other places.
全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn zhìshǐ zhèzhǒng zhíwù zāoshòu huǐmièxìng pòhuài。
Global warming has caused serious damage to this kind of plant.
鸡头米可做药用，是一种很稀有的植物。
Jītóumǐ kě zuò yàoyòng，shì yìzhǒng hěnxīyǒu de zhíwù。
Gordon euryale is a rare plant which can be used as a medicine.
这种植物在石子充塞的瘠土里，仍能顽强生长。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù zài shízi chōngsāi de jítǔ lǐ，réng néng wánqiáng shēngzhǎng。
This plant can still grow tenaciously even in stone-filled poor land.
这种植物的叶子尖溜溜的，很容易刺伤手。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù de yèzi jiānliūliū de，hěnróngyì cìshāng shǒu。
The leaves of this plants are pointed, so we are easily hurt by them.
古生物学家发现了距今1亿年的孑遗植物。
Gǔshēngwùxuéjiā fāxiàn le jùjīn yíyìnián de jiéyí zhíwù。
Paleontologists found the living fossils of plants that were one hundred million years old
植物园里有几棵金钱松？
Zhíwùyuán lǐ yǒu jǐ kē jīnqiánsōng？
How many golden larches are there in the arboretum?
生物课上，老师讲到“植物是具有抗逆性的”。
Shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎngdào“zhíwù shì jùyǒu kàngnìxìng de”。
In biology class, the teacher said &quot;plants have resistance.&quot;
热带植物园太好玩了，我们在其中乐而忘返。
Rèdài zhíwùyuán tài hǎowán le，wǒmen zài qí zhōng lè ér wàngfǎn。
How interesting the tropical arboretum is.  We have so much fun there that we are reluctant to leave.
多食用绿色植物对人体有益。
Duō shíyòng lǜsè zhíwù duì réntǐ yǒuyì。
Green plants are healthy for the human body.
超市有出售绿色植物的专柜。
Chāoshì yǒu chūshòu lǜsè zhíwù de zhuānguì。
There is a special counter selling green plants in the supermarket.
这种气候不适合落叶植物的生长。
Zhèzhǒng qìhou bú shìhé luòyè zhíwù de shēngzhǎng。
The climate is not suitable for deciduous vegetation.
我的家乡随处可见马兰这种植物。
Wǒ de jiāxiāng suíchù kějiàn mǎlán zhèzhǒng zhíwù。
Chinese small iris is everywhere in my hometown.
这种蔓生植物，一定会顺着藤架生长。
Zhèzhǒng mànshēng zhíwù，yídìng huì shùn zhe téngjià shēngzhǎng。
The trailing plant  will surely grow along the frame.
城市绿化要以木本植物、高大树木为主。
Chéngshì lǜhuà yào yǐ mùběn zhíwù、gāodà shùmù wéizhǔ。
Woody plant, and tall trees should be the main choice in greening a city.
竹子等许多植物都有着披针形叶子。
Zhúzi děng xǔduō zhíwù dōu yǒu zhe pīzhēnxíng yèzi。
Many plants like bamboo grow lanceolar leaves.
植物园里长满了各种奇花异草。
Zhíwùyuán lǐ zhǎngmǎn le gèzhǒng qíhuā yìcǎo。
The arboretum is full of exotic flowers and rare herbs.
这一带的丘壑峡谷中，生长着许多珍稀植物。
Zhè yídài de qiūhè xiágǔ zhōng，shēngzhǎng zhe xǔduō zhēnxī zhíwù。
Many valuable and rare plants grow in the stretch of canyons in this area.
实验室里正在进行使用人造土栽培植物的实验。
Shíyànshì lǐ zhèngzài jìnxíng shǐyòng rénzàotǔ zāipéi zhíwù de shíyàn。
An experiment of growing plants in artificial soil is being conducted in the laboratory.
这种植物有肉质根茎。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù yǒu ròuzhì gēnjìng。
The plant has a succulent rhizome.
这台仪器可以记录植物体中生物电的变化。
Zhètái yíqì kěyǐ jìlù zhíwùtǐ zhōng shēngwùdiàn de biànhuà。
This instrument can record the changes of bioelectricity in plants.
他的庭院中长满了石松，可他并不知道这种植物能做药材。
Tā de tíngyuàn zhōng zhǎngmǎn le shísōng，kě tā bìng bùzhīdào zhèzhǒng zhíwù néng zuò yàocái。
Staghorn is everywhere in his courtyard, yet he doesn\'t know that this plant can be made into medicine.
这是一种藤本植物，它会沿着墙壁生长的。
Zhè shì yìzhǒng téngběn zhíwù，tā huì yán zhe qiángbì shēngzhǎng de。
It is a vine, it can grow along a wall.
你能从这个桯子观察出植物缺少哪种元素吗？
Nǐ néng cóng zhège tīngzi guānchá chū zhíwù quēshǎo nǎ zhǒng yuánsùma？
Can you see from its flora axis which element the plant is lacking?
这株植物从外观上看应该是通草。
Zhè zhū zhíwù cóng wàiguān shàng kàn yīnggāi shì tōngcǎo。
Judging from its appearance, it must be the pith.
谁知道那种叶子呈线形的植物叫什么？
Shuí zhīdào nàzhǒng yèzi chéng xiànxíng de zhíwù jiào shénme？
Does anyone know the name of the plant with line-shape leaves?
植物园里有好多橡胶树，每年可以出产不少橡胶。
Zhíwùyuán lǐ yǒu hǎoduō xiàngjiāoshù,měi nián kěyǐ chūchǎn bùshǎo xiàngjiāo.
There are many rubber trees in the botanical garden which can produce a lot of rubber every year.
天冷了，玛丽把所有室外的盆栽植物移入室内。
Tiān lěng le，Mǎlì bǎ suǒyǒu shìwài de pénzāi zhíwù yírù shìnèi。
It was cold, Mary moved all the outdoor bonsai into the house.
植物必须应季栽种，否则肯定无法获得丰收。
Zhíwù bìxū yīngjì zāizhòng，fǒuzé kěndìng wúfǎ huòdé fēngshōu。
We should plant in accordance with the season, or else we can\'t have a good harvest.
种植植物必须符合月令，否则不会有收成。
Zhòngzhí zhíwù bìxū fúhé yuèlìng，fǒuzé búhuì yǒu shōuchéng。
Planting must be done in accordance with the lunar month, or else you won\'t harvest anything.
沙漠中的植物群落少之又少。
Shāmò zhōng de zhíwù qúnluò shǎozhī yòushǎo。
There are few plant communities in the desert.
那场车祸使他变成了植物人。
Nà chǎng chēhuò shǐ tā biànchéng le zhíwùrén。
He became a vegetable because of that accident.
海南的植物园可真漂亮。
Hǎinán de zhíwùyuán kě zhēn piàoliàng。
The botanical garden in Hainan is really beautiful.
他的工作是研究这两种植物之间的种差。
Tā de gōngzuò shì yánjiū zhè liǎngzhǒng zhíwù zhījiān de zhǒngchā。
His job is to study the differences in breed between these two plants.
植物学家用种条培养了许多的花。
Zhíwùxuéjiā yòng zhǒng tiáo péiyǎng le xǔduō de huā。
Botanists have cultivated many flowers with the seed branch.
草本植物可分成一年生、二年生和多年生。
Cǎoběn zhíwù kě fēnchéng yìniánshēng、èrniánshēng hé duōniánshēng。
Herbage can be divided into three categories: annuals, biennials, and perennials.
有很多植物都是雌雄同株的。
Yǒu hěnduō zhíwù dōushì cíxióng tóngzhū de。
Many plants are androgynous.
雌雄异株植物的繁殖方式多种多样。
Cíxióng yìzhū zhíwù de fánzhí fāngshì duōzhǒng duōyàng。
There are various reproduction modes for plants featuring in dioecism.
水仙是两栖植物，十分容易栽培。
Shuǐxiān shì liǎngqī zhíwù，shífēn róngyì zāipéi。
Narcissus is amphiphyte, and easy to plant.
我们所穿的衣服中含有大量的植物纤维。
Wǒmen suǒ chuān de yīfu zhōng hányǒu dàliàng de zhíwù xiānwéi。
The clothes we are wearing contain lots of plant fibres.
饮食中的植物油是必不可少的。
Yǐnshí zhōng de zhíwùyóu shì bìbùkěshǎo de。
Vegetable oil is indispensable for a healthy diet.
哪位同学能说出植物叶子的生长点在哪里？
Nǎ wèi tóngxué néng shuōchū zhíwù yèzi de shēngzhǎngdiǎn zài nǎlǐ？
Who can tell us where the growing point of the plant leaf is?
缺乏微量元素的植物是不容易长好的。
Quēfá wēiliàng yuánsù de zhíwù shì bù róngyì cháng hǎo de。
It\'s hard for plants that lack trace elements to grow well.
我们的肉眼是看不到植物的细胞壁的。
Wǒmen de ròuyǎn shì kànbúdào zhíwù de xìbāobì de。
We can not see the cell wall with our naked eye.
植物生长，水和阳光两者缺一不可。
Zhíwùshēngzhǎng，shuǐ hé yángguāng liǎngzhě quēyībùkě。
For plants to grow they must have both sun and water.
这种植物到处都有。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù dàochùdōuyǒu。
You can find this kind of plant everywhere.
真菌寄生在某些植物中。
Zhēnjūn jìshēng zài mǒuxiē zhíwù zhōng.
Fungus is a parasite on certain plants.
区分两种植物
qūfēn liǎngzhòng zhíwù
differentiate between two kinds of plant
这些都是热带植物。
Zhèxiē dōushì rèdàizhíwù.
These are all tropical plants.
他对植物学了解很透。
Tā duì zhíwùxué liǎojiě hěn tòu。
He has a thorough knowledge of botany.
草本植物
Cǎoběnzhíwù
herbs
动(植，矿)物界
dònɡ(zhí, kuànɡ)wù jiè
the animal (vegetable, mineral) kingdom
这一带地势低缓，适宜种植农业作物。
Zhè yídài dìshì dīhuǎn，shìyí zhòngzhí nóngyè zuòwù。
This area is low and even, it\'s not fit for agricultural crops.
这个村的农民大多以种植经济作物为生。
Zhège cūn de nóngmín dàduō yǐ zhòngzhí jīngjì zuòwù wéishēng。
Farmers in this village make a living mainly by growing industrial crops.
种植粮食作物的同时也要搞农业的附加值生产。

Zhòngzhí zhíwù bìxū fúhé yuèlìng，fǒuzé búhuì yǒu shōuchéng。
Planting must be done in accordance with the lunar month, or else you won\'t harvest anything.
植物保护对于植物的生长尤为重要。
Zhíwù bǎohù duìyú zhíwù de shēngzhǎng yóuwéi zhòngyào。
Plant protection is extremely important for its growth.
我国有354种珍稀植物濒危。
Wǒ guó yǒu sānbǎiwǔshísì zhǒng zhēnxī zhíwù bīnwēi。
In our country 354 species of rare plants are on the brink of extinction (or are dying out).
多倍体植物
duōbèitǐ zhíwù
polyploid plant
多年生植物
duōniánshēng zhíwù
perennial plant
靠种子繁殖的植物
kào zhǒng zi fánzhí de zhíwù
plants which propagate themselves by seeds
扶植新生力量
fúzhí xīnshēng lìliang
foster new rising forces
扶植傀儡政权
fúzhí kuǐlěi zhèngquán
prop up a puppet regime
腐生植物
fǔshēng zhíwù
saprophyte
父本植株
fùběn zhízhū
paternal plant
植物通过根部汲取养分。
Zhíwù tōngguò gēnbùjíqǔ yǎngfèn。
Plants assimilate nutriment through their roots.
动植物检疫
dònɡzhíwù jiǎnyì 
the quarantine of animals and plants
动(植，矿)物界
dònɡ(zhí, kuànɡ)wù jiè
the animal (vegetable, mineral) kingdom
这种植物禁不住冻。
Zhè zhǒng zhíwù jīnbuzhù dòng。
This plant can\'t stand frost.
种植莲藕
zhòngzhí lián\'ǒu 
plant lotuses
合理密植
hélǐ mìzhí 
rational close planting
棉花种植面积
miánhuā zhòngzhí miànjī
the acreage under cotton
摸出一套种植水稻的好经验
mōchū yítào zhòngzhí shuǐdào de hǎo jīngyàn
gain good experience in growing rice
母本植株
mǔběn zhízhū

胚胎移植
pēitāi yízhí

培植中草药
péizhí zhōng cǎoyào
cultivate medicinal herbs
培植人才
péizhí réncái
train competent personnel
培植私人势力
péizhí sīrén shìlì
build up one\'s personal influence
斜坡铺植了草皮。
Xiépō pūzhí le cǎopí。
The slope has been turfed with grass.
有些植物的茎匍匐在地面上。
Yǒuxiē zhíwù de jīngpúfúzàidìmiàn shàng。
Some plants have trailing (or creeping) stems.
这种植物具有强大的生命力。
Zhè zhǒng zhíwù jùyǒu qiángdà de shēngmìnglì。
This kind of plant has great vitality.
权威的植物学家
quánwēi de zhíwùxuéjiā
an authority on botany
食用植物
shíyòng zhíwù
edible plants
食用植物油
shíyòngzhíwùyóu
edible vegetable oil
此树系周恩来手植。
Cǐ shù xì Zhōu Enlái shǒu zhí。
This tree was planted by Zhou Enlai.
受精卵移植
shòujīngluǎn yízhí
zygote transplant
植树可以保持水土。
Zhíshù kěyǐ bǎochí shuǐtǔ。
Tree-planting helps to conserve water and prevent soil erosion.
多腐植质的土壤
duō fǔzhízhì de tǔrǎng
humus-rich soil
她要把这些花枝压植到路边。
Tā yào bǎ zhèxiē huāzhī yāzhí dào lù biān。
She is going to layer these stems along the road.
烟草种植园
yāncǎo zhòngzhíyuán
tobacco plantation
植物演替
zhíwù yǎntì
succession of plants
野生植物
yěshēnɡ zhíwù

一年生植物
yìniánshēnɡ zhíwù 
annual plant; annual
移植秧苗
yízhí yānɡmiáo 
transplant seedlings
戏剧移植节目
xìjù yízhí jiémù 
items adapted from the theatre
因地制宜地进行密植
yīndìzhìyí de jìnxíngmìzhí 
carry out close planting in line with local conditions
植物油脂
zhíwù yóuzhī 
vegetable fat or oil
栽培野生植物
zāipéi yěshēnɡ zhíwù
domesticate wild plants
在山坡上栽植了树苗。
Zài shànpō shàngzāizhí le shùmiáo。
The hillside was planted with saplings.
植物脂肪
zhíwù zhīfánɡ 
vegetable fat
伟大的文学创作，总是植根于人民生活。
Wěidà de wénxué chuàngzuò，zǒngshì zhígēn yú rénmín shēnghuó。
Any great literary work is rooted in the life of ordinary people.
植树造林
zhíshù zàolín 
afforestation
指向植物
zhǐxiànɡ zhíwù 
compass plant
寻求稀有植物的种源
xúnqiú xīyǒu zhíwù de zhǒng yuán 
look for the origin of rare plants
种子植物
zhǒng zi zhíwù 
seed plant

jīngjì zhíwù
