做心脏移植手术
zuò xīnzàng yízhí shǒushù
perform heart transplant surgery
植树
zhíshù
tree planting
植党营私
zhídǎngyíngsī
set up a clique for one\'s own selfish interests
我亲手种植了两盆白兰花。
Wǒ qīnshǒu zhòngzhí le liǎng pén báilánhuā。
I planted two pots of gardenia flowers.
种植白芷要特别加强施肥管理。
Zhòngzhí báizhǐ yào tèbié jiāqiáng shīféi guǎnlǐ。
Fertilization requires special attention when growing angelica.
园林里种植了好多柏木，看上去郁郁葱葱的。
Yuánlín lǐ zhòngzhí le hǎoduō bǎimù，kàn shàngqù yùyùcōngcōng de。
There are plenty of cypresses in the garden, making it lush and green.
一些动植物的保护色会随环境的变化而变化。
Yìxiē dòngzhíwù de bǎohùsè huì suí huánjìng de biànhuà ér biànhuà。
The protective color of some plants and animals changes with their surroundings.
贝叶树是西双版纳珍稀植物，一辈子只开花一次。
Bèiyèshù shì Xīshuāngbǎnnà zhēnxī zhíwù，yíbèizi zhǐ kāihuā yícì。
The peepul tree is a rare and precious plant in Xishuangbanna. Such kind of trees blossom only once in their lifetime.
他们正在测试这种植物病毒标样。
Tāmen zhèngzài cèshì zhèzhǒng zhíwù bìngdú biāoyàng。
They are testing the sample of the vegetable virus.
播种后一定要踩墒，这样有助于植物的生长。
Bōzhǒng hòu yídìng yào cǎishāng，zhèyàng yǒuzhùyú zhíwù de shēngzhǎng。
One must tramp down the earth over sown seed, which is good for the plants.
菜农在种植蔬菜时一定要注意防治菜蚜。
Càinóng zài zhòngzhí shūcài shí yídìng yào zhùyì fángzhì càiyá。
When growing vegetables, one must guard against cabbage aphids.
茶农这次买进了不少茶籽，明年春天要大面积种植茶树了。
Chánóng zhècì mǎijìn le bùshǎo cházǐ，míngnián chūntiān yào dàmiànjī zhòngzhí cháshù le。
The tea growers bought a lot of tea seeds this time. They are going to grow wide areas of tea next year.
松树是一种常绿植物。
Sōngshù shì yìzhǒng chánglǜ zhíwù。
Pines are evergreen plants.
农场主计划明年大面积种植棉花。
Nóngchǎngzhǔ jìhuà míngnián dà miànjī zhòngzhí miánhuā。
The farm owner plans to grow wide areas of cotton next year.
城厢周围种植了大面积的玉米。
Chéngxiāng zhōuwéi zhòngzhí le dàmiànjī de yùmǐ。
A vast stretch of corn has been grown in, and around the city.
有的植物初花也是一年中唯一一次开花。
Yǒu de zhíwù chūhuā yěshì yìnián zhōng wéiyī yícì kāihuā。
For some plants their first blooming is also their last.
有的植物初花比较晚，甚至不会开花。
Yǒu de zhíwù chūhuā bǐjiào wǎn，shènzhì búhuì kāihuā。
Some plants are late in their first bloom, or will not bloom at all.
许多植物的传种方式很特别。
Xǔduō zhíwù de chuánzhǒng fāngshì hěntèbié。
Many plants have special propagation methods.
茨菰这种植物虽然能够食用，但在北方很少见到有人吃。
Cígū zhèzhǒng zhíwù suīrán nénggòu shíyòng，dàn zài běifāng hěnshǎo jiàndào yǒurén chī。
Although the vegetable named arrowhead can be eaten, few people from the north actually eat it.
这一带地势低缓，适宜种植农业作物。
Zhè yídài dìshì dīhuǎn，shìyí zhòngzhí nóngyè zuòwù。
This area is low and even, it\'s not fit for agricultural crops.
在挖栽植坑时，应将表土和底土分别放在坑的两侧。
Zài wāzāi zhíkēng shí，yīng jiāng biǎotǔ hé dǐtǔ fēnbié fàngzài kēng de liǎngcè。
When digging a hole for planting, one should put topsoil and subsoil in two different sides of the hole.
这个地块儿种植的全都是玉米。
Zhège dìkuàir zhòngzhí de quán dōushì yùmǐ。
Acres of land here are planted with corn.
这种植物的地上茎可以食用。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù de dìshàng jìng kěyǐ shíyòng。
The aerial stem of this plant can be eaten.
我在植物园里见过莪蒿。
Wǒ zài zhíwùyuán lǐ jiàn guò éhāo。
I once saw cowherb in a botanical garden.
今年植树节前夕，我们用上了飞播造林技术。
Jīnnián zhíshùjié qiánxī，wǒmen yòng shàng le fēibō zàolín jìshù。
We applied the air seeding technology for this year\'s Arbor Day.
那些风中轻飘的飞蓬，是植物界随遇而安的典型。
Nàxiē fēng zhōng qīngpiāo de fēipéng，shì zhíwùjiè suíyù\'ér\'ān de diǎnxíng。
The bitter fleabane in the wind is a typical drifting plant.
浮生性植物是蚊虫滋生的温床。
Fúshēngxìng zhíwù shì wénchóng zīshēng de wēnchuáng。
Plants growing on water are the breeding ground for mosquitoes.
植草固沙是防止沙尘暴的有效措施。
Zhícǎo gùshā shì fángzhǐ shāchénbào de yǒuxiào cuòshī。
Planting grass and fixing the sand is an effective way of preventing sand storms.
果酸存在于植物之中，可入药。
Guǒsuān cúnzài yú zhíwù zhī zhōng，kě rùyào。
Fruit acid existing in foliage can be used as medicine.
在缺水的地方，我们只能种植旱作。
Zài quēshuǐ de dìfāng，wǒmen zhǐnéng zhòngzhí hànzuò。
We can only plant dry crops in places short of water.
红柳是高原上最普通，最常见的一种植物。
Hóngliǔ shì gāoyuán shàng zuì pǔtōng，zuì chángjiàn de yìzhǒng zhíwù。
The Chionese tamarisk is the most common and familiar plant on high plateaus.
有的花适合种植在花儿洞子里。
Yǒu de huā shìhé zhòngzhí zài huārdòngzi lǐ。
Some flowers are fit to be planted in greenhouses with part of them under the ground.
花生饼对于植物生长是一种很好的肥料。
Huāshēngbǐng duìyú zhíwù shēngzhǎng shì yìzhǒng hěnhǎo de féiliào。
Caky peanut residue is good fertilizer for plant growth.
这家商店出售花秧，可以自己买回家种植。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn chūshòu huāyāng，kěyǐ zìjǐ mǎi huíjiā zhòngzhí。
This store sells flower seedlings. We can buy some, and plant them by ourselves in our home.
村民把荒坡进行了开发，将其用于种植果树。
Cūnmín bǎ huāngpō jìnxíng le kāifā，jiāng qí yòngyú zhòngzhí guǒshù。
The villagers have cultivated the deserted sloping field to plant fruit trees.
人们在荒丘上种植了树木，以减少水土流失。
Rénmen zài huāngqiū shàng zhòngzhí le shùmù，yǐ jiǎnshǎo shuǐtǔ liúshī。
People planted trees on the waste hills to decrease water and soil loss.
他根据这种植物的特征判断出它是黄柏。
Tā gēnjù zhèzhǒng zhíwù de tèzhēng pànduàn chū tā shì huángbǎi。
Judging from its two characteristics he concluded that the plant was yellow cypress.
这种植物只生长在回归带以北，在其他地方很少见。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù zhǐ shēngzhǎng zài huíguīdài yǐ běi，zài qítā dìfāng hěnshǎojiàn。
This type of plant only grows on the north of the tropic. They are quite rare in other places.
全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn zhìshǐ zhèzhǒng zhíwù zāoshòu huǐmièxìng pòhuài。
Global warming has caused serious damage to this kind of plant.
鸡头米可做药用，是一种很稀有的植物。
Jītóumǐ kě zuò yàoyòng，shì yìzhǒng hěnxīyǒu de zhíwù。
Gordon euryale is a rare plant which can be used as a medicine.
这种植物在石子充塞的瘠土里，仍能顽强生长。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù zài shízi chōngsāi de jítǔ lǐ，réng néng wánqiáng shēngzhǎng。
This plant can still grow tenaciously even in stone-filled poor land.
这种植物的叶子尖溜溜的，很容易刺伤手。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù de yèzi jiānliūliū de，hěnróngyì cìshāng shǒu。
The leaves of this plants are pointed, so we are easily hurt by them.
院子里种植了很多剑兰花。
Yuànzi lǐ zhòngzhí le hěnduō jiànlánhuā。
In the courtyard there grow a lot of gladioli.
角膜移植手术使这位盲人重见光明。
Jiǎomó yízhí shǒushù shǐ zhèwèi mángrén chóngjiàn guāngmíng。
Corneal transplantation enabled the blind man to recover his eyesight.
古生物学家发现了距今1亿年的孑遗植物。
Gǔshēngwùxuéjiā fāxiàn le jùjīn yíyìnián de jiéyí zhíwù。
Paleontologists found the living fossils of plants that were one hundred million years old
植物园里有几棵金钱松？
Zhíwùyuán lǐ yǒu jǐ kē jīnqiánsōng？
How many golden larches are there in the arboretum?
大殿前那片闶阆的地方，是准备种植牡丹花的。
Dàdiàn qián nà piàn kànglàng de dìfāng，shì zhǔnbèi zhòngzhí mǔdānhuā de。
The open space in front of the audience hall is reserved for planting peonies.
生物课上，老师讲到“植物是具有抗逆性的”。
Shēngwùkè shàng，lǎoshī jiǎngdào“zhíwù shì jùyǒu kàngnìxìng de”。
In biology class, the teacher said &quot;plants have resistance.&quot;
热带植物园太好玩了，我们在其中乐而忘返。
Rèdài zhíwùyuán tài hǎowán le，wǒmen zài qí zhōng lè ér wàngfǎn。
How interesting the tropical arboretum is.  We have so much fun there that we are reluctant to leave.
他们正在炼山，准备来年植树造林。
Tāmen zhèngzài liànshān，zhǔnbèi láinián zhíshù zàolín。
They are clearing the mountain to prepare for the tree planting, and forestation next year.
经过多年的努力，我们已经种植了大面积的林网。
Jīngguò duōnián de nǔlì，wǒmen yǐjing zhòngzhí le dàmiànjī de línwǎng。
After years of efforts, we have already planted a large area of forest network.
今年我们要在临河一带大面积种植树木。
Jīnnián wǒmen yào zài línhé yídài dàmiànjī zhòngzhí shùmù。
This year we will plant a large area of trees close to the river.
这种蔬菜适合在露地上种植。
Zhèzhǒng shūcài shìhé zài lùdì shàng zhòngzhí。
An open vegetable plot is suitable for planting this kind of vegetable.
多食用绿色植物对人体有益。
Duō shíyòng lǜsè zhíwù duì réntǐ yǒuyì。
Green plants are healthy for the human body.
超市有出售绿色植物的专柜。
Chāoshì yǒu chūshòu lǜsè zhíwù de zhuānguì。
There is a special counter selling green plants in the supermarket.
这种气候不适合落叶植物的生长。
Zhèzhǒng qìhou bú shìhé luòyè zhíwù de shēngzhǎng。
The climate is not suitable for deciduous vegetation.
我的家乡随处可见马兰这种植物。
Wǒ de jiāxiāng suíchù kějiàn mǎlán zhèzhǒng zhíwù。
Chinese small iris is everywhere in my hometown.
这种蔓生植物，一定会顺着藤架生长。
Zhèzhǒng mànshēng zhíwù，yídìng huì shùn zhe téngjià shēngzhǎng。
The trailing plant  will surely grow along the frame.
他的几十亩葡萄园都种植了玫瑰香，再过一个月就可以采摘了。
Tā de jǐ shí mǔ pútaoyuán dōu zhòngzhí le méiguīxiāng，zài guò yígèyuè jiù kěyǐ cǎizhāi le。
He planted Muscat Hamburg grapes over the entire ten mu of his vineyard, to be picked one month later.
城市绿化要以木本植物、高大树木为主。
Chéngshì lǜhuà yào yǐ mùběn zhíwù、gāodà shùmù wéizhǔ。
Woody plant, and tall trees should be the main choice in greening a city.
目光短浅的乱砍滥伐行为，破坏了植被，造成了水土流失。
Mùguāng duǎnqiǎn de luànkǎn lànfá xíngwéi，pòhuài le zhíbèi，zàochéng le shuǐtǔ liúshī。
Short-sighted action of lumbering in a destructive manner destroys vegetation, and causes soil erosion.
我们果园种植的蟠桃每年都畅销海内外呢。
Wǒmen guǒyuán zhòngzhí de pántáo měinián dōu chàngxiāo hǎinèiwài ne。
The flat peaches grown in our orchard sell well both at home and abroad.
竹子等许多植物都有着披针形叶子。
Zhúzi děng xǔduō zhíwù dōu yǒu zhe pīzhēnxíng yèzi。
Many plants like bamboo grow lanceolar leaves.
植物园里长满了各种奇花异草。
Zhíwùyuán lǐ zhǎngmǎn le gèzhǒng qíhuā yìcǎo。
The arboretum is full of exotic flowers and rare herbs.
这一带的丘壑峡谷中，生长着许多珍稀植物。
Zhè yídài de qiūhè xiágǔ zhōng，shēngzhǎng zhe xǔduō zhēnxī zhíwù。
Many valuable and rare plants grow in the stretch of canyons in this area.
这清澈的泉流滋养了茂盛的植被。
Zhè qīngchè de quánliú zīyǎng le màoshèng de zhíbèi。
The clear spring-fed stream nourishes the flourishing vegetation.
我们今年种植了大面积的人工林。
Wǒmen jīnnián zhòngzhí le dàmiànjī de réngōnglín。
We are growing a vast stretch of planted forest this year.
实验室里正在进行使用人造土栽培植物的实验。
Shíyànshì lǐ zhèngzài jìnxíng shǐyòng rénzàotǔ zāipéi zhíwù de shíyàn。
An experiment of growing plants in artificial soil is being conducted in the laboratory.
这种植物有肉质根茎。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù yǒu ròuzhì gēnjìng。
The plant has a succulent rhizome.
种植韭黄必须采用软化栽培技术。
Zhòngzhí jiǔhuáng bìxū cǎiyòng ruǎnhuà zāipéi jìshù。
To plant leeks, the softening planting skill must be adopted.
我们要加大植树造林的力度，防治沙害。
Wǒmen yào jiā dà zhíshù zàolín de lìdù，fángzhì shāhài。
We should reinforce our efforts in tree planting, and forestation making to prevent and cure sandstorms.
在沙地里种植沙棘，可以起到固沙的作用。
Zài shādì lǐ zhòngzhí shājí，kěyǐ qǐ dào gùshā de zuòyòng。
Planting sea buckthorn on sandy soil can solidify sand.
在这里种植一些沙柳可以起到巩固堤坝的作用。
Zài zhèlǐ zhòngzhí yìxiē shāliǔ kěyǐ qǐ dào gǒnggù dībà de zuòyòng。
Planting some sand willows here can solidify the dyke.
沙壤土不适合种植这种高大树木。
Shārǎngtǔ bú shìhé zhòngzhí zhèzhǒng gāodà shùmù。
Sand soil is not fit to plant such tall trees.
植树造林可以有效地防治沙灾。
Zhíshù zàolín kěyǐ yǒuxiào de fángzhì shāzāi。
Tree planting, and forestation can effectively prevent sandstorms.
我们要最大限度地开发山荒来种植粮食。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de kāifā shānhuāng lái zhòngzhí liángshi。
We will exploit the waste land on the mountain by planting the maximum possible crops.
传说是神农氏教会了人类种植庄稼。
Chuánshuō shì shénnóngshì jiāohuì le rénlèi zhòngzhí zhuāngjià。
It is said that it was Shen Nung who taught man how to grow crops.
这台仪器可以记录植物体中生物电的变化。
Zhètái yíqì kěyǐ jìlù zhíwùtǐ zhōng shēngwùdiàn de biànhuà。
This instrument can record the changes of bioelectricity in plants.
他的庭院中长满了石松，可他并不知道这种植物能做药材。
Tā de tíngyuàn zhōng zhǎngmǎn le shísōng，kě tā bìng bùzhīdào zhèzhǒng zhíwù néng zuò yàocái。
Staghorn is everywhere in his courtyard, yet he doesn\'t know that this plant can be made into medicine.
这种花很娇贵，适应性极弱，种植有些难度。
Zhèzhǒng huā hěnjiāoguì，shìyīngxìng jíruò，zhòngzhí yǒuxiē nándù。
This flower is very fragile and not adaptable, so it\'s a bit difficult to grow it.
他家靠种植果园成了我们村的首户。
Tā jiā kào zhòngzhí guǒyuán chéng le wǒmen cūn de shǒuhù。
His family became the richest in our village by developing orchards.
由于不重视植树造林，这片土地的水土流失情况很严重。
Yóuyú bú zhòngshì zhíshù zàolín，zhè piàn tǔdì de shuǐtǔ liúshī qíngkuàng hěnyánzhòng。
Soil erosion is very serious on this land due to people\'s neglect of planting trees.
这一带种植大面积松墙是为了防止沙尘暴的侵袭。
Zhè yídài zhòngzhí dà miànjī sōngqiáng shì wèi le fángzhǐ shāchénbào de qīnxí。
The purpose of planting such a huge pine wall is to prevent sandstorms.
这是一种藤本植物，它会沿着墙壁生长的。
Zhè shì yìzhǒng téngběn zhíwù，tā huì yán zhe qiángbì shēngzhǎng de。
It is a vine, it can grow along a wall.
你能从这个桯子观察出植物缺少哪种元素吗？
Nǐ néng cóng zhège tīngzi guānchá chū zhíwù quēshǎo nǎ zhǒng yuánsùma？

这株植物从外观上看应该是通草。
Zhè zhū zhíwù cóng wàiguān shàng kàn yīnggāi shì tōngcǎo。
Judging from its appearance, it must be the pith.
我公司统收了这几个村子种植的大豆。

My company purchased these several villages\' soya beans collectively.
这片土地经过脱盐就可以种植庄稼了。

My grandfather cleared a patch of land in the yard to grow mottled bamboo.
植物园里有好多橡胶树，每年可以出产不少橡胶。

殷殷嘱咐
yīnyīn zhǔfù 
enjoin sincerely

Wǒ fàngmàn jiàshǐ sùdù，xiàng tā huīshǒu，shìyì ràng tā huíqù。

sōngbǎi sēnsēn

我去过巴黎、柏林、伦敦和马德里了。

从这里沿着一条水泥路走，然后你会看到一条柏油路。

德国统一后，柏林再次成为首都。

德国在1961年被柏林墙一分为二。

我们去听了柏林交响乐团。

我们有两种蓝色颜料，分别为柏林兰和碱性蓝色淀。

The ant is a social insect.
蚂蚁是喜群居的昆虫。
The insects attack small grain plants, cornfields, and other vegetable crops.
这种昆虫主要侵袭小型谷物，玉米地和其它蔬菜作物。　
Poison is the only defense of some insects.
有些昆虫只有靠毒药才能对付。
Dengue, filariasis, leishmaniasis, onchocerciasis, and American trypanosomiasis (Chagas disease) are other diseases carried by insects.
登革热病、丝虫病、黑热病、盘尾丝虫病及美洲锥虫病（查格斯病）也是由昆虫传播的疾病。
Insects have the most highly developed sense of taste.
昆虫的味觉高度发达。
Not all bats feed on insects.
不是所有的蝙蝠都以昆虫为食物。
It was first in the last quarter of the 19th century that the real advance was made in the study of economic entomology.
经济昆虫学研究的第一次真正发展是在19世纪的最后二十几年。

蝴蝶是一种无害的昆虫。

这种昆虫能携带并传播一些危险的细菌。

在昆虫中很重要的是，蜕皮损耗了相当大的能量。

昆虫是有气管的节肢动物，体躯分为头部，胸部和腹部。

可旋转的触须能帮助这些昆虫测量洞口的尺寸。

The foul smell of the stinkhorn attracts insects that carry the spores away on their feet.
Chòujiǎojūn de chòuwèi yǐnlái kūnchóng jiāng gēnbù de bāozǐ yùnzǒu。
臭角菌的臭味引来昆虫将根部的孢子运走。
Some insects are anthophagous.
Yǒuxiē kūnchóng shì yǐ huā wéi shí de。
有些昆虫是以花为食的。
A snag can provide food and a habitat for insects and birds.
Cánzhū kěyǐ wèi kūnchóng hé niǎolèi tígōng shíwù hé qīxīdì。
残株可以为昆虫和鸟类提供食物和栖息地。
Carnivorous plants are capable of trapping and digesting small animals especially insects.
Shíròuxìng zhíwù nénggòu bǔhuò yóuqí shì kūnchóng zhèyàng de xiǎo dòngwù bìng xiāohuà tāmen。
食肉性植物能够捕获尤其是昆虫这样的小动物并消化它们。
Survivor guilt was first noted in those who survived the holocaust.
Xìngcúnzhě zuìjiù gǎn zài dàtúshā xìngcúnzhě zhōng shǒucì bèi fāxiàn。
幸存者罪咎感在大屠杀幸存者中首次被发现。
The holocaust survivors have lived a nightmare.
Dàtúshā xìngcúnzhě jīnglìle yì chǎng èmèng。
大屠杀幸存者经历了一场噩梦。
We must not fail his obligation to the victims of the holocaust.
Wǒmen bìxū lǚxíng tā duì dàtúshā xīshēngzhě de yìwù。
我们必须履行他对大屠杀牺牲者的义务。
Right a wrongs done to the victims of the Holocaust.
Huán dàtúshā shòuhàizhěmen yí gè gōngzhèng。
还大屠杀受害者们一个公正。
The embryonic government was staffed by survivors of the massacre.
Zǎoqī zhèngfǔ yóu dàtúshā de xìngcúnzhě zǔchéng。
早期政府由大屠杀的幸存者组成。
军阀屠杀罢工工人。
Jūnfá túshā bàgōnggōngrén。
The warlords butchered the strikers.
南京大屠杀震惊中外。
Nánjīngdàtúshā zhènjīng zhōng wài。
The Nanjing Massacre shocked the country and the whole world.
屠杀
túshā
massacre; butcher; slaughter
敌军攻入城池，展开了丧心病狂的屠杀。
Díjūn gōngrù chéngchí，zhǎnkāi le sàngxīnbìngkuáng de túshā。
The enemy attacked the city, and started killing people without provocation.
屠杀。
南京大屠杀惨案
南京大屠杀纪念馆。
这里展示的是日本老兵对南京大屠杀史实的证言。
To mass murder is to murder a large amount of people at the same time.
Dàtúshā zhǐ de shì zài tóng yì shíjiān túshā dàliàng de rén。
大屠杀指的是在同一时间屠杀大量的人。
voluntary manslaughter
蓄意屠杀
The massacre of Texas is an old movie, based on real facts.
《德克萨斯大屠杀》是一部源自真实事件的老片子。
the Holocaust
[历史] 第二次世界大战期间纳粹对犹太人的大屠杀
The general conceived his indignation to the massacre.
这位将军表达了他对这次屠杀的义愤。

在噩梦中，一个女人强迫她看一个疯子屠杀她的家人。
A number of people were simply mowed down by the enemy\'s machine guns.

农户们把他们的牲畜交给该屠夫宰杀。
屠户。

A butcher is unlikely to preach vegetarianism.

佛家讲“放下屠刀，立地成佛”是让人向善。

Xiǎngbu dào wǒ hé érshí hǎoyǒu jìngzài yìguótāxiāngxiāngféng。
I never thought I would meet my childhood companion in a foreign land.
我和他在巴黎萍水相逢。
Wǒ hé tā zài Bālí píngshuǐxiāngféng.
I had a chance encounter with him in Paris.
棋逢对手难相胜，将遇良才不敢骄。
Qíféngduìshǒu nán xiāngshèng，jiàngyùliángcái bùgǎn jiāo。
When a general meets a worthy opponent, he won\'t dare to underestimate him.
相逢相识是缘分。
相逢何必曾相识。

相逢。

他经常怅恨自己生不逢时。
Tā jīngcháng chànghèn zìjǐ shēngbùféngshí。
Born in unlucky times, he often feels depressed.
他是个旷代奇才，可惜生不逢时。
Tā shì gè kuàngdài qícái，kěxī shēng bùféngshí。
He was an unrivalled talent, but unfortunately at the wrong time.
他满腹的才华没有施展的机会，真是生不逢时！
Tā mǎnfù de cáihuá méiyǒu shīzhǎn de jīhuì，zhēnshì shēngbùféngshí！
He doesn\'t have any opportunity to put his talents into use. It\'s very bad fate!
千载难逢的机会
qiānzǎinánféng de jīhuì
a golden opportunity; the chance of a lifetime

the chance of a lifetime
千载难逢的机会
once in a blue moon
千载难逢
This competition, to me, is a chance of lifetime.
Duìyú wǒ láishuō， zhè cì bǐsài shì gè qiānzǎi-nánféng de jīhuì。
对于我来说，这次比赛是个千载难逢的机会。
A visit to China is the trip of a lifetime.
Dào zhōngguó lǚyóu shì gè qiānzǎinánféng de hǎo jīhuì。
到中国旅游是个千载难逢的好机会。
There is also the chance of a lifetime for the talented teams who win through to the final.
Duìyú hěn yǒu tiānfù de tuánduì láishuō，zuìzhōng néng yílù dǎrù juésài yěshì qiānzǎinánféng de jīhuì。
对于很有天赋的团队来说，最终能一路打入决赛也是千载难逢的机会。
我们虽然萍水相逢，可是我觉得你和我很谈得来。

Although we have only met by chance, I find we have a lot in common.

每逢佳节倍思亲
镇上每逢集日，四乡农民都带着土特产前来赶集。
Zhèn shàngměi féngjírì，sì xiāngnóngmín dōu dài zhe tǔtèchǎn qiánlái gǎnjí。
Whenever market day comes round, the farmers of the surrounding countryside all come to town, bringing their special produce for the market.
每逢国庆节晚上都要放礼花。
Měi féngGuóqìngJié wǎnshAngdōuyào fànglǐhuā。
We always have a fireworks display on the evening of National Day.
每逢春节，我都要去看老师。
Měi féngChūn Jié，wǒ dōuyào qù kàn lǎoshī。
I always go to see my teachers during Spring Festival.
每逢皇帝生日或者其他庆典，诸侯群臣皆要朝贺。
Měi féng huángdì shēngrì huòzhě qítā qìngdiǎn，zhūhóu qúnchén jiē yào cháohè。
All other countries must come and pay their respect for all emperial birthdays, and celebrations.
每逢冬至点，白天的时间是一年之中最短的。
Měiféng dōngzhì diǎn，báitiān de shíjiān shì yìnián zhī zhōng zuì duǎn de。
The day when the sun passes the winter solstice is the shortest of the year.
每逢皓月当空时，他就格外思念亲人。
Měiféng hàoyuè dāngkōng shí，tā jiù géwài sīniàn qīnrén。
Whenever a bright moon hangs high in the sky, he misses his close relatives most.
每逢既望之日他都会去寺庙烧香。
Měiféng jìwàng zhī rì tā dōuhuì qù sìmiào shāoxiāng。
He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
每逢国庆节，天安门广场上都会燃放烟花。
Měiféng guóqìngjié，Tiān\'ānmén guǎngchǎng shàng dōuhuì ránfàng yānhuā。
On every National Day, fire crackers are set off in Tiananmen Square.
每逢三节，公司都要给员工额外发放一些奖金。
Měi féng sānjié，gōngsī dōuyào gěi yuángōng éwài fāfàng yìxiē jiǎngjīn。
On Dragon Boat Festival, Mid-autumn Festival or Spring Festival, the company will give an additional bonus to the staff.
每逢社火，村子里都会有各种各样的演艺活动。
Měi féng shèhuǒ，cūnzi lǐ dōuhuì yǒu gèzhǒng gèyàng de yǎnyì huódòng。
On traditional festivals for folk art, various performances are put on in villages
每逢节日声讯台的业务就会异常繁忙。
Měiféng jiérì shēngxùntái de yèwù jiùhuì yìcháng fánmáng。
Information service centers are extremely busy during the holidays.
每逢雨季，村里的土坑就成了泥潭。
Měiféng yǔjì，cūnlǐ de tǔkēng jiù chéng le nítán。
The pits in the earth of the village turn to mud puddles in every rainy season.
这场车祸伤了他的尾椎，每逢阴天下雨尾椎都会酸疼。
Zhèchǎng chēhuò shāng le tā de wěizhuī，měiféng yīntiān xiàyǔ wěizhuī dōuhuì suānténg。
This car accident hurt his coccygeal vertebra, so it aches every rainy day.
他很迷信，每逢有大事情发生，他都会先去问卦。
Tā hěn míxìn，měiféng yǒu　dàshìqing fāshēng，tā dōuhuì xiānqù wènguà。
He is very supersititious, and goes to pray to the gods whenever something big happens.
每逢月末，我的工资都会支绌。
Měiféng yuèmò，wǒ de gōngzī dōuhuì zhīchù。
Everytime at the end of a month, my salary would be insufficient.
每逢节假日，自选商场都会搞促销活动。
Měiféng jiéjiǎrì，zìxuǎn shāngchǎng dōuhuì gǎo cùxiāo huódòng。
Every festival and holiday, the supermarket would have promotion activities.
每逢周六他都去打工。
Měiféng zhōuliù tā dōu qù dǎgōng.
He works every Saturday.
这个镇每三天一个集，今天逢集。
Zhège zhèn měi sāntiān yígè jí，jīntiān féngjí。
An outdoor market is held every three days in this town, and today happens to be a market day.

Meeting again after a long separation, they opened their hearts to each other.

bǎibān féngyíng shàngsi
curry favour with one\'s superior sedulously

féngxiōnghuàjí
land on one\'s feet
逢凶化吉

We of this trade know too well that we are only playing a game.
有的人把交朋友当作是逢场作戏。
Yǒuderén bǎ jiāopéngyou dàngzuòshì féngchǎngzuòxì。
Some people regard friendship as a game.
股民们总是逢低建仓，逢高就抛售。
Gǔmínmen zǒngshì féngdī jiàncāng，fénggāo jiù pāoshòu。

The friends were glad to meet after so long a separation.

He is an honest person who speaks nice words about his friends.

Whenever a bright moon hangs high in the sky, he misses his close relatives most.

Méi xiǎngdào zài zhège wēijī shíkè dédào le zhè bǐ qián，zhēnshì jíchù féngshēng ya！
It didn\'t occur to me that we could this money at this urgent moment. It\'s really like being rescued from a desperate situation!
每逢既望之日他都会去寺庙烧香。
Měiféng jìwàng zhī rì tā dōuhuì qù sìmiào shāoxiāng。
He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
今天是酒逢知己，我们一定得多喝几杯。

It is not enough to drink a thousand cups with a bosom friend, we must drink to our hearts\' content.
老朋友重逢你不得剧饮几杯？
Lǎopéngyou chóngféng nǐ bùděi jùyǐn jǐ bēi？
Shouldn\'t you drink more when meeting old friends again?
他是个旷代奇才，可惜生不逢时。
Tā shì gè kuàngdài qícái，kěxī shēng bùféngshí。

On every National Day, fire crackers are set off in Tiananmen Square.
从这个盘面来看，双方真是棋逢对手啊。

From the situation on the chessboard, both sides are indeed of equal skill.
每逢三节，公司都要给员工额外发放一些奖金。
Měi féng sānjié，gōngsī dōuyào gěi yuángōng éwài fāfàng yìxiē jiǎngjīn。
On Dragon Boat Festival, Mid-autumn Festival or Spring Festival, the company will give an additional bonus to the staff.
每逢社火，村子里都会有各种各样的演艺活动。
Měi féng shèhuǒ，cūnzi lǐ dōuhuì yǒu gèzhǒng gèyàng de yǎnyì huódòng。
On traditional festivals for folk art, various performances are put on in villages
他满腹的才华没有施展的机会，真是生不逢时！
Tā mǎnfù de cáihuá méiyǒu shīzhǎn de jīhuì，zhēnshì shēngbùféngshí！
He doesn\'t have any opportunity to put his talents into use. It\'s very bad fate!
每逢节日声讯台的业务就会异常繁忙。
Měiféng jiérì shēngxùntái de yèwù jiùhuì yìcháng fánmáng。
Information service centers are extremely busy during the holidays.
难得老友重逢，我们要舒怀畅饮几杯！
Nándé lǎoyǒu chóngféng，wǒmen yào shūhuái chàngyǐn jǐ bēi！
It\'s a rare opportunity for us old friends to get together again, so let\'s relax and have fun!
每逢雨季，村里的土坑就成了泥潭。
Měiféng yǔjì，cūnlǐ de tǔkēng jiù chéng le nítán。
The pits in the earth of the village turn to mud puddles in every rainy season.
这场车祸伤了他的尾椎，每逢阴天下雨尾椎都会酸疼。
Zhèchǎng chēhuò shāng le tā de wěizhuī，měiféng yīntiān xiàyǔ wěizhuī dōuhuì suānténg。
This car accident hurt his coccygeal vertebra, so it aches every rainy day.
他很迷信，每逢有大事情发生，他都会先去问卦。
Tā hěn míxìn，měiféng yǒu　dàshìqing fāshēng，tā dōuhuì xiānqù wènguà。
He is very supersititious, and goes to pray to the gods whenever something big happens.
每逢月末，我的工资都会支绌。
Měiféng yuèmò，wǒ de gōngzī dōuhuì zhīchù。
Everytime at the end of a month, my salary would be insufficient.
每逢节假日，自选商场都会搞促销活动。
Měiféng jiéjiǎrì，zìxuǎn shāngchǎng dōuhuì gǎo cùxiāo huódòng。
Every festival and holiday, the supermarket would have promotion activities.
因过竹院逢僧话，又得浮生半日闲。
Yīn guò zhú yuàn féng sēng huà，yòu dé fú shēng bàn rì xián。
I met a monk and talked with him for half a day when passing the temple and enjoyed a leisurely time again.
和好友重逢
hé hǎoyǒu chóngféng
be reunited with a good friend
有的人把交朋友当作是逢场作戏。
Yǒuderén bǎ jiāopéngyou dàngzuòshì féngchǎngzuòxì。
Some people regard friendship as a game.
逢凶化吉
féngxiōnghuàjí
land on one\'s feet
久别重逢
jiǔbiéchóngféng
be reunited after a long time apart
每逢周六他都去打工。
Měiféng zhōuliù tā dōu qù dǎgōng.
He works every Saturday.
我和他在巴黎萍水相逢。
Wǒ hé tā zài Bālí píngshuǐxiāngféng.
I had a chance encounter with him in Paris.

这样的契机千载难逢，一定要把握住。

欣逢盛会。
每逢周末，工会就组织职工跳舞。
昔年同窗又重逢。
每逢喜庆必赋诗。
人逢喜事精神爽。
相逢相识是缘分。
相逢何必曾相识。
想不到我们竟在国外重逢！
余年逢盛世。
今年遭逢水患。
Sundays he would sleep late.
每逢星期天他总睡懒觉。
Christmas falls on a Sunday
圣诞节适逢星期天
the chance of a lifetime
千载难逢的机会
once in a blue moon
千载难逢
every Tuesday
每逢星期二
This competition, to me, is a chance of lifetime.
Duìyú wǒ láishuō， zhè cì bǐsài shì gè qiānzǎi-nánféng de jīhuì。
对于我来说，这次比赛是个千载难逢的机会。
It was a case of diamond cut diamond, each team was strong.
Zhè shì yì chǎng qíféngduìshǒu de duìjué，měi zhī duìwu dōu hěn qiáng。
这是一场棋逢对手的对决，每支队伍都很强。
Andy is very competitive, but he has truly met his match in Peter.
Āndí fēicháng jùyǒu jìngzhēnglì， dàn tā qíféngduìshǒu， zāoyùle Bǐdé。
安迪非常具有竞争力，但他棋逢对手，遭遇了彼得。
A visit to China is the trip of a lifetime.
Dào zhōngguó lǚyóu shì gè qiānzǎinánféng de hǎo jīhuì。
到中国旅游是个千载难逢的好机会。
There is also the chance of a lifetime for the talented teams who win through to the final.
Duìyú hěn yǒu tiānfù de tuánduì láishuō，zuìzhōng néng yílù dǎrù juésài yěshì qiānzǎinánféng de jīhuì。
对于很有天赋的团队来说，最终能一路打入决赛也是千载难逢的机会。
两人久别重逢，悲喜交集。
Liǎng rén jiǔbiéchóngféng，bēixǐjiāojí。
The reunion after a long separation brought mixed feelings of joy and sorrow to both of them.
旧友重逢
jiùyǒu chóngféng
reunion of old friends
分离多年的好友又重逢了，他们非常高兴。
Fēnlí duōnián de hǎoyǒu yòu chóngféng le，tāmen fēicháng gāoxìng。
The friends were glad to meet after so long a separation.
久别重逢，互诉衷情。
Jiǔbié chóngféng，hù sù zhōng qíng。
Meeting again after a long separation, they opened their hearts to each other.
两人久别重逢，自有许多话说。
Liǎngrén jiǔbié chóngféng，zì yǒu xǔduō huà shuō。
It was quite natural that they should have a lot to say to each other after such a long separation.
久别重逢，自是高兴。
Jiǔbié chóngféng，zì shì gāoxìng。
It was of course a delight for them to meet again after such a long separation.
久别重逢，我和他秉烛夜谈。
Jiǔbié chóngféng，wǒ hé tā bǐngzhú yètán。
I had a long talk with him by the candlelight when we met again after a long separation.
老朋友重逢你不得剧饮几杯？
Lǎopéngyou chóngféng nǐ bùděi jùyǐn jǐ bēi？
Shouldn\'t you drink more when meeting old friends again?
难得老友重逢，我们要舒怀畅饮几杯！
Nándé lǎoyǒu chóngféng，wǒmen yào shūhuái chàngyǐn jǐ bēi！

夜色苍茫。
Yèsè cāngmáng。
The shades of dusk are deepening.
夜色苍茫
yèsè cāngmáng
in gathering dusk
他的身影溶没在苍茫的夜色中。
Tā de shēnyǐng róng mò zài cāngmáng de yèsè zhōng。
He faded into the darkness.
大雪纷飞，原野一片迷茫。
Dàxuě fēnfēi，yuányě yípiàn mímáng。
The vast plain was obscured by the falling flakes of snow.
迷茫
mímáng
vast and hazy
他感到无比迷茫，进退失据。
Tā gǎndào wúbǐ mímáng，jìntuì shījù。
He felt mixed-up and in a hopeless position.
他神色迷茫地望着前方，仿佛周围的一切都不存在了。
Tā shénsè mímáng de wàngzhe qiánfāng，fǎngfú zhōuwéi de yíqiè dōu bù cúnzàile.
He stared ahead in a daze as if nothing around him existed.
迷茫
眼前一片迷茫。
神情迷茫。
I feel lost. What should I do with my life?
我迷茫了。我的生活该怎么办呢？
茫然不知所措
mánɡrán bùzhīsuǒcuò
be at a complete loss what to do
茫然无知
mángrán wúzhī 
be utterly ignorant; be in the dark
显出茫然的神情
xiǎnchū mángrán de shénqíng
look blank; wear a blank expression
她坐车走了，我茫然若失地站在那里。
Tā zuò chē zǒu le，wǒ mángránruòshī de zhàn zài nàlǐ。
She got on the bus and was gone, leaving me standing there with a feeling of loss.
茫然失措
mángrán shīcuò
be at a loss what to do
现在的情势有些不尴不尬，大家都很茫然。
Xiànzài de qíngshì yǒuxiē bùgān búgà，dàjiā dōu hěnmángrán。
We are at loss in regard to this awkward situation.
他一个人走在街上，突然感到茫然若失。
Tā yígèrén zǒuzài jiēshàng，tūrán gǎndào mángránruòshī。
He walked alone in the street and suddenly felt lost.
海面上波涛汹涌，茫茫然无涯际 。
Hǎimiàn shàng bōtāo xiōngyǒng，mángmángrán wú yájì。
The sea is rough and limitless.
给他解释了半天，他还是茫然地望着我。
Gěi tā jiěshìle bàntiān，tā háishì mángrán de wàngzhe wǒ.
I took a long time explaining it to him but he still stared at me blankly.
望着苍茫的大海，他突然觉得自己如同尘芥般渺小。
Wàng zhe cāngmáng de dàhǎi，tā tūrán juédé zìjǐ rútóng chénjiè bān miǎoxiǎo。
Looking at the vast ocean, he suddenly had the feeling that he was as insignificant as dirt.
前途茫然。
茫然不知所措。
神色茫然。
在茫茫的戈壁滩上竟然还有野兔、胡杨之类的活物。
a blank mind
茫然若失的心情
a distant look
恍惚的神色(茫然的表情)
The girl had an alienated expression with an absent look.
这个女孩说话断断续续，表情很茫然。
The girl\'s face is red and vague. I guess she is drunk.
这个女孩的脸很红，表情很茫然，我觉得她喝醉了。
Nick was absent-minded and he only gave me a vague stare after I asked him a question.
尼克心不在焉，我提问之后他只是茫然的盯着我。
We are at a loss as to explain the details.
Shuōmíng xìjié de shíhou，wǒmen mángrán bùzhīsuǒcuò。
说明细节的时候，我们茫然不知所措。
Mr Connors seemed dazed and was dragging his feet.
Kāngnàsī xiānsheng sìhū hěn mángrán，chíchí mài bù kāi bù。
康纳斯先生似乎很茫然，迟迟迈不开步。
I was lost，out on a limb，didn\'t know what to do.
Wǒ zǒushīle，gūlìwúyuán，mángrán bùzhīsuǒcuò。
我走失了，孤立无援，茫然不知所措。
We sat with our books open and stared vacantly out of the window.
Wǒmen zuòzhe bǎ shū dǎkāi，yǎnguāng què mángrán de níngshìzhe chuāng wài。
我们坐着把书打开，眼光却茫然地凝视着窗外。
She stared at him blankly.
Tā mángrán de zhùshìzhe tā。
她茫然地注视着他。
She was staring vacantly into the room.
Tā mángrán de cháo fángjiān lǐ zhùshìzhe。
她茫然地朝房间里注视着。
The vacuousness of her face belied her feelings.
Tā yì liǎn de mángrán yǎnshìle tā de gǎnshòu。
她一脸的茫然掩饰了她的感受。
He had a dazed expression on his face.
Tā de liǎn shàng chéngxiànchū mángrán de biǎoqíng。
他的脸上呈现出茫然的表情。
Hopeless though it seemed, he did not abandon hope of finding a parent.
Suīrán kànsì xīwàng miǎománg，dàn tā háishì méiyǒu fàngqì xúnzhǎo fùmǔ de xīwàng。
虽然看似希望渺茫，但他还是没有放弃寻找父母的希望。
下了一场大雪，田野上白茫茫一片。
Xià le yìcháng dàxuě，tiányě shàng báimángmáng yí piàn。
After the heavy snow, the fields were a vast expanse of whiteness.
天苍苍，野茫茫。
Tiān cānɡcānɡ, yě mánɡmánɡ。 
The sky is blue, blue; and the steppe wide, wide.
要在茫茫人海中找到他，就像海底捞针一样难。
Yào zài mángmángrén hǎi zhōng zhǎo dào tā，jiù xiàng hǎi dǐ lāo zhēn yíyàngnán。
Trying to find him in such a huge crowd of people is as difficult as looking for a needle in a haystack.
茫茫大海
mángmángdàhǎi 
a vast sea
茫茫草原
mánɡmánɡ cǎoyuán 
the boundless grasslands
茫茫一片白雾
mángmángyí piàn báiwù
a vast expanse of fog
前途茫茫
qiántú mánɡmánɡ 
bleak prospects
他感觉到自己前途茫茫，往后的光景难混了。
Tā gǎnjué dào zìjǐ qiántú mángmáng，wǎnghòu de guāngjǐngnán hùn le。
He felt that his future was bleak and the days ahead would be trying.
茫茫人海
mángmáng rénhǎi 
a blurry sea of faces; a vast sea of people
四野茫茫，寂静无声。
Sìyě mángmáng，jìjìng wúshēng。
All is quiet on the vast expanse of open ground.
山上雾茫茫的，只看见一个模糊的轮廓。
Shān shàngwùmángmáng de，zhǐ kànjiàn yígè móhu de lúnkuò。
The mountains were covered in thick mist and only a faint outline could be seen.
白茫茫
báimángmáng
(of mist, snow, oodwater, etc.) a vast expanse of whiteness
“上穷碧落下黄泉，两处茫茫皆不见。”
“Shàngqióng bìluò xiàhuángquán，liǎngchù mángmáng jiēbújiàn。”
He searched heaven and hell, but failed to find her.
一夜风雪过后，原野里一片白茫茫。
Yíyè fēngxuě guòhòu，yuányě lǐ yípiàn báimángmáng。
After a whole night\'s snow, the field is all white.
村子里没有路灯，黑茫茫的一片。
Cūnzi lǐ méiyǒu lùdēng，hēimángmáng de yí piàn。
Without road lamps, the village is pitch-black.
阳澄湖畔的沙家浜生长着茫茫的芦荡。
Yángchéng húpàn de shājiābāng shēngzhǎng zhe mángmáng de lúdàng。
Shajia creek beside Yangcheng Lake is filled with boundless reed marshes.
海面上波涛汹涌，茫茫然无涯际 。
Hǎimiàn shàng bōtāo xiōngyǒng，mángmángrán wú yájì。
The sea is rough and limitless.
她戴上毡帽走进了茫茫的风雪中。
Tā dàishàng zhānmào zǒujìn le mángmáng de fēngxuě zhōng。
She put on her felt hat and walked into the boundless wind and snow.
林海茫茫
大海茫茫
上穷碧落下黄泉，两处茫茫皆不见。
心事重重，愁思茫茫。
冲入黑茫茫的太空。
茫茫黄沙，寸草不见。
在茫茫的戈壁滩上竟然还有野兔、胡杨之类的活物。
茫茫雪地
茫茫雪野。
眼前白茫茫一片，分不清哪是水，哪是天。
天苍苍，野茫茫

Yángchéng húpàn de shājiābāng shēngzhǎng zhe mángmáng de lúdàng。
Shajia creek beside Yangcheng Lake is filled with boundless reed marshes.
海面上波涛汹涌，茫茫然无涯际 。
Hǎimiàn shàng bōtāo xiōngyǒng，mángmángrán wú yájì。
The sea is rough and limitless.
她戴上毡帽走进了茫茫的风雪中。
Tā dàishàng zhānmào zǒujìn le mángmáng de fēngxuě zhōng。
She put on her felt hat and walked into the boundless wind and snow.

现在的情势有些不尴不尬，大家都很茫然。

Looking at the vast ocean, he suddenly had the feeling that he was as insignificant as dirt.
夜晚，他望着浩茫的星空出神。

He walked alone in the street and suddenly felt lost.
在冥茫的江面上，远远地驶来一条小船。

A boat is coming from far on the boundless river.
小明不喜欢数学，所以对于学习数学有什么好处，他的心里一片冥茫。

Xiaoming doesn’t like mathematics, so he is at loss about the use of learning it.
他感到无比迷茫，进退失据。
Tā gǎndào wúbǐ mímáng，jìntuì shījù。
He felt mixed-up and in a hopeless position.
给他解释了半天，他还是茫然地望着我。
Gěi tā jiěshìle bàntiān，tā háishì mángrán de wàngzhe wǒ.
I took a long time explaining it to him but he still stared at me blankly.
他神色迷茫地望着前方，仿佛周围的一切都不存在了。
Tā shénsè mímáng de wàngzhe qiánfāng，fǎngfú zhōuwéi de yíqiè dōu bù cúnzàile.
He stared ahead in a daze as if nothing around him existed.

Tā de qiántú miǎománg，ràng rén yōulǜ。

This firecracker is very powerful.
在这一年更始之时，家家户户放起了鞭炮。
Zài zhè yìnián gēngshǐ zhī shí，jiājiāhùhù fàngqǐ le biānpào。
Every family sets off fire-crackers at the turn of the new year.
过年燃焰火、放鞭炮已经成为当地的习尚。
Guònián rán yànhuǒ、fàng biānpào yǐjing chéngwéi dāngdì de xíshàng。
It is customary to set off firecrackers and fireworks during the Spring Festival.
除夕晚上鞭炮嘣嘣响。
Chúxī wǎnshang biānpào bēngbēng xiǎng。
On New Year\'s Eve there were lots of bangs from firecrackers.
市政府取消了放鞭炮的禁令。
Shìzhèngfǔ qǔxiāole fàngbiānpào de jìnlìng.
The municipal government has lifted the ban on firecrackers.
鞭炮声大作。
Biānpàoshēng dàzuò。
There was a sudden loud noise of firecrackers.
鞭炮。
一挂鞭炮
鞭炮。

The explosion of the firecrackers awoke the children.
Biānpàoshēng chǎoxǐngle háizǐmen。
鞭炮声吵醒了孩子们。
鞭毛。
九节鞭
竹节鞭。

Zài jìngzhēng jīliè de shèhuì，biāndǎ kuàiniú de xiàn xiàng lǚjiàn bùxiān。
In this world of fierce competitions, it is a common practice to exert more pressure on able people.
农奴主用皮鞭抽打农奴。
Nóngnúzhǔ yòngpíbiān chōudǎ nóngnú。
The serf owner lashed the serf with a whip.
爸爸一定又在打小兵了，响鞭的声音老远就能听见。
Bàba yídìng yòu zài dǎ xiǎobīng le，xiǎngbiān de shēngyīn lǎoyuǎn jiùnéng tīngjiàn。
Xiao Bing\'s father must be beating his son again, as one can hear the sound of the whip from afar.
在拍摄武打场面的时候，男演员的脸被鞭梢扫了一道口子。

鞭打的劈啪声

他喜欢用这些名言隽语来鞭策自己。

He likes to encourage himself with these famous words and meaningful sentences.

liǎngtiáo jí xì de yuánshēngzhì biān xíng luówén

Since buggies have been replaced by cars the buggy whip has become a symbol for anything that is hopelessly outmoded.
Yóuyú qīngbiàn mǎchē yǐ bèi qìchē suǒ qǔdài，suǒyǐ mǎbiān jiù chéngle háowúyòngchù de guòshí wùjiàn de xiàngzhēng。
由于轻便马车已被汽车所取代，所以马鞭就成了毫无用处的过时物件的象征。
My father never spared the birch.

我的父亲从不吝惜使用桦条鞭。

临场要沉着，不要慌。

Keep calm during the exam. Don\'t panic.
着慌。
老先生迈着八字步，不慌不忙地走过来。
He stood back and just watched as she birthed her baby without fuss or noise.
Tā wǎnghòu zhàn，zhǐshì kànzhe tā shēngháizi，méiyǒu huāngluàn huò chǎonào。
他往后站，只是看着她生孩子，没有慌乱或吵闹。
She proceeded unhurriedly.
Tā bùhuāngbùmáng de jìnxíngzhe。
她不慌不忙地进行着。
我考试的时候心慌。
Wǒ kǎoshì de shíhou xīnhuāng。
I was nervous while I was taking the exam.
用脑过度也会引起头晕、心慌、收悸等症状。
Yòngnǎo guòdù yě huì yǐnqǐ tóuyūn、xīnhuāng、shōujì děng zhèngzhuàng。
Excessive use of the brain causes dizziness, palpitation, contractional palpitations and other symptoms.
遇到这种麻烦事，他心慌意乱，不知所措。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng máfánshì，tā xīnhuāng-yìluàn，bùzhīsuǒcuò。
When he comes up against this kind of problem, he gets nervous and flustered and doesn\'t know what to do.
不必担心(惊慌)。
Búbì dānxīn（jīnghuāng）。
There is no need to worry (panic).
心里憋得慌
xīnlǐ biē de huang
feel very much oppressed
心里闷得慌
xīnlǐ mēn dehuang
be bored beyond endurance
他表面上装出一副满不在乎的样子，内心却是恐慌的。
Tā biǎomiàn shàngzhuāngchū yífù mǎnbúzàihu de yàngzi，nèixīn què shì kǒnghuāng de。
Although feigning complete indifference, he was actually terrified.
他慌张得心里没了主。
Tā huāngzhāng de xīnlǐ méile zhǔ。
He was in such a state that he had no idea what to do next.
他心里有底，一点不慌。
Tā xīnlǐ yǒudǐ，yìdiǎn bùhuāng。
He was not at all nervous, for he knew what to expect.
事情没办好，心里老觉得窝憋得慌。
Shìqingméi bànhǎo，xīn lǐ lǎo jué de wōbie de huāng。
I feel frustrated about having botched the job.
这个小伙子总是慌里慌张的，老叫人不放心。
Zhège xiǎohuǒzi zǒngshì huānglǐhuāngzhāng de，lǎo jiào rén bú fàngxīn。
The young man is always in a fluster and doesn\'t seem to be very dependable.
你又没做坏事，心慌什么？
饿得心慌。
心慌盗汗。
心里堵得慌
心里烦得慌
心里闷得慌
难以掩盖他慌乱的心情。
胆大心细，遇事不慌。
The attack has left the family terrified for their safety.
Zhècì xíjī lìng zhè jiā rén xiànrù jīnghuāng，fēicháng dānxīn ānquán wèntí。
这次袭击令这家人陷入惊慌，非常担心安全问题。
恐慌万状
kǒnghuāngwànzhuàng
panic-stricken
地震在全市引起了恐慌。
Dìzhèn zài quán shì yǐnqǐ le kǒnghuāng。
The earthquake caused a panic in the city.
他表面上装出一副满不在乎的样子，内心却是恐慌的。
Tā biǎomiàn shàngzhuāngchū yífù mǎnbúzàihu de yàngzi，nèixīn què shì kǒnghuāng de。
Although feigning complete indifference, he was actually terrified.
恐慌
恐慌的神色。
消除恐慌。
a war scare
战争恐慌
to strike terror to the heart
使大为恐慌
to get into a panic
陷入恐慌
a bomb/security scare
炸弹/安全恐慌
The high crime rate created a climate of fear in the town.
高犯罪率导致这个镇布满了恐慌的气氛。
A bomb scare necessitated people to evacuate the building.
炸弹的恐慌迫使人们撤离了这个建筑。
We can affiliate the widespread panic to the irresponsible words of the minister.
我们可以把这大范围的恐慌归咎于那位部长不负责任的发言。
Great confusion occurred when the stock market crashed.
股市崩盘引起了极大的恐慌。
The oil discharge caused panic among conservationists.
Yuányóu xièlòu shǐ zìrán bǎohùzhǔyì zhě fēicháng kǒnghuāng。
原油泄露使自然保护主义者非常恐慌。
Gold\'s advance is a product of fear in the market.
Huángjīn jiàgé shàngzhǎng shì yóuyú shìchǎng zhōng de kǒnghuāng suǒ zàochéng de。
黄金价格上涨是由于市场中的恐慌所造成的。
For the last five years, a good friend of mine has suffered from panic attacks.
Wǒ de yí wèi hǎoyǒu guòqù wǔ nián lǐ shòu jìn le kǒnghuāng zhèng de zhémó。
我的一位好友过去五年里受尽了恐慌症的折磨。
The panic which ensued from the statement would destroy the beef industry.
Yīn zhè fèn shēngmíng ér yǐnfā de kǒnghuāng kěnéng huì cuīhuǐ niúròu hángyè。
因这份声明而引发的恐慌可能会摧毁牛肉行业。
The patient may have an attack of panic after waking up.
Xǐnglái zhī hòu， zhège bìngrén fēicháng kǒnghuāng。
醒来之后，这个病人非常恐慌。
The loss of fire sent people into a panic.
Shīhuǒ shǐ rénmen xiànrùle kǒnghuāng。
失火使人们陷入了恐慌。
Denholm Elliott has been warned off booze after a health scare.
Jiànkāng kǒnghuāng guòhòu，Déhuòmǔ\'àilüètè bèi jǐnggào bù néng zhān jiǔ。
健康恐慌过后，德霍姆艾略特被警告不能沾酒。
There was a terrible flap about the theft.
Rénmen duì dàoqiè shìjiàn gǎndào jíwéi kǒnghuāng。
人们对盗窃事件感到极为恐慌。
The students panicked when told that final exams were less than a week away.
Dāng bèigàozhī lí qīmòkǎoshì bùzú yì xīngqī shíjiān le，xuéshengmen dùnshí gǎndào kǒnghuāng。
当被告知离期末考试不足一星期时间了，学生们顿时感到恐慌。
It is the season of dollar panic.
zhè shì yígè měiyuán kǒnghuāng de jìjié。
这是一个美元恐慌的季节。
Financial markets are certainly subject to cycles of euphoria and panic.
Jīnróngshìchǎng kěndìng huì jīnglì kuángrè hé kǒnghuāng de zhōuqī。
金融市场肯定会经历狂热和恐慌的周期。
His face fell when he heard the terrible news.
Tīngdào zhège kǒngbù de xiāoxi zhīhòu，tā miànlù jīnghuāng。
听到这个恐怖的消息之后，他面露惊慌。
不要一有风吹草动就惊慌失措。
Búyào yì yǒu fēngchuīcǎodòng jiù jīnghuāngshīcuò。
Don\'t fly into a panic at the mere rustle of leaves in the wind.
惊慌失措
jīnghuāngshīcuò
frightened out of one\'s wits; seized with panic; panic-stricken
惊慌失措
jīnghuāngshīcuò
be scared out of one\'s wits
不要一有风吹草动就惊慌失措
惊慌失措。
Keep cool, don\'t push the panic botton!
冷静，不要惊慌失措！
to do sth in a panic
惊慌失措地做某事
She thought herself into a panic over the deadline.
Xiǎngdào zuìhòuqīxiàn，tā bùjīn jīnghuāngshīcuò。
想到最后期限，她不禁惊慌失措。
I had an awful pain in my chest and started to panic.
Wǒ de xiōngkǒu yí zhèn jùliè de téngtòng，wǒ kāishǐ jīnghuāngshīcuò le。
我的胸口一阵剧烈的疼痛，我开始惊慌失措了。
He was panicking over the loss of his wallet.
Tā diūle qiánbāo，zhèngzài jīnghuāngshīcuò ne。
他丢了钱包，正在惊慌失措呢。
It is worth to panic over.
Zhè zúyǐ lìng rén jīnghuāngshīcuò。
这足以令人惊慌失措。
When he saw that I was angry he hit the panic button.
Dāng kàndào wǒ shēngqì shí tā jīnghuāngshīcuò。
当看到我生气时他惊慌失措。
He was in a funk.
Tā gǎndào jīnghuāngshīcuò。
他感到惊慌失措。
The hecklers pelted the discombobulated speaker with anything that came to hand.
Nàxiē jīliè zhìwènzhě náqǐ shǒubiān de rènhé dōngxīxiàng jīnghuāngshīcuò de yǎnjiǎngzhě rēng qù。
那些激烈质问者拿起手边的任何东西向惊慌失措的演讲者扔去。
不必担心(惊慌)。
Búbì dānxīn（jīnghuāng）。
There is no need to worry (panic).

惊慌不安
jīnɡhuānɡ bù\'ān
jittery; nervy
惊慌的神色
jīnghuāng de shénsè
frightened looks
没有半点惊慌
méiyǒu bàndiǎn jīnghuāng
not in the least scared
惊慌失措
jīnghuāngshīcuò
frightened out of one\'s wits; seized with panic; panic-stricken
听说皇上驾到，牢头禁子们都惊慌不已。
Tīngshuō huángshàng jiàdào，láotóu jìnzimen dōu jīnghuāng bùyǐ。
The jail guards were panic-stricken on hearing that the emperor was coming.
小王总是临危不惧，哪怕身处险地也毫不惊慌。
Xiǎo Wáng zǒngshì línwēibújù，nǎ pà shēnchǔ xiǎndì yě háobùjīnghuāng。
Xiao Wang is always fearless and never panics even when in danger.

jīnghuāngshīcuò

虽然迄今为止一直泰然自若，但他现在表现出一些惊慌。
The hecklers pelted the discombobulated speaker with anything that came to hand.
Nàxiē jīliè zhìwènzhě náqǐ shǒubiān de rènhé dōngxīxiàng jīnghuāngshīcuò de yǎnjiǎngzhě rēng qù。

这个小伙子总是慌里慌张的，老叫人不放心。
Zhège xiǎohuǒzi zǒngshì huānglǐhuāngzhāng de，lǎo jiào rén bú fàngxīn。
The young man is always in a fluster and doesn\'t seem to be very dependable.
神色慌张
shénsè huāngzhāng
look flurried (or flustered)
为什么这样慌慌张张的？
Wèishénme zhèyànghuānghuangzhāngzhang de?
Why are you so flustered?
他慌张得心里没了主。
Tā huāngzhāng de xīnlǐ méile zhǔ。
He was in such a state that he had no idea what to do next.
慌里慌张地跑进一个人来。
没人逼你，你慌张什么？
干吗那么慌慌张张？
He is such a smooth operator, he never looks flustered.
Tā shì yí gè rúcǐ yuánhuá de rén，kànshàngqù cónglái dōu bù huāngzhāng。
他是一个如此圆滑的人，看上去从来都不慌张。
He lost his bottle after seeing the crowd.
Kàndào rénqún，tā biàn de huāngzhāng qǐlái。
看到人群，他变得慌张起来。
The waiters were unflurried and good natured.
Zhèxiē shìzhě cóngbù huānglǐhuāngzhāng，érshì biǎoxiàn chū hěnhǎo de pǐnxìng。
这些侍者从不慌里慌张，而是表现出很好的品性。
慌忙赶到现场
huāngmánggǎndào xiànchǎng
rush to the spot
慌忙起身迎客
huānɡmánɡ qǐshēn yínɡkè 
hurriedly rise to greet one\'s guest
敌军调动慌忙，举措失当。
Díjūn diàodònghuāngmáng，jǔcuò shī dàng。
The enemy manoeuvred his troops in a disorderly way and made false moves.
他慢慢地，不慌不忙地从椅子上站起来，然后开始讲话。
Tā mànmàn de，bùhuāngbùmáng de cóngyǐzi shàngzhàn qǐlái，ránhòu kāishǐ jiǎnghuà。
Slowly and deliberately he rose from his chair and began to speak.
小王不慌不忙地走到台上，用余光扫视了一下众人。
Xiǎo Wáng bùhuāng bùmáng de zǒu dào tái shàng，yòng yúguāng sǎoshì le yíxià zhòngrén。
Xiaowang went to the stage calmly and took in everybody with a glance.
不慌不忙
bùhuāngbùmáng
unhurriedly
慌忙逃窜。
不慌不忙
老先生迈着八字步，不慌不忙地走过来。
She was in such a hurry to leave the court, she almost knocked him over.
Tā rúcǐ huāngmáng de líkāi fǎtíng，jīhū bǎ tā dōu zhuàngdǎo le。
她如此慌忙地离开法庭，几乎把他都撞倒了。
She proceeded unhurriedly.
Tā bùhuāngbùmáng de jìnxíngzhe。
她不慌不忙地进行着。
作好充分准备，免得临时慌乱
Zuòhǎo chōngfèn zhǔnbèi，miǎn de línshí huāngluàn。
make ample preparations so as not to be in a rush at the last moment
抢劫犯在慌乱逃窜时把抢来的珠宝遗撒一地。
Qiǎngjiéfàn zài huāngluàn táocuàn shí bǎ qiǎnglái de zhūbǎo yísǎ yí dì。
Stolen jewels littered the floor when the robbers fled in a hurry.
遇到这种麻烦事，他心慌意乱，不知所措。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng máfánshì，tā xīnhuāng-yìluàn，bùzhīsuǒcuò。
When he comes up against this kind of problem, he gets nervous and flustered and doesn\'t know what to do.
慌乱。
慌乱。
难以掩盖他慌乱的心情。
He stood back and just watched as she birthed her baby without fuss or noise.
Tā wǎnghòu zhàn，zhǐshì kànzhe tā shēngháizi，méiyǒu huāngluàn huò chǎonào。
他往后站，只是看着她生孩子，没有慌乱或吵闹。
More neighbours arrived, aroused by the frantic screaming.
Gèngduō de línjū láile，yǐnqǐle huāngluàn de yí zhèn jiānjiào。
更多的邻居来了，引起了慌乱的一阵尖叫。
I huddled on my clothes and hurried downstairs.
Wǒ huāngluàn dì chuān shàng yīfú ，gǎnjǐn xià lóu。
我慌乱地穿上衣服，赶紧下楼。
He blundered his stupid ideas.
Tā huāngluànzhōng jìngrán shuōchūle tā yúchǔn de guāndiǎn。
他慌乱中竟然说出了他愚蠢的观点。
I took the cigarette he offered, drawing at it raggedly.
Wǒ jiēguò tā gěi de yān，huāngluàn de xī qǐlái。
我接过他给的烟，慌乱地吸起来。
He was in a dither.
Tā hěn huāngluàn。
他很慌乱。
为什么这样慌慌张张的？
Wèishénme zhèyànghuānghuangzhāngzhang de?
Why are you so flustered?
干吗那么慌慌张张？
他慌张得心里没了主。
Tā huāngzhāng de xīnlǐ méile zhǔ。
He was in such a state that he had no idea what to do next.
心里憋得慌
xīnlǐ biē de huang
feel very much oppressed
看见下棋他就馋得慌。
Kànjiàn xiàqí tā jiù chán de huāng。
His fingers itch at the sight of a game of chess.
胸口堵得慌
xiōngkǒu dǔ de huang
feel suffocated; feel a tightness in the chest
心里闷得慌
xīnlǐ mēn dehuang
be bored beyond endurance
累得慌
lèi de huang
be tired out; be dog-tired; be played out
你一个人在家多闷得慌，我来和你就伴吧。
Nǐ yígèrén zài jiā duō mèn de huāng，wǒ lái hé nǐ jiùbàn ba。
Don\'t you feel bored staying at home all alone? Let me come and keep you company.
背包带太紧，勒得慌。
Bèibāodài tài jǐn，lēi de huang。
The pack straps are too tight. They cut into the flesh.
我觉得胸口闷得慌。
Wǒ jué de xiōngkǒu mèn de huang。
I feel like I can\'t breathe.
你一个人在这儿多闷得慌，跟我们出去走走吧！
Nǐ yígèrén zài zhèr duō mèn de huang，gēn wǒmen chūqù zǒuzǒu ba。
Don\'t you feel bored staying here all alone? Why not come out with us for a walk?
碘酒涂在伤口上真杀得慌。
Diǎnjiǔ tú zài shāngkǒu shàngzhēn shā de huāng。
Iodine smarts when it is put on a cut.
这里晒得慌。
Zhèlǐ shài de huang。
There\'s too much sun here.
瘆得慌
shèn de huāng
be horrified
事情没办好，心里老觉得窝憋得慌。
Shìqingméi bànhǎo，xīn lǐ lǎo jué de wōbie de huāng。
I feel frustrated about having botched the job.
碘酒擦在伤口上蜇得慌。
Diǎnjiǔ cāzài shāngkǒu shàngzhē de huāng。
Iodine smarts when it is put on a cut.
整个假期他都呆在家里，却一点也不感觉憋得慌。
Zhěnggè jiàqī tā dōu dāi zài jiā lǐ，què yìdiǎn yě bùgǎnjué biē de huāng。
He didn’t feel bored at all staying at home the entire vacation.
总呆在屋里憋得慌。
Zǒng dāizài wūlǐ biēdehuāng。
Staying indoors all day will make you feel absolutely suffocated.
我一人在家闷得慌，幸好你来串门。
Wǒ yì rén zài jiā mēn de huāng，xìnghǎo nǐ lái chuànmén。
I was really bored at home by myself – lucky for me you came by!
作好充分准备，免得临时慌乱
Zuòhǎo chōngfèn zhǔnbèi，miǎn de línshí huāngluàn。
make ample preparations so as not to be in a rush at the last moment
夏日的太阳总是火辣辣的，晒得人发慌。
Xiàrì de tàiyáng zǒngshì huǒlàlà de，shài de rén fāhuāng。
The summer sun shines ruthlessly, which makes one feel sick.
屋子不通风，让人憋得慌

他的话叫人气得慌。

xiōngkǒu dǔ de huang

她虽是第一次当众讲话，却一点都不发慌。
Tā suī shì dìyīcì dāngzhòng jiǎnghuà，què yìdiǎn dōu bùfāhuāng。
She didn\'t feel a bit nervous though it was the first time she\'d spoken in public.

沉住气，别慌！
Chénzhùqì，bié huāng！
Keep calm! Don\'t panic!
慌了手脚
huāng le shǒujiǎo 
be alarmed and confused; be flustered
慌作一团
huāngzuò yìtuán 
be thrown into utter confusion
心里闷得慌
xīnlǐ mēn dehuang
be bored beyond endurance
累得慌
lèi de huang
be tired out; be dog-tired; be played out
慌不择路，饥不择食
huāngbùzélù，jībùzéshí
You\'ll take any road when you\'re panicky and any food when you\'re hungry.
作好充分准备，免得临时慌乱
Zuòhǎo chōngfèn zhǔnbèi，miǎn de línshí huāngluàn。
make ample preparations so as not to be in a rush at the last moment
慌忙赶到现场
huāngmánggǎndào xiànchǎng
rush to the spot
慌忙起身迎客
huānɡmánɡ qǐshēn yínɡkè 
hurriedly rise to greet one\'s guest
进考场不能慌神儿。
Jìn kǎochǎngbùnéng huāngshénr。
Be sure to remain coolheaded in the examination room
神色慌张
shénsè huāngzhāng
look flurried (or flustered)
惊慌不安
jīnɡhuānɡ bù\'ān
jittery; nervy
惊慌的神色
jīnghuāng de shénsè
frightened looks
没有半点惊慌
méiyǒu bàndiǎn jīnghuāng
not in the least scared
你一个人在家多闷得慌，我来和你就伴吧。
Nǐ yígèrén zài jiā duō mèn de huāng，wǒ lái hé nǐ jiùbàn ba。
Don\'t you feel bored staying at home all alone? Let me come and keep you company.
敌军调动慌忙，举措失当。
Díjūn diàodònghuāngmáng，jǔcuò shī dàng。
The enemy manoeuvred his troops in a disorderly way and made false moves.
恐慌万状
kǒnghuāngwànzhuàng
panic-stricken
地震在全市引起了恐慌。
Dìzhèn zài quán shì yǐnqǐ le kǒnghuāng。
The earthquake caused a panic in the city.
背包带太紧，勒得慌。
Bèibāodài tài jǐn，lēi de huang。
The pack straps are too tight. They cut into the flesh.
临场要沉着，不要慌。
Línchǎngyào chénzhuó，búyào huāng。
Keep calm during the exam. Don\'t panic.
他表面上装出一副满不在乎的样子，内心却是恐慌的。
Tā biǎomiàn shàngzhuāngchū yífù mǎnbúzàihu de yàngzi，nèixīn què shì kǒnghuāng de。
Although feigning complete indifference, he was actually terrified.
我觉得胸口闷得慌。
Wǒ jué de xiōngkǒu mèn de huang。
I feel like I can\'t breathe.
你一个人在这儿多闷得慌，跟我们出去走走吧！
Nǐ yígèrén zài zhèr duō mèn de huang，gēn wǒmen chūqù zǒuzǒu ba。
Don\'t you feel bored staying here all alone? Why not come out with us for a walk?
碘酒涂在伤口上真杀得慌。
Diǎnjiǔ tú zài shāngkǒu shàngzhēn shā de huāng。
Iodine smarts when it is put on a cut.
这里晒得慌。
Zhèlǐ shài de huang。
There\'s too much sun here.
瘆得慌
shèn de huāng
be horrified
事情没办好，心里老觉得窝憋得慌。
Shìqingméi bànhǎo，xīn lǐ lǎo jué de wōbie de huāng。
I feel frustrated about having botched the job.
我考试的时候心慌。
Wǒ kǎoshì de shíhou xīnhuāng。
I was nervous while I was taking the exam.
他心里有底，一点不慌。
Tā xīnlǐ yǒudǐ，yìdiǎn bùhuāng。
He was not at all nervous, for he knew what to expect.
遇事不慌
yùshì bù huānɡ
be unruffled whatever happens
这下子他可着慌了。
Zhè xiàzi tā kě zháohuāng le。
At that point he panicked.
碘酒擦在伤口上蜇得慌。
Diǎnjiǔ cāzài shāngkǒu shàngzhē de huāng。
Iodine smarts when it is put on a cut.
惊慌失措
jīnghuāngshīcuò
frightened out of one\'s wits; seized with panic; panic-stricken
整个假期他都呆在家里，却一点也不感觉憋得慌。
Zhěnggè jiàqī tā dōu dāi zài jiā lǐ，què yìdiǎn yě bùgǎnjué biē de huāng。
He didn’t feel bored at all staying at home the entire vacation.
我一时慌促，把杯子打翻了。
Wǒ yìshí huāngcù，bǎ bēizi dǎfān le。
I struck the cup down in a sudden fit of furry.
听说皇上驾到，牢头禁子们都惊慌不已。
Tīngshuō huángshàng jiàdào，láotóu jìnzimen dōu jīnghuāng bùyǐ。
The jail guards were panic-stricken on hearing that the emperor was coming.
夏日的太阳总是火辣辣的，晒得人发慌。
Xiàrì de tàiyáng zǒngshì huǒlàlà de，shài de rén fāhuāng。
The summer sun shines ruthlessly, which makes one feel sick.
小王总是临危不惧，哪怕身处险地也毫不惊慌。
Xiǎo Wáng zǒngshì línwēibújù，nǎ pà shēnchǔ xiǎndì yě háobùjīnghuāng。
Xiao Wang is always fearless and never panics even when in danger.
抢劫犯在慌乱逃窜时把抢来的珠宝遗撒一地。
Qiǎngjiéfàn zài huāngluàn táocuàn shí bǎ qiǎnglái de zhūbǎo yísǎ yí dì。
Stolen jewels littered the floor when the robbers fled in a hurry.
用脑过度也会引起头晕、心慌、收悸等症状。
Yòngnǎo guòdù yě huì yǐnqǐ tóuyūn、xīnhuāng、shōujì děng zhèngzhuàng。
Excessive use of the brain causes dizziness, palpitation, contractional palpitations and other symptoms.
小王不慌不忙地走到台上，用余光扫视了一下众人。
Xiǎo Wáng bùhuāng bùmáng de zǒu dào tái shàng，yòng yúguāng sǎoshì le yíxià zhòngrén。
Xiaowang went to the stage calmly and took in everybody with a glance.
总呆在屋里憋得慌。
Zǒng dāizài wūlǐ biēdehuāng。
Staying indoors all day will make you feel absolutely suffocated.
不慌不忙
bùhuāngbùmáng
unhurriedly
惊慌失措
jīnghuāngshīcuò
be scared out of one\'s wits
遇到这种麻烦事，他心慌意乱，不知所措。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng máfánshì，tā xīnhuāng-yìluàn，bùzhīsuǒcuò。
When he comes up against this kind of problem, he gets nervous and flustered and doesn\'t know what to do.
我一人在家闷得慌，幸好你来串门。
Wǒ yì rén zài jiā mēn de huāng，xìnghǎo nǐ lái chuànmén。
I was really bored at home by myself – lucky for me you came by!
他慌张得心里没了主。
Tā huāngzhāng de xīnlǐ méile zhǔ。
He was in such a state that he had no idea what to do next.
慌里慌张地跑进一个人来。
干吗那么慌慌张张？
屋子不通风，让人憋得慌
看到好衣服就馋得慌

心里烦得慌
袖子太瘦，箍得慌
沉住气，不要慌

慌乱。

他的话叫人气得慌。

慌乱。

球队训练有素，临战一点儿不慌。

慌忙逃窜。

没人逼你，你慌张什么？
在敌人面前，他毫不惊慌。
恐慌的神色。
消除恐慌。
惊慌失措。
慌了手脚
你又没做坏事，心慌什么？
饿得心慌。
心慌盗汗。
胆大心细，遇事不慌。
造次之间慌不择路。
The waiters were unflurried and good natured.
Zhèxiē shìzhě cóngbù huānglǐhuāngzhāng，érshì biǎoxiàn chū hěnhǎo de pǐnxìng。
这些侍者从不慌里慌张，而是表现出很好的品性。
a consummate liar
说慌老手
cured him of lying
纠正他说慌(的恶习)
to rattle a speaker with catcalls
用嘘声使讲演人发慌
a war scare
战争恐慌
to strike terror to the heart
使大为恐慌
A big swarm of bees started following Claire who ran away terrified.
一大群蜜蜂开始尾随惊慌逃跑的克莱尔。
Keep cool, don\'t push the panic botton!
冷静，不要惊慌失措！
to be in a flap (about {or} over sth)
[inf] (对某事)慌作一团
to do sth in a panic
惊慌失措地做某事
to get into a panic
陷入恐慌
a bomb/security scare
炸弹/安全恐慌
The high crime rate created a climate of fear in the town.
高犯罪率导致这个镇布满了恐慌的气氛。
A bomb scare necessitated people to evacuate the building.
炸弹的恐慌迫使人们撤离了这个建筑。
People are beginning to get twitchy about all the bad news.
大家听到这些消息都惊慌起来.
We can affiliate the widespread panic to the irresponsible words of the minister.
我们可以把这大范围的恐慌归咎于那位部长不负责任的发言。
Great confusion occurred when the stock market crashed.
股市崩盘引起了极大的恐慌。
His face fell when he heard the terrible news.
Tīngdào zhège kǒngbù de xiāoxi zhīhòu，tā miànlù jīnghuāng。
听到这个恐怖的消息之后，他面露惊慌。
The attack has left the family terrified for their safety.
Zhècì xíjī lìng zhè jiā rén xiànrù jīnghuāng，fēicháng dānxīn ānquán wèntí。
这次袭击令这家人陷入惊慌，非常担心安全问题。
The victims were filled with terror when they saw the assailant.
Shòuhàizhě kàndào xíngxiōngzhě shí jīnghuāngbùyǐ。
受害者看到行凶者时惊慌不已。
She thought herself into a panic over the deadline.
Xiǎngdào zuìhòuqīxiàn，tā bùjīn jīnghuāngshīcuò。
想到最后期限，她不禁惊慌失措。
The oil discharge caused panic among conservationists.
Yuányóu xièlòu shǐ zìrán bǎohùzhǔyì zhě fēicháng kǒnghuāng。
原油泄露使自然保护主义者非常恐慌。
Gold\'s advance is a product of fear in the market.
Huángjīn jiàgé shàngzhǎng shì yóuyú shìchǎng zhōng de kǒnghuāng suǒ zàochéng de。
黄金价格上涨是由于市场中的恐慌所造成的。
He stood back and just watched as she birthed her baby without fuss or noise.
Tā wǎnghòu zhàn，zhǐshì kànzhe tā shēngháizi，méiyǒu huāngluàn huò chǎonào。
他往后站，只是看着她生孩子，没有慌乱或吵闹。
For the last five years, a good friend of mine has suffered from panic attacks.
Wǒ de yí wèi hǎoyǒu guòqù wǔ nián lǐ shòu jìn le kǒnghuāng zhèng de zhémó。
我的一位好友过去五年里受尽了恐慌症的折磨。
I had an awful pain in my chest and started to panic.
Wǒ de xiōngkǒu yí zhèn jùliè de téngtòng，wǒ kāishǐ jīnghuāngshīcuò le。
我的胸口一阵剧烈的疼痛，我开始惊慌失措了。
More neighbours arrived, aroused by the frantic screaming.
Gèngduō de línjū láile，yǐnqǐle huāngluàn de yí zhèn jiānjiào。
更多的邻居来了，引起了慌乱的一阵尖叫。
She was in such a hurry to leave the court, she almost knocked him over.
Tā rúcǐ huāngmáng de líkāi fǎtíng，jīhū bǎ tā dōu zhuàngdǎo le。
她如此慌忙地离开法庭，几乎把他都撞倒了。
He is such a smooth operator, he never looks flustered.
Tā shì yí gè rúcǐ yuánhuá de rén，kànshàngqù cónglái dōu bù huāngzhāng。
他是一个如此圆滑的人，看上去从来都不慌张。
The panic which ensued from the statement would destroy the beef industry.

因这份声明而引发的恐慌可能会摧毁牛肉行业。
The patient may have an attack of panic after waking up.
Xǐnglái zhī hòu， zhège bìngrén fēicháng kǒnghuāng。
醒来之后，这个病人非常恐慌。
I huddled on my clothes and hurried downstairs.
Wǒ huāngluàn dì chuān shàng yīfú ，gǎnjǐn xià lóu。
我慌乱地穿上衣服，赶紧下楼。
He lost his bottle after seeing the crowd.
Kàndào rénqún，tā biàn de huāngzhāng qǐlái。
看到人群，他变得慌张起来。
He was panicking over the loss of his wallet.
Tā diūle qiánbāo，zhèngzài jīnghuāngshīcuò ne。
他丢了钱包，正在惊慌失措呢。
It is worth to panic over.

慢慢来，不要慌。

人们对盗窃事件感到极为恐慌。

He was in a dither.

他很慌乱。

因袭前人
yīnxí qiánrén 
follow in the footsteps of one\'s predecessors
因袭
yīnxí
follow (old customs, methods, rules, etc.); copy

因袭。

因袭故事
因袭旧制。
因袭守旧。

To prevent livestock from harmful animals\' attack, the villagers spontaneously form night patrols.

滴定管
dīdìngguǎn

It is a Chinese traditional holiday to worship the Kitchen God, which is also called the &quot;Small Spring Festival\'.
大人们忙着收拾祭幛，可孩子们却在嬉闹，大概他们并不知道发生了什么事情。
Dàrénmen máng zhe shōushi jìzhàng，kě háizimen què zài xīnào，dàgài tāmen bìng bùzhīdào fāshēng le shénme shìqing。
Adults are busy putting scrolls of cloth in preparation for a sacrifice, but the children are still playing. They probably don\'t know what has happened.
每年家里都要家祭，人人都得参加。
Měinián jiā lǐ dōuyào jiājì，rénrén dōu děi cānjiā。

现在村子里死了人，都不再举行路祭了。
Xiànzài cūnzi lǐ sǐ le rén，dōu búzài jǔxíng lùjì le。
Now when a villager dies, people no longer offer sacrifices by the roadside as the funeral procession passes.
清明节那天我们在墓园里墓祭了烈士们的英灵。
Qīngmíngjié nàtiān wǒmen zài mùyuán lǐ mùjì le lièshìmen de yīnglíng。
On the Tomb Sweeping Day, we held a memorial service for the martyrs at the cemetery.
清明那天我跟随着老师去陪祭了他的母亲。
Qīngmíng nàtiān wǒ gēnsuí zhe lǎoshī qù péijì le tā de mǔqīn。
I assisted my teacher in presiding over the memorial ceremony of his mother on Tomb Sweeping Day.
他每年都要祭扫爷爷的青冢。
Tā měinián dōuyào jìsǎo yéye de qīngzhǒng。
He offers sacrifices at his grandpa\'s grave every year.
清明节是祭奠逝者的日子。
Qīngmíngjié shì jìdiàn shìzhě de rìzi。
Tomb Sweeping Day is a holiday on which we hold a memorial ceremony for the dead.
村里每年都要举行祭祀神祇的仪式。
Cūn lǐ měinián dōuyào jǔxíng jìsì shénqí de yíshì。
Ceremonies to worship gods are held every year in the village.
皇帝每年都要祭祀神主。
Huángdì měinián dōuyào jìsì shénzhǔ。
Emperors had to worship gods every year.
村子后面的山上有个土地庙，我时常去拜祭。
Cūnzi hòumiàn de shān shàng yǒu gè tǔdìmiào，wǒ shícháng qù bàijì。
There is a temple housing the god of earth on the hill at the back of the village, I often go there to worship.
在古时候这种祭祀仪式已经戏剧化了。
Zài gǔshíhou zhèzhǒng jìsì yíshì yǐjing xìjùhuà le。
In ancient times, this kind of sacrificial ceremony was already dramatized.
每次祭祀祖先时，祖父都会提前将香纸准备好。
Měi cì jìsì zǔxiān shí，zǔfù dōuhuì tíqián jiāng xiāngzhǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo。
My grandfather always prepares the joss sticks and candles in advance every time we go to make a sacrifice to our ancestors.
今天小年，妈妈一大早就起床忙祭灶了。
Jīntiān xiǎonián，māma yídàzǎo jiù qǐchuáng máng jìzào le。
Today is small New Year and my mother gets up early to make a sacrifice to the kitchen god.
根据我们这里的风俗，小年夜家家户户都要祭灶。
Gēnjù wǒmen zhèlǐ de fēngsú，xiǎoniányè jiājiāhùhù dōuyào jìzào。
It is our custom to make a sacrifice to the kitchen god on the night before lunar New Year\'s Eve.
奶奶每年都会去岳庙祭祀。
Nǎinai měinián dōuhuì qù yuèmiào jìsì。
Every year, Grandma would go to the temple of Yuefei to offer sacrifices to the gods.
他是我们邀请来的主祭嘉宾。
Tā shì wǒmen yāoqǐng lái de zhǔjì jiābīn。
He is the funeral official we invited.

shāo xùn yì chóu
be slightly inferior
毫无逊色
háo wú xùnsè
be by no means inferior

yácí bú xùn
make impertinent remarks; speak insolently

bōzhuǎn mǎtóu

Gēnggǎi shízhì hòu，bǎ zhōng bōkuài yí gè xiǎoshí。
更改时制后，把钟拨快一个小时。
The computer showed a window saying it had set the clock ahead.
Diànnǎo tán chū yí gè chuāngkǒu，shēngchēng tā yǐ bǎ shízhōng wǎng qián bō le。
电脑弹出一个窗口，声称它已把时钟往前拨了。
During the spring, we set the clocks forward, and the trouble begins.
Chūntiān，wǒmen bǎ biǎo wǎngqián bō，máfan kāishǐ chūxiàn。
春天，我们把表往前拨，麻烦开始出现。
It really killed me to set that clock ahead one hour.
Bǎ nàge zhōng wǎngqián bōle yí gè xiǎoshí zhēnshì yào le wǒ de mìng。
把那个钟往前拨了一个小时真是要了我的命。
No expense was spared for Peter\'s home entertainment system.
Méiyǒu néng wèi Bǐdé de jiātíng yúlè xìtǒng bō chū de duōyú kāizhī。
没有能为彼得的家庭娱乐系统拨出的多余开支。
Of course we cannot wind back the clock: we cannot physically reverse history.
Wǒmen dāngrán bù néng nìshízhēn bōdòng shízhōng ： wǒmen gēnběn bù néng nìzhuǎn lìshǐ。
我们当然不能逆时针拨动时钟：我们根本不能逆转历史。
You must take the receiver off the hook before you dial.
Bōhào qián nǐ bìxū bǎ tīngtǒng cóng huàjī dǐzuò shàng ná xiàlái。
拨号前你必须把听筒从话机底座上拿下来。
Our grant has run out and we cannot keep you on.
Wǒmen de bōkuǎn yòng wánle，yīncǐ wǒmen méifǎ zài liúyòng nǐ le。
我们的拨款用完了，因此我们没法再留用你了。
The grant administrator visited the laboratory.
Guǎnlǐ bōkuǎn de xíngzhèng guānyuán zǒufǎngle zhè jiān Shíyànshì。
管理拨款的行政官员走访了这间实验室。
They wheeled their horses around and left.
Tāmen bō zhuǎn mǎtóu líkāi le。
他们拨转马头离开了。
He plucked the strings of his mandolin.
Tā bōdòng màntuólín de qínxián。
他拨动曼陀林的琴弦。
Funds are granted to qualified researchers.
Zījīn bō gěi nàxiē hégé de yánjiūzhě。
资金拨给那些合格的研究者。
The necessary funds were obtained by the government\'s appropriation of the company\'s operating unit.
Zhèngfǔ bōkuǎn shǐ nà jiā gōngsī de yùnyíng bùmén huòdéle bìyào de zījīn。
政府拨款使那家公司的运营部门获得了必要的资金。
Our positions here at the university are rather insecurely supported by grant money.
Zài zhè suǒ dàxué lǐ，wǒmen zhèyàng de zhíwèi hěn kěnéng zhēngqǔ búdào cáizhèng bōkuǎn。
在这所大学里，我们这样的职位很可能争取不到财政拨款。
Money was allocated to study the cause and prevention of influenza.
Bō chū zījīn lái yánjiū liúgǎn de qǐyīn hé fángzhì。
拨出资金来研究流感的起因和防治。
There were so many callers that he finally disconnected the telephone.
Duō dǎdiànhuà de rén nàmeduō，zuìhòu tā bùdébù bǎ diànhuàxiàn bōle。
多打电话的人那么多，最后他不得不把电话线拨了。
The commission has discretionary power to award extra funds.
Gāi wěiyuánhuì yǒuquán zìxíngjuédìng éwài huàbō zījīn。
该委员会有权自行决定额外划拨资金。
The act provided a continuing annual appropriation.
Zhè yī fǎ\'àn tígōngle chíxù de niándù bōkuǎn。
这一法案提供了持续的年度拨款。
He could hear the thrum of a banjo.
Tā néng tīngjiàn yǒu rén bōnong bānzhuóqín de shēngyīn。
他能听见有人拨弄班卓琴的声音。
The bowstring was twanging.
Gōngxián fāchū bō xián yīn。
弓弦发出拨弦音。
I will earmark this money for your research.

The cost overrun necessitated an additional allocation of funds in the budget.
Yóuyú cúnzài guò duō de zhīchū，suǒyǐ yǒu bìyào zài yùsuàn zhōng zēngjiā éwài bōkuǎn。
由于存在过多的支出，所以有必要在预算中增加额外拨款。
He twanged the guitar string.
Tā bōdòng jítā qínxián。
他拨动吉他琴弦。
He twanged his bow.
Tā ràng qíngōng fāchū bōxiányīn。
他让琴弓发出拨弦音。
We put in a grant to the NSF.
Wǒmen xiàng Guójiā kēxué Jījīnhuì bōle yì bǐ kuǎn。
我们向国家科学基金会拨了一笔款。
Block grants reduce federal responsibility for social welfare.

联邦政府发给地方的固定拨款减轻了联邦政府在社会福利方面上的责任。
In case of trouble call 911.
Rúguǒ yùdào wèntí，qǐng bōdǎ jiǔ yī yī。

去掉孤傲习气
qùdiào ɡū\'ào xíqì
rid oneself of aloofness and arrogance
成功不骄傲，失败不灰心。
Chénɡɡōnɡ bù jiāo\'ào, shībài bù huīxīn。 
When you succeed don\'t get conceited; when you fail don\'t be dejected.
我们永远不能骄傲，不能翘尾巴。
Wǒmen yǒngyuǎn bùnéng jiāo\'ào，bùnéng qiào wěiba。

民族的骄傲
mínzú de jiāo\'ào 
the pride of the nation

Granted you have not done badly, still there is no reason to be conceited.

力戒骄傲
lìjiè jiāo\'ào 
guard against arrogance

Things are easing up.
大势所趋，人心所向
dàshì suǒqū，rénxīn suǒ xiàng
the trend of the times and the desire of the people; the general trend and popular feeling
风势渐趋缓和。
Fēngshì jiān qū huǎnhé。
The wind is subsiding.
计算机联网已成为趋势。
Jìsuànjī liánwǎngyǐ chéngwéi qūshì。
The trend is towards computer networking.
这个文学流派从此日趋没落。
Zhège wénxué liúpài cóngcǐ rìqū mòluò。
This school of literature has since been on the wane.
趋前
qū qián
hasten forward
疾趋而过
jíqū érguò
hurry past
局势趋于稳定。
Júshì qūyú wěndìng。
The situation is tending towards stability.
他们的意见趋于一致。
Tāmen de yìjiàn qūyú yízhì。
They are reaching unanimity.
趋避路旁
qūbì lù páng
dodge to one side of the road; get out of the way
趋附权贵
qūfù quánguì
curry favour with bigwigs
世界历史的总趋势任何人也改变不了。
Shìjiè lìshǐ de zǒngqūshì rènhé rén yě gǎibiàn bùliǎo。
No one can change the general trend of world history.
财政情况日益趋向好转。
Cáizhèng qíngkuàng rìyì qūxiàng hǎozhuǎn。
The financial situation is taking a favourable turn.
总趋向
zǒngqūxiàng
general trend

Shìchǎng rìqū fánróng。
The market is becoming brisker day by day.
环境污染问题日趋严重。
Huánjìng wūrǎn wèntí rìqū yánzhòng。

zǒnɡqūshì 
general trend
趋之若鹜
qūzhīruòwù
go after sth. like a flock of ducks; scramble for sth.
城市化是社会发展的必然趋势。
Chéngshìhuà shì shèhuì fāzhǎn de bìrán qūshì。
Urbanization is an inevitable trend of social development.
随着社会经济的发展，持卡族的群体呈扩大趋势。
Suí zhe shèhuì jīngjì de fāzhǎn，chíkǎzú de qúntǐ chéng kuòdà qūshì。
With the development of the social economy, groups of card-holders show a tendency to expand.
飞蛾扑火是因为它们有趋光性。
Fēi\'é pūhuǒ shì yīnwèi tāmen yǒu qūguāngxìng。
A moth darts into a flame because it has phototaxistic.
现在人们购买笔记本电脑并不是简单的以文字和数据处理为主要功能，而是趋向应用集成化。
Xiànzài rénmen gòumǎi bǐjìběn diànnǎo bìng búshì jiǎndān de yǐ wénzì hé shùjù chǔlǐ wéi zhǔyào gōngnéng，érshì qū xiàng yìngyòng jíchénghuà。
Nowadays, people are not buying laptops to simply process words and digits, but to make an integrated use of all its functions.

Lítuìxiū rényuán de shèhuì bǎozhàng tǐxì zài rìqū wánshàn，qí mùdì shì shǐ lǎorén nénggòu āndù wǎnnián。
The social security system for employees who have left or retired from their posts is gradually established. Its purpose is to allow the elderly to live a comfortable, and peaceful life.
龙虱在水能游，出水能飞，并有很强的趋光性。
Lóngshī zài shuǐ néng yóu，chū shuǐ néng fēi，bìng yǒu hěnqiáng de qūguāngxìng。
Water beetles can swim in water, fly in the air, and have strong phototaxis.
利用蚊子的趋光性，专家发明了一种灭蚊器。
Lìyòng wénzi de qūguāngxìng，zhuānjiā fāmíng le yìzhǒng mièwénqì。
Scientists invented a mosquito-repellent device using mosquito\'s phototaxis.
服用过镇静剂以后，他过于激动的情绪逐渐趋缓。
Fúyòng guò zhènjìngjì yǐhòu，tā guòyú jīdòng de qíngxù zhújiàn qūhuǎn。
His over-excited emotions gradually calmed down after taking the sedative.
随着期末的临近，我们的学习日益趋紧。
Suí zhe qīmò de línjìn，wǒmen de xuéxí rìyì qūjǐn。
As the end of the semester is coming, our study is becoming more tense.
营销人员个个口齿伶俐，说话趋利避害。
Yíngxiāo rényuán gègè kǒuchǐ línglì，shuōhuà qūlì bìhài。
All salesmen have a slick tongue, they will push the advantages and avoid the disadvantages when they speak.
这是一本趋时的杂志，很能引领潮流。

It\'s a trendy magazine, which can lead fashion.
这个软件的界面设计趋于人性化。

印刷体例
yìnshuā tǐlì 
style sheet; stylebook
上级要求所有的海报中的字必须采用印刷体。
Shàngjí yāoqiú suǒyǒu de hǎibào zhōng de zì bìxū cǎiyòng yìnshuātǐ。
The superior requires that the characters in all posters be printed in block form.
立体印刷
lìtǐ yìnshuā 
stereoscopic printing; three-dimensional printing
to letter a poster
用印刷体写标语
to letter one\'s name
用印刷体写(某人的)名字
print the name
用印刷体写名字
the fine {or} small print
小号印刷体
fine print
契约、证券等含有限制条件、例外等的附属细则(其印刷字体较正文小)
uneven print
排列不齐的印刷字体

你必须密切注意小号印刷字体。
上级要求所有的海报中的字必须采用印刷体。
Shàngjí yāoqiú suǒyǒu de hǎibào zhōng de zì bìxū cǎiyòng yìnshuātǐ。
The superior requires that the characters in all posters be printed in block form.
The press had an error, so all the newspapers printed are useless.
印刷时出了个错，所有报纸都作废了。
The printer inks out the selected word.
Gāi yìnshuāgōng yòng mòshuǐ tú qùsuǒ xuǎn zhī cí。
该印刷工用墨水涂去所选之词。
印刷术是中国首先发明的。
Yìnshuāshù shì zhōng guó shǒuxiān fāmíng de。
Printing was first invented by the Chinese.
借助珂啍版印刷术，我们复制出了几幅完美逼真的敦煌壁画。
Jièzhù kēhēngbǎn yìnshuāshù，wǒmen fùzhì chū le jǐ fú wánměi bīzhēn de dūnhuáng bìhuà。
With the help of collotype printing, we copied several Dunhuang frescoes, which are quite similar to the originals.
印刷术的发明于人类非常有益。
Yìnshuāshù de fāmíng yú rénlèi fēicháng yǒuyì。
The invention of printing was of great benefit to humanity.
宋朝的人已经使用活字版印刷技术了。
Sòngcháo de rén yǐjing shǐyòng huózìbǎn yìnshuā jìshù le。
People in the Song Dynasty already used letterpress type to print.
激光照排这项技术现在已经被广泛的运用在印刷业。
Jīguāng zhàopái zhè xiàng jìshù xiànzài yǐjing bèi guǎngfàn de yùnyòng zài yìnshuāyè。
Laser photographing and type-setting are widely used in printing.
Photomechanics revolutionized the practice of printing.
Zhàoxiàng zhìbǎn yìnshuāshù shǐ yìnshuā fāngfǎ fāshēngle gémìngxìng biànhuà。
照相制版印刷术使印刷方法发生了革命性变化。
The invention of printing in the 16th century resulted in a rapid spread of literacy.
16 shìjì yìnshuāshù de fāmíng shǐ wénhuà déyǐ kuàisù chuánbō。
16世纪印刷术的发明使文化得以快速传播。
Gutenberg\'s reproduction of holy texts was far more efficient.
Gǔténgbǎo de diǎnjí yìnshuāshù yào gāoxiào de duō。
古腾堡的典籍印刷术要高效得多。
邮寄印刷品请到专门的印刷品窗口办理。
Yóujì yìnshuāpǐn qǐng dào zhuānmén de yìnshuāpǐn chuāngkǒu bànlǐ。
For mailing printed items, please go to the special window for printed items.
办公室每天都会收到各种各样的印刷品。
Bàngōngshì měitiān dōuhuì shōudào gèzhǒnggèyàng de yìnshuāpǐn。
The office receives various printed items every day.
邮递印刷品很便宜。
Yóudì yìnshuāpǐn hěn piányi。
It\'s very cheap to send printed matter by post.
电子系统印刷线路板(PCB)是电子信息产品的基本构成要件。
To be valuable, prints must be good impressions on good quality paper.
Yào bǎozhèng gāopǐnzhì，yìnshuāpǐn bìxū shǐyòng gāozhìliàng de yìnbǎn hé zhǐzhāng。
要保证高品质，印刷品必须使用高质量的印版和纸张。
The old print fetched a high price at the auction.
Zhè bù jiù yìnshuāpǐn zài pāimàihuì shàng pāichūle hǎo jiàqián。
这部旧印刷品在拍卖会上拍出了好价钱。
He needed his glasses in order to read the fine print.
Tā xūyào yǎnjìng，yǐbiàn yuèdú nà fèn xiǎozì yìnshuāpǐn。
他需要眼镜，以便阅读那份小字印刷品。

letterpress (printing) machine
胶版印刷机
jiāobǎn yìnshuājī

The printing house has just bought photocomposition equipment.

卷筒印刷机。

他有印刷机和用来印刷书本和小册子的刻板。
This automatic printer can print 120 pages a minute.
这台自动印刷机每分钟能印一百二十页。
The presses rolled.
印刷机开始转了起来。
We have to keep each press in the plant on a 14-hour run.
我们必须让厂里的每台印刷机每天都保持14小时的作业时间。

我们每期的杂志都是交由这个印刷厂誊印的。

Every edition of our magazine is sent to that printing house for printing.
这个印刷厂现在的主要工作就是承印运动会的门票。
Zhège yìnshuāchǎng xiànzài de zhǔyào gōngzuò jiùshì chéngyìn yùndònghuì de ménpiào。
The press is undertaking the printing of tickets to the athletic meeting.
他以前是印刷厂的一名刻工。
Tā yǐqián shì yìnshuāchǎng de yìmíng kègōng。
He was once an engraver in a printing factory.
印刷厂新买了一台照排机。
Yìnshuāchǎng xīnmǎi le yìtái zhàopáijī。
The printing house has just bought photocomposition equipment.
警方取缔了这家印刷盗版图书的地下工厂。
Jǐngfāng qǔdì le zhè jiā yìnshuā dàobǎn túshū de dìxià gōngchǎng。
The police have banned this illegal factory that printed pirated books.
We have to keep each press in the plant on a 14-hour run.
我们必须让厂里的每台印刷机每天都保持14小时的作业时间。

This collotype of the Mona Lisa is exquisitely printed.
这本书的雕版已经刻好了，随时可以印刷。

This book\'s engraved copy has been finished and we can start printing at any time.
套色版已经制作完成了，随时都可以开始印刷。

用刻版印刷。

The following paragraph does not appear in the printed version.

以下段落在印刷版本中没有出现。
Alternatively, printed versions can be purchased on request.

The most common form of relief printing is woodcut.
最常见的凸版印刷形式是木刻印版。
Each hard copy book will be printed with a soft cover.
每本硬皮书印刷出版时都会带个软书皮。
Hardy had to pay £75 towards the cost of printing a first edition of 500 copies.
Hādài bùdébù wèi dì-yī cì yìnshuā chūbǎn de wǔbǎi fèn zhīfù qīshíwǔ yīngbàng de fèiyòng。
哈代不得不为第一次印刷出版的500份支付75英镑的费用。
Relief printing is the oldest form of printmaking.
凸版印刷是最古老的版画制作形式。

Text composition is the most complicated task in the text phase of desktop publishing.
Wénzì páibǎn shì zhuōmiàn yìnshuā de wénzì guòchéng zhōng zuì fùzá de gōngzuò。
文字排版是桌面印刷的文字过程中最复杂的工作。
Coated paper has a smooth polished coating especially suitable for halftone printing.
Tóngbǎnzhǐ yǒu guānghuá de wài mó，cóng\'ér shǐ qí tèbié shìhéyú bàntiáosè yìnshuā。

在印刷之前纸张要正确拼版，才能确保印出的正确、可读。
fine print
契约、证券等含有限制条件、例外等的附属细则(其印刷字体较正文小)
get the copy to the printer
把稿子送到印刷工手里
to letter a poster
用印刷体写标语
to letter one\'s name
用印刷体写(某人的)名字
the Printing Office
印刷局
uneven print
排列不齐的印刷字体
print the name
用印刷体写名字
The presses rolled.
印刷机开始转了起来。
a printing shop
印刷车间
The press had an error, so all the newspapers printed are useless.
印刷时出了个错，所有报纸都作废了。
We have to keep each press in the plant on a 14-hour run.
我们必须让厂里的每台印刷机每天都保持14小时的作业时间。
Each hard copy book will be printed with a soft cover.
每本硬皮书印刷出版时都会带个软书皮。
We need to cut our print medium advertising costs.
我们需要减少印刷宣传媒介的广告费用。
the fine {or} small print
小号印刷体
Bi Sheng invented movable type printing.
毕升发明了活字印刷。
Relief printing is the oldest form of printmaking.
凸版印刷是最古老的版画制作形式。
The Bible is the most published book in the history of the world.
《Shèngjīng》shì lìshǐ shàng zài quánshìjiè yìnshuā liàng zuìdà de shū。
《圣经》是历史上在全世界印刷量最大的书。
The books were printed and bound in plastic.
Zhèxiē shū yòng sùliào yìnshuā hé zhuāngdìng。
这些书用塑料印刷和装订。
The brochure was printed on 100 % recycled paper.
Zhè běn xiǎocèzǐ shì yòng 100% kě huíshōu zhǐzhāng yìnshuā de。
这本小册子是用100%可回收纸张印刷的。
Copyright for the typographical arrangement of publications lasts for 25 years.
Chūbǎnwù zài yìnshuā páibǎn fāngmiàn de bǎnquán qīxiàn wéi 25 nián。
出版物在印刷排版方面的版权期限为25年。
Text composition is the most complicated task in the text phase of desktop publishing.
Wénzì páibǎn shì zhuōmiàn yìnshuā de wénzì guòchéng zhōng zuì fùzá de gōngzuò。
文字排版是桌面印刷的文字过程中最复杂的工作。
Hardy had to pay £75 towards the cost of printing a first edition of 500 copies.
Hādài bùdébù wèi dì-yī cì yìnshuā chūbǎn de wǔbǎi fèn zhīfù qīshíwǔ yīngbàng de fèiyòng。
哈代不得不为第一次印刷出版的500份支付75英镑的费用。
I want to arrange for a commemorative postage stamp to be printed.
Wǒ xiǎng zhǔnbèi yìnshuā yì zhāng jìniànyóupiào。
我想准备印刷一张纪念邮票。
The invention of printing in the 16th century resulted in a rapid spread of literacy.
16 shìjì yìnshuāshù de fāmíng shǐ wénhuà déyǐ kuàisù chuánbō。
16世纪印刷术的发明使文化得以快速传播。
The following paragraph does not appear in the printed version.
Yǐxià duànluò zài yìnshuā bǎnběn zhōng méiyǒu chūxiàn。
以下段落在印刷版本中没有出现。
The same pattern has applied to the print media.
Xiāngtóng de yàngshì bèi yìngyòng dào yìnshuāméitǐ shàng。
相同的样式被应用到印刷媒体上。
The printer inks out the selected word.
Gāi yìnshuāgōng yòng mòshuǐ tú qùsuǒ xuǎn zhī cí。
该印刷工用墨水涂去所选之词。
Alternatively, printed versions can be purchased on request.
Huòzhě，yìnshuā bǎnběn kěyǐ gēnjù yāoqiú gòumǎi。
或者，印刷版本可以根据要求购买。

Wǒ de shū zhèngzài yìnshuā。
我的书正在印刷。

Nǐ bìxū mìqiè zhùyì xiǎohào yìnshuā zìtǐ。

Wǒ duì zhūduō yìnshuā cuòwù biǎoshì bàoqiàn。
我对诸多印刷错误表示抱歉。
Since &quot;em quad&quot; is hard to distinguish from &quot;en quad&quot; printers sometimes called it a &quot;mutton quad&quot;.
Yóuyú“em quad”yǔ“en quad”hěn nán qūfēn，yīncǐ，yìnshuāgōng yǒushí jiāng qí chēngwéi“mutton quad”。
由于“em quad”与“en quad”很难区分，因此，印刷工有时将其称为“mutton quad”。

Tā xūyào yǎnjìng，yǐbiàn yuèdú nà fèn xiǎozì yìnshuāpǐn。
他需要眼镜，以便阅读那份小字印刷品。

Hǎo de yìnshuā huì shǐ yì běn shū dú qǐlái gèngjiā yúkuài shūfu。
好的印刷会使一本书读起来更加愉快舒服。

Sòngcháo de rén yǐjing shǐyòng huózìbǎn yìnshuā jìshù le。
People in the Song Dynasty already used letterpress type to print.
Bi Sheng invented movable type printing.
毕升发明了活字印刷。

huóbǎn yìnshuājī 
letterpress (printing) machine

粉刷一新
fěnshuā yì xīn
take on a new look after whitewashing

Fángjiān yǐ fěnshuā yìxīn。
The room has been whitewashed and become bright and tidy again.
这边的阑干才刚被粉刷过，很容易掉色。

The house looks just like new after being painted.

他的公司借鉴了其它公司的经验，避免重蹈覆辙。
Seeing that he was a stranger, the soldiers allowed him to enter.
Jiànyú tā shì gè mòshēngrén，shìbīngmen yǔnxǔ tā jìnrù。
鉴于他是个陌生人，士兵们允许他进入。
Six baseball players had been tested for using steroids.

六名棒球运动员接受了激素鉴定。

辩论由此进入到了证据鉴别阶段。
He wrote the paper with considerable reliance on the work of other scientists.

他的那篇论文很大程度上是借鉴其他科学家的工作成果。
His treatment of space borrows from Italian architecture.
Tā duì kōngjiān de chǔlǐ jièjiàn zì Yìdàlì jiànzhù fēnggé。
他对空间的处理借鉴自意大利建筑风格。
Differences of opinion are quite expectable given the present information.
Jiànyú mùqián zhǎngwò de xìnxī，guāndiǎn chāyì wánquán shì yùliàozhīzhōng de shìqing。
鉴于目前掌握的信息，观点差异完全是预料之中的事情。
I will have the family jewels appraised by a professional.
Wǒ jiāng yōngyǒu nàxiē bèi mǒu gè jiàoshòu zuòle jiàndìng de jiāchuán bǎoshí。
我将拥有那些被某个教授做了鉴定的家传宝石。

With the continuous decrease of its business income, the board decided to change the company\'s manager.
董事会规定公司的预储基金谁都不能动用。
Dǒngshìhuì guīdìng gōngsī de yùchǔ jījīn shuí dōu bùnéng dòngyòng。
The board stipulates that no one has the right to use the company\'s reserve fund.
由于在这个项目中贡献突出，他被董事局擢升为副总。
Yóuyú zài zhège xiàng mù zhōng gòngxiàn tūchū，tā bèi dǒngshìjú zhuóshēng wéi fù zǒng。
Because of his outstanding contributions to the project, the board promoted him to vice president.

At the staff meeting, Director Dong planned the companies blue print for next year.

The Chairman of the Board is also the CEO.
他旁听了昨天的董事会。

It is not obligatory for directors to devote continuous attention to the affairs of the company.

董事们并没有义务对公司事务进行持续关注。

There was an unexpected discord among the board.

The discording board members were shuffled out of the room.

They will appoint a new chairperson to the board.

他们将任命一位新的董事会主席。

Dǒngshìhuì dìngqī xiàng gǔdōng fābù yí gè tōnggào。

牵扯
牵扯。

这两个事情根本没有联系，就别生拉硬扯了。

拉扯

chězhù shéngzi búfàng

扯扯家常

扯淡
chědàn
talk nonsense
扯淡

After redistribution, everyone\'s payment is almost the same.
他们商议决定以资抵债，两下扯平。

wùjià měngzhǎng（diē）

technical rally
由市场内部因素引起的价格止跌(或回稳)

股价原本太高了，这次暴跌把股票带回了正常水平。
喜爱的球队失利，他禁不住跌足捶胸。
Xǐài de qiúduì shīlì，tā jīnbúzhù diēzú chuíxiōng。
He couldn\'t help stamping on the ground when his favorite ball team fell behind.
跌足捶胸。
马足蹩，车轴折，人蹉跌
A false step brought her suddenly to the ground.
Yí cì shīzú tūrán ràng tā diēdào dì shàng。
一次失足突然让她跌到地上。
股市行情已跌至谷底
